53b7('bum): pa rnams stong po zhes bya bar spyod de/ ji nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su myi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do// yi ge mngon par sgrub pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/ ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyi su myi 'gyur ba
53b8('bum): de ltar spyod do/ yi ge la 'jug pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyisu myi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do// yi ge myong ba la 'jug pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyisu
54a1('bum): myi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do// gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis myi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do// 'dus byas kyi khams stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis sum
54a2('bum): 'gyur ba de ltar spyod de/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/ ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyi su myi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
54a3('bum): tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa ni byang chub tu spyod pa yin te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
54a4('bum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi na/ sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ @ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang dag pa'i
54a5('bum): don ni sangs rgyas zhes byas te/ rab 'byor da de yang 'di ltar des yang dag pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// des yang dag pa'i don du
54a6('bum): rtogs pas de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga yang 'di ltar chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol
54a7('bum): pa/ bying chub sems das cos bgyi no// byang chub ces bgyi bi de gang gi tshig blo dgos lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dbyang chub ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi chog bla dgas so// 
54a8('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid ni tshig bla dag so// de ni gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgaso// de ni chos nyid kyi tshig bla dag so// de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig bla dag so// de ni chos skyon myed pa'i tshig bla dgas
54b1('bum): de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig bla dag so// rab 'byor yang 'di ltar byang chub ces bya ba ni cig de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid rnam pa gzhan du myi 'gyur ba ste/ de'i phyi rgyan
54b2('bum): chub ces bya'o// rab 'byor de yang 'di ltar 'di lta ste byang chub ces bya ba de na mying dang mtshan ma tsam ste/ de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o// rab 'byor nga yang 'di ltar yang dag pa'i don ni byang chub kyi don no// rab 'byor/ 
54b3('bum): yi 'di ltar de ni chos thams cad myong dang gzugs mnan mA tsam du rtogs par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sa bya'o/ rab 'byor 'di ltar dbyer sred pa'i don na byang chub kyi don te// rab 'byu rang yang
54b4('bum): de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/ de'i phyir byasachub ces bya'o// rab 'byor yang 'di ltar de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
54b5('bum): pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chu ba 'di la spyod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
54b6('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pho ri med tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa
54b7('bum): spyong pa da shes rab kyi pha mi du du nid pa mi spyod pa dang / rang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nong stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong ba nod la stong ba dang
54b8('bum): mi mdzag nyid ma srung ba dang / de dam mi stong pa nyid ma spyod pa dang / 'dus rgya yong de nyid po spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / mtha' mas 'das pa snying pa nyidal sung
55a1('bum): rgya dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thas cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan
55a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa
55a3('bum): pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod
55a4('bum): pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags dpa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la skyed pa dang / 'phags pa bden pa rnams la spyong ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la su
55a5('bum): dang / tshad myed pa rnams la stod pa dang / gzugs skyed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar dpa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
55a6('bum): par 'dug pa nas mi spyod padang/ rnam par 'dapa'i ste stong pa nyid la skyed pa dang / mtshanas myed pa sngon paskyed pa la spyad pa dang / mngon shes pa rnams sa spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
55a7('bum): rnam pa'i stong dang / rdzas kyi sas su spyong bya dang / de bzhin gshegs parnams la snong dang / gas masas stong pa dang / sems dag pa ga rnarnams sa stong
55a8('bum): pa byung pa / na du sa sa sapa'i byang pa dang/ nyi zu
55b1('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang chog su 'gyur ba 'am/ 'grib pa 'am 'gong ba 'am 'phel ba 'am/ skye ba 'am 'gag
55b2('bum): pa 'am kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la
55b3('bum): spyod pa dang / snyan pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du tu
55b4('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan ga pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid
55b5('bum): la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa da nga / steng / pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 
55b6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa sto pa nyid la skyed pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 
55b7('bum): dor ba myed pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod
55b8('bum): pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa
56a1('bum): dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lhag
56a2('bum): rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yin lag brgyad pa mi spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams mi spong ba dang / tshad myong ba rnams
56a3('bum): la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'dug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par tharang pa rnams la spyod paM dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su su
56a4('bum): ba dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtsha/ na ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod
56a5('bum): pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / myi 'jin/ sa pa rnams mi spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig
56a6('bum): ba rnams la srid pa dang / byams po chen po la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bcwo brgyad la spyod pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid
56a7('bum): spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa dang / de la tshes gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am 'grib pa 'am/ 'phel ba
56a8('bum): 'gong ba'am skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byung bar 'gyur ba gang meng myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen
56b1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha 'o gad du phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ni chos gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba'am 'grib par bya ba 'am / 'gong bar bya ba 'am/ 'phel bar bya ba / skye bar bya ba'am 'gas
56b2('bum): par bya ba 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyir/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal
56b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la byang chub tu chos gang yang rdzog su 'gyur ba 'am/ 'grib par bgyi ba 'am 'gong bar bgyi ba 'am
56b4('bum): 'phel bar bgyi ba 'am skye bar bgyi ba 'am/ 'gag par bgyi ba 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par bgyi ba 'am/ rna/ ma par byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
56b5('bum): nye bar gnas par lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na de rje ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes re/ bkyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe ji ltar sbyin pa'i/ 
56b6('bum): pa ra mang tu phyind pa yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur/ dza ltar tshul khrims kyi pha lang tu phyind pa yong su 'dzun par 'gyur ji ltar/ bzod pa'i po ramang tu phyin dam yang 'dzin
56b7('bum): 'gyur/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur/ ji ltar bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu 'dzin pa lags/ 'gyur/ ji ltor shos rab tu
56b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa yong su 'dzin par 'gyur/ ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar phye stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur
57a1('bum): ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod
57a2('bum): bar 'gyur/ ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur// 
57a3('bum): ji ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
57a4('bum): la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar mya dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la so da par 'gyur/ ji ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur// 
57a5('bum): ji ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur ra// ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod paragyur/ ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod par 'gyur// 
57a6('bum): ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar dbang po rnams la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar stobs rnam sa la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ldir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la stod par 'gyur// 
57a7('bum): ji ltar mem la spyod bar 'gyur/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar bsam gtan rnams la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar tshad myed pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur rje
57a8('bum): ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms par 'ju spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar rnam par tha rad pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam
57b1('bum): la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa skyed pa la/ spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la stod par 'gyur/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzin nas
57b2('bum): la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod par 'gyur/ dza ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs bcu la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur/ dzaM ltar
57b3('bum): seM si yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ster de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod par 'gyur// ji ltar mi 'jigs byams pa chen po 'jig la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar
57b4('bum): snying rje chen po la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos dam 'dres pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur/ ji ltar nyan thos kyidas las 'da' bar 'gyur/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi sa las
57b5('bum): 'da' bar 'gyur/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchi sa par 'jug par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis brga 'astsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems
57b6('bum): dpa' chen pa la ni gnyi su snyid pa'i blo med do// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnyis kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// gnas kyis tshul khrims kyi
57b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gnyis kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gnyis kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha ro lung tu phyinang po la myi spyod rdo/ gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi pha ra
57b8('bum): tu byin pa mi skye spyod do/ gnyis kyis shes rab kyi sa song tu phyinod pa la myi byed de// gnyis kyis dang stong pa nyid la myi spyong // steng pa nyid sa myi su dang / gnas kyis phyi
58a1('bum): sa spyod/ ngo // sa kyis chen po song pa nyid na spyod // sa kyis dos su bsnos dang// kyis
58a2('bum): sa kyis dus padus skyes dis / ses dus 'das pazod pa 'odas kyi spyod do// sa kyi khrigs ngas sa stong ga mang pa'i
58a3('bum): spyod do// gnyis kyis der ba myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod do/ gnyis kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis rang gi mtshan na
58a4('bum): stong pa nyid la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis mya myigs pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis dngos po myed pa stong nyid la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la skye
58a5('bum): spyod do// gnyis kyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam sa la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams la
58a6('bum): myi stod do// gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis dbang po rnams la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis stobs rnams la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnas la/ 
58a7('bum): mya spyod do/ gnyis kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis bsam gtan rnams la myi spyod do// gnyis
58a8('bum): kyis tshad myed pa rnams la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis rnam par tha rad pa rnams la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis mthard kyis
58b1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa rnams la myimi spyod do// gnyis kyis gnas pa'i rnam par tha rad pa pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis mngon par shes pa
58b2('bum): rnams la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la myi spyad do// gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis myi
58b3('bum): 'jigs pa rnams la myi spyod do// ga nyis kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la myi spyod do/ gnyis kyis byams pa chen po la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis snying rje chen po la myi spyod do/ gnyis kyis
58b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la myi spyod do/ gnyis kyis thams cad shes pa nyid la myi spyo/ / gnyis kyis la rim gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis rnam pa thas
58b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la myi spyod do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar gnyis kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do/ gnyis kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
58b6('bum): myi spyod do// gnyis kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// gnyis kyis bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod/ gnyis
58b7('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis phyi stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis phyi ning stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis stong pa nyid stong
58b8('bum): pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis chen po stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la myi spyo
59a1('bum): gnyis kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis rang bzhin stong / 
59a2('bum): pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis dngos po myed pa
59a3('bum): stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis dngos po myed pa'i ji bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis yang
59a4('bum): dag par spong ba rnams la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi nidang pa rnams la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis dbang po rnams la myi spro// da// gnyis kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stobs rnams la myi
59a5('bum): spyod/ gnyis kyis byang chub kyi yin lag rnams la mya spyod/ nyis kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis
59a6('bum): bsam gtan rnams la skye spyod/ gnyis kyis tshad myod pa rnams la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis rnam par tha rad pa rnams la myi spyong / gnyis
59a7('bum): kyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis mngon par shes pa nas
59a8('bum): sa myi spyod/ gnyis kyis ting nge 'ang ni rnam sa la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la myi myod / gnyis kyis myi 'jigs pa rnams so
59b1('bum): myi spyod/ gnyis kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis byams pa chen po la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis snying rje chen po la mi spyod/ gnyis kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la myi spyod
59b2('bum): gnyis kyis thams cad shes pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myi spyod/ gnyis kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la myi spyod na// 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
59b3('bum): dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sems srad ma skyed pa'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'a
59b4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga su gang gnyis la spyod pa de da ga ni dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar myi 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byis pa so so'i spyi bo thams cad ni gnyis la
59b5('bum): brten pa ste/ de dag ni dge ba'i rtsi bas rnam par myi 'phel lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnyis la myi'o// de/ de na sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sems
59b6('bum): phyis byed pa'i bar dudag pa tshigs rnas par 'phel te/ den lta dang myo ngo snyam yin du mas pa'i 'dig rten gyis dge ba'i gang gi mas sa dus kun thos kyis 'ayas sangs
59b7('bum): sor ltung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mye dge ba'i chos gzhan gyis songs 'phrigs par gyur cig/ de dag gis seng su 'bregs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas spyod na/ dge ba'i sa pa mang pos rnam
59b8('bum): bya phes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi yom tu phyind pa la byedang/ dge pa che bamang pos rnam par gyi 'phel ba dang / 'dod pa'i pha ro yo tu phyin pa la spyod pa dge ba'i ma tha mang pos mam
60a1('bum): myi 'phel ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos
60a2('bum): rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mya 'phel ba dang // nang stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa mang pos rnam par myi 'phel/ 
60a3('bum): ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na
60a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phe/ la ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba
60a5('bum): mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsi ba mang pos
60a6('bum): rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par
60a7('bum): mya 'phel ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / chos thas
60a8('bum): cad stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la
60b1('bum): spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos
60b2('bum): rnam par mya 'phel ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod na dge ba'i rtsi ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / yang dag
60b3('bum): par spong ba rnams la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / dbang po rnams la spyod na dge ba'i
60b4('bum): rtsa ba rnam myi 'phel ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod rnga na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / dbang po/ rnams la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel
60b5('bum): ba dang / stobs rnams la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la skye dan dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / 
60b6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / 
60b7('bum): bsam gtan rnams la spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / tshad myed pa rnams la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnams par myi 'phel ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
60b8('bum): 'jug pa rnams la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams la spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang / mthard kyis gnas par
61a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la do na dge ba'i
61a2('bum): mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi
61a3('bum): 'phel ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel
61a4('bum): ba dang / mya 'jigs pa rnams la spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / 
61a5('bum): byams pa chen po la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / snying rje chen po la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba mad pos rnam par mya 'phel ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
61a6('bum): 'dres pa rnams la spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na dge ba'i rtsa ba me nga pos rnam par myi 'phel ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
61a7('bum): nyid la spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rna bar myi 'phel ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par myi 'phel ba de ltar nyams spang bar myi nus te// rang
61a8('bum): 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci legs/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
61b1('bum): chen pos/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad par bgyi'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
61b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// myi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyad de/ sangs
61b3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yong su rdzogs par ma byas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams yongasu ma bzung bar/ byang chub ba sems dpa' sems dpa'
61b4('bum): chen pos rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par myi nuso// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom lda na 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i
61b5('bum): rtsa ba yongasasu bzung ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs bzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba lags sa/ 
61b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
61b7('bum): bsnyen bkur byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis mdo dang dbyangs kyi bstan pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshig su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang
61b8('bum): 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du 'byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la dbab par bstan pa/ gang ci gsungs kyang / de dag thos
62a1('bum): cagayongs su 'dzin to// yongs su bzung nas kyang / tshig gis yong su 'dris pa dang / yid kyis yongasu rtogs pa dang / lta bas rab tu khong du chung bar byas shing / gzungs rab tu thobA pa/ 
62a2('bum): byed do// gzungs rab tu thob par byas nas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bskyed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bskyed pas/ de che rnam par 'phos kyang / chos de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
62a3('bum): thob par ma gyur kyi bar du/ nam yang chud za bar myi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de
62a4('bum): ngag gis yongs su bzung bas nam yang ngan song dang mye kho dam par skye bar myi 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang lus yongasu bzung bas/ nam yang ngan song dang / 
62a5('bum): 'dzind to// lus de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ya su dag par byed do// sems can rnams yongasu smin pa ra byed do// dge ba ma'i rtsa ba de dag gis yongasu bzung
62a6('bum): bas kyang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i legs
62a7('bum): ston pa dag dang / nam du yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ sangs rgyas
62a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ bsnyen bkur bar bya'o// dge ba'i rtsi ba rnams bskyed par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rolong tu phyind pa stong phrag
62b1('bum): ronas me dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ya
62b2('bum): bsnyun bkur myi bgyid/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par myi bgyid la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongasu ma bzung bar gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams ca
62b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par myi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
62b4('bum): la bsnyen bkur ma byas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su rdzogs param byas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu ma bzung ba ra rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba myed do// 
62b5('bum): deci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas/ dag par rtsi ba yongs su rdzogs par byas// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yang bsnyen pa byas kyang dadung rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
62b6('bum): pa nyid thob par mya nus na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos yong su rdzogs par ma byas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ma bsten pa rnams rnam pa thams
62b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myedado// rab 'byor de de ltar bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i mying bden pa la gnas par 'dod pa
63a1('bum): dang / myur du bla na myed pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu mngon par rdzogs por 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos
63a2('bum): bskyed par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen
63a3('bum): bkur bgyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten par bgyis kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par myi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni thas
63a4('bum): mkhas par dang myi ldan pa'i phyir te/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las thabs de thob par ma gyur pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu yang ma skyes/ gang de la thabs
63a5('bum): ston pa'i dge ba'i bi shes gnyen de lta bu dag la yang ma bsten pas de ltar thob par myi 'gyur ro// gsol pabacom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
63a6('bum): thabs gang dang ldan pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa med pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
63a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
63a8('bum): 'das rnams dang rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang myi dang lnga dang phyi mi yin pa'i bas mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsame pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub ses
63b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snyan pa'i pha ro long tu phyinang pa la spyod na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan/ 
63b2('bum): las rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang myi dang myo ma yin par gyur po dag la sbyin pa song su gtong ste// de rnas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po ying la bya ba de dang ldan pa
63b3('bum): sa ya skyed pa'i du gas sum+b+ha gyu/ chen po po song yin pa'i tsug kyi myi 'gyur/ ting pal dugs su kyi 'gyuro// des di thams cad dong gis na
63b4('bum): ma byud pa dang / gas du/ ma thus sa 'dug na / 
63b5('bum): cang ni nus pa gang yang myed pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed myong ba'i mtshan nyid kyis 'dug ste/ de thabs mkhas pa da ga bu dang ste na pas na/ dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar sbyin pa man / 
63b6('bum): tu byed pa la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams yongasu sbyin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed kyang / gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs
63b7('bum): bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu sbyin par bya ba'i phyir// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyi nang po la spyod pa ma gtogs par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yong su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras
63b8('bum): bu lo smon pa myed do// / shes rab kyi pha ro lod tu/ phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba las/ le'u lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // rab 'byor gzhan yang
64a1('bum): nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chul khrims kyi pa royod tu phyind pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar 'azung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yangs/ 
64a2('bum): bya bas/ nus khrims srung ste/ de la 'dod chags kyi sems snyib par myi 'gyur/ zhe srang bsgrib par myi 'gyur/ gtisug sdib par myi 'gyur/ ngag la nyal sgrib par rgyu 'gyur/ kun nas ldang ba snor
64a3('bum): par myi 'gyur te/ myi dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi dgeg su 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ ser sna 'am/ tshul khrims ngan pa 'am/ 'khrug pa'i sems sam/ le lo'i sems sam/ brtson 'grus
64a4('bum): chung ba'i sems sam/ g.yeng ba'i sems sam/ sa rab 'chal pa'i sems sam/ nga rgyal lam/ brnyas pa/ 'am/ che ba'i nga rgyal yum+ba/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang
64a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing / chos thams cad
64a6('bum): myed pa dang ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na'ang / chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang myed pa'o// 
64a7('bum): zhes bya bar 'du byed myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/ de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/ dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ 
64a8('bum): de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed kyang / gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su
64b1('bum): bskyab pa dang / sems can rnams yongasu smyin par bya ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par/ tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu gang 'khor bar/ yongasu spyod par
64b2('bum): bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa myed do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u lnga bcu brgyad pa'o// 
64b3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
64b4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa bsgom ste/ de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrub par myi 'gyur/ zhe sdang / sgrib par myi 'gyur/ gti mug sgrib par myi 'gyur/ bag la
64b5('bum): nyal sgrib par myi 'gyur/ kun nas ldang ba sgrub par na'agyur/ myi dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyurab 'di lta ste/ ser sna 'am/ nul khrims ngan pa 'am 'khrun/ 
64b6('bum): pa'i sems sam/ le lo'i sems sam/ brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/ g.yeng ba'i sems sam/ shes rab 'chal ba'i sems sam/ nga rgyal lam ma brnyas pa 'am/ che ba'i nga
64b7('bum): rgyal lam/ nga'i nga rgyal lam/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par myi 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid/ 
64b8('bum): kyis stong par shes shing / chos thams cad myed pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yongasu ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na yang / 
65a1('bum): chos thams cad ni rus pa gang yang med pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/ de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/ dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel
65a2('bum): bar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed kyang gzhan
65a3('bum): du na sems can thams cad yongasu bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu sman par bya ba'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par bzod pa'i 'bras bu gang 'khor
65a4('bum): bar yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la ste/ ngan pa myed do// rab 'byor ngade gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
65a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de la 'di/ 
65a6('bum): chags kyi sems sgrib par myi 'gyur/ zhe sdang sgrib par mi 'gyur/ gti mug sgrib par myi 'gyur/ bag la nyal sgrib par myi 'gyur/ kun nas ldang ba sgrib par myi 'gyur te/ myi dge ra/ 
65a7('bum): bcos gzhan byang chub kyi bgegs su gyu rad pa 'di lta ste/ ser sna 'am/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems sam/ 'khrug pa'i sems sam/ brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/ g.yeng
65a8('bum): ba'i sems sam/ shes rab 'chal ba'i sems sam/ nga rgyal lam brnyas pa 'am/ che ba'i nga rgyal lam/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par myi
65b1('bum): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa shes shing chos thams cad myed pa dang ma byung ba dang / yongasu ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par/ 
65b2('bum): ma grub par mthong ste/ chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na'ang / chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang myed pa'i zhes bya bar 'du byed myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'i jug ste/ de thabs mkhas pa de lta/ 
65b3('bum): bu dang ldan pas na/ dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams yongasu sbyin
65b4('bum): par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par/ byed kyang gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongasasu bskyed/ pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus
65b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongasu spyad par bya ba de lta bu 'i 'bras bu la smon pa myed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
65b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
65b7('bum): la bya bas gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug ste/ de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par myi 'gyur/ de ltar sgrub par myi 'gyur/ gti mug sgrib par myi 'gyur/ bag la nyal la sgrub
65b8('bum): par myi 'gyur/ kun nas ldang ba sgrib par mya 'gyur te/ myi dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi/ bgegs su 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ ser sna'am/ tshul khrims ngan pa 'am/ 'khrug
66a1('bum): ba'i sems sam/ le lo'i sems sam/ brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/ g.yeng ba'i sems sam/ shes rab 'chal pa'i sems sam/ nga rgyal lam/ brnyas pa 'am/ che ba'i nga rgyal lam
66a2('bum): nga'i nga rgyal lam/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam dag kyang sgrib par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par
66a3('bum): shes shing / chos thams cad mkhyen pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yongasu ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par mthong ste/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na yang / chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang
66a4('bum): myed pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/ de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/ dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la
66a5('bum): spyod de/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod cing / se mas can rnams yong su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi nga yong su dag par byed kyang / gzhan du na sems can thos
66a6('bum): cid yongasu bsgru pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par byed bI phyir/ bsam gtan gi pha ro lang tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par bsam gtan ga 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongasu spyad
66a7('bum): par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa myed do// rab 'byor dgazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la sring po'i tshe/ sems dngapa pa ba stong pa
66a8('bum): nye bar bzung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la byabs shes rab sgom ste/ de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par myi 'gyur// zhe sdang sgrib par myi 'gyur/ gti mug sgrob par gyi
66b1('bum): 'gyur// bag la nyal ba bsgrib par myi 'gyur/ kun nas ldang ba sgrib par myi 'gyur te/ myi dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi bgegasu 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ ser sna 'am tshul khrims ngan pa 'am
66b2('bum): 'khrug pa'i sems sam/ le lo'i sems sam/ brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/ g.yeng ba'i sems sam/ shes rab 'chal ba'i sems dag kyang sgrib par myi 'gyur ro// nga rgyal lam brnyas
66b3('bum): pa 'am/ che ba'i nga rgyal lam/ nga'i nga rgyal lam/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad
66b4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing chos thams cad myed pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug
66b5('bum): na'ang chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang med pa'o// zhes// bya bar 'du byed myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/ de thab/ sa mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/ dge ba'i rtsa bas
66b6('bum): rnam par 'phel bar shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod daM/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sem sa can rnams yongasu smyin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
66b7('bum): dag par byed kyang gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs bsgrub pa dang // sems can rnams yongasu smon par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha romad tu phyinang pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par/ zhes rab kyi
66b8('bum): 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongasu spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa// le'u lnga bcu dgu pa'o/ 
67a1('bum): rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin par yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di rna
67a2('bum): ltar de ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te/ thabs mkhas pa des bsam gtan dang po de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so myed pa dang ma byung bar shes so// yongasu ma rdzogs par
67a3('bum): shes so// mngon par ma grub par shes so// bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs myi 'dzind to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar don thabs mkhas
67a4('bum): pa dang ldan pa yin te/ thabs mkhas pa des bsam ga/ dan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yod/ su myi 'dzin to// de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes/ 
67a5('bum): byed pa dang ma byung bar shes so// yongasu ma rdzogs par shes so// mngon par ma grub par shes so// bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongasu
67a6('bum): myi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni thibs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te/ thabs mkhas pa de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis yong su stong par shes// myed pa dang ma byung bar shes so
67a7('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so// mngon par ma grub par sheso// bsam gtan bzhi 'i lu snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongasu mye 'dzinin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar drini khrims
67a8('bum): mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te/ thabs mkhas pa des pasam gtan bzhi pa de ra nga ga mi tshan nyid kyis stong pa gas sa// khyod pa dang mabyung ba sheso// so su ma rdzogs gas so// mngon / 
67b1('bum): ma grub par shes so// thabs mkhas pa byams pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te
67b2('bum): thabs mkhas pa des kyang byams pa de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so// myed pa dang mi byung bar sheso// yongasu ma rdzogs par shes so// mngon par ma grub par shes so// snying rdzol stes
67b3('bum): par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongasu myi 'dzind to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te/ thabs mkhas pa des snying rje de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes
67b4('bum): so/ myed pa dang ma byung bar shes so// yongasu ma rdzogs/ par shes so// mngon par ma grub par sheso/ dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongasu myi 'dzin
67b5('bum): to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de na thibs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te/ thabs mkhas pa des dga' ba de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so// myed pa dang ma byung bar shes
67b6('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so// mngon par ma grub par shes// btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mya 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni thabs
67b7('bum): mkhas pas de btang snyoms des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so// myed pa dang ma byung bar shes so// yongasu mi rdzogs par shes/ mngon par ma grub par shes so// nam mkha' mthu/ 
67b8('bum): yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongasu myi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te/ thabs mkhas
68a1('bum): pa dang nam mkha' dang mtha' yas skye mched de/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so// myed pa dang ma byung bar shes// yongasu ma rdzogs par shes so// mngon par ma grub par shes so// 
68a2('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang / rnam par smin pa yong su myi 'dzind to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 
68a3('bum): thabs mkhas pa des rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so// myed pa dang ma byung bar shes so// yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so// mngon par ma grub par
68a4('bum): shes so// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'ju/ ga pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongasu myi// 'dzind to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni thabs mkhas pa
68a5('bum): dang ldan pa yin te/ thabs mkhas pa des cung zad myed pa'i skye mched de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so// myed pa dang ma byung bar shes so// yongasu ma rdzogs par shes so/ 
68a6('bum): mngon par ma grub par shes so// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang rnam par smin pa yongasasu myi 'dzind to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de
68a7('bum): ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa des 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so// myed pa dang ma byung bar shes/ yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so// mngon
68a8('bum): par ma grub par sheso// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas mthong bas bsgom pas
68b1('bum): spang ba'i lam la spyod kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par myi byed/ 
68b2('bum): rang byang chub thob par myi byed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so// myed pa dang ma byung bar sheso/ yongasu ma rdzogs par shes so// mngon par ma grub par
68b3('bum): shes sa// mngon par ma grub par sheso// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de dag la spyod cing / nyan thos kyi sa las yongasu 'da'/ rang sangs rgyas kyis las yongasu 'da'o// rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub seM sa dang
68b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ste/ rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sim das dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
68b5('bum): che/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed/ lan cig phyi ra 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob
68b6('bum): par gyi byed/ dgra ba com pa nyi thob par myi byed/ rang byang chub bab par myi byed// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta de ni ces thams cad rang gis tshan nyid kyis stong por shes so// sred pa dang ma byung zu na/ 
68b7('bum): sa thams cad yongs sa rdzogs par shes// chos lams pad mngon pa ma gru par shes so// ras bye da gzhan snang byang chu sems dpa sems su ched kyi shes sa kyi pha ros tu myo
68b8('bum): la kyi ma rgyams pa jug pa dul ma sa mas pa'i rdzas pa byed/ kyi
69a1('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par myi byed/ rang byang chub thob par myi byed// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par
69a2('bum): shes so// chos thams cad pa myed pa dang / ma byung bar shes/ chos thams cad yongasu ma rdzogs par shes/ chos thams cad mngon par ma grub par sheso// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub
69a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yong su 'dris par byed/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongasu 'dris par byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yong su 'dris par byed/ 
69a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la yongs 'drisapar byed/ byams pa chen po la yong su 'dris par byed/ snying rje chen po la yongasu 'dris par byed/ nam yang sangs rgyas kyi
69a5('bum): zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur/ sems can rnams ye// ngasu smin par ma gyur kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par myi byed do// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems/ 
69a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen sto/ sngarab kyi pha ro yod tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// gtsul sa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i chos pa so ga ma myong
69a7('bum): rnam par sbyin pa yongs kyi 'dzin lam rdzongs pa dang ldan pa migs// kyi ldan 'dus kyis bka' bral te/ ra de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa na
69a8('bum): gang de ga buM chis pab mo dag la spyod kyang rnam par sbyin pa yongs su su 'dzin pa don thongs pa dang ldan pa'o// 'i phyi na/ ba kya nga don gyi tshu ma ma dpa' sems dpam
69b1('bum): nyid las myi g.yo'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid gang las myi g.yo'o/ ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po myed pa las myi g.yo' ba yin te/ rab 'byorard
69b2('bum): gang yang 'di skad du ngo bo nyid gang las myi g.yo'o zhes zer ba'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid
69b3('bum): las myi g.yo'o// rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// myig gi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// rna ba'i ngo bo nyid las mya g.ya'o// sna'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// lce'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yon
69b4('bum): mus kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// yid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// sgra'i ngo/ bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// dri'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o
69b5('bum): 'o jo bo nyid las myi gso'o// reg gi ngo bo nyid las rgya g.yo'o// chos kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes
69b6('bum): pa'i nga la nyid las myi g.yo'o// shA'i rnas par shes pa'i dzi bo nyid las kyi mamal/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngobo nyidadi las myi g.yo'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i dzin 'di las myi ga so'o/ 
69b7('bum): rnam pa shes pa'i'adobo 'di las myi gso'o// myig gi 'dus te dag pa rlol tha' las myu ga / nuba'i 'dus te reg pa'i nga rje 'dri mas sgyo gas me/ sA la dus te reg pa dzin nyid las myi gas/ 
69b8('bum): lce'i dus te reg pa'i jiH nyi las myi gsol/ sras kyi dus te reg pa'i mi gdi las myig yo / yid kyi 'dus te rig pa ni tham ny-i sas kyi shes 'o// myig gi 'dus po gapa
70a1('bum): kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ji bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.ye'o// lce'i 'dus te
70a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o/ 
70a3('bum): sa khams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// me'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// nam mkha'i khams
70a4('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid las myaM g.yo'o// nam mkha' khams kyi ngo bo nyid las myu ga yo'o// rnamo'i rnam par shes pa'i khams da kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi
70a5('bum): g.yo'o// 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// rnam paras pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// mying dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las mya g.yo// skye drug gi ngo bo nyid las myi
70a6('bum): g.yo'o// rig pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.ye'o// tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// sred pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// lend pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// srid pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi gams
70a7('bum): skye ba'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// rga shi'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.ye'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa'i ngo bo nyid las mya
70a8('bum): g.yo'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// bsam gtan gi pha ro lad tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid
70b1('bum): las myi gso'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngon nyid las myi g.ye'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid
70b2('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo lo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// 'dus
70b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
70b4('bum): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi gso'o// dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo thanadang las myi gsolo// chos thams cad stong po nyid kyi
70b5('bum): nyid las myi g.yo'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngoza las myi g.yo'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// dngos po myed pa'i bstong pa nyid kyi ngon
70b6('bum): nyid las myi g.yo'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo/ 
70b7('bum): tshad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi gsol/ yang
70b8('bum): dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mya g.yo'o// dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yon
71a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yol
71a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// rnam par
71a3('bum): tharang pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yol/ ting nge 'dzin
71a4('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mya gi yau'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// de bzhin gshegs/ da pa rnam stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// myi 'jigs
71a5('bum): pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid las mya g.yo'o// so so yang dang ga par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid las myaM g.yo'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o
71a6('bum): byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid las myi g.yo'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar chos 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po
71a7('bum): skying ba'o// rab 'byor dadangos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar myi nus so// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das mi lags/ dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po
71a8('bum): ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa 'o na dngos po mchis pas mngon par/ 
71b1('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa 'o na dngos po mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par/ 
71b2('bum): 'chang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// gsol ba 'on dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya
71b3('bum): bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na gal te de ltar dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par
71b4('bum): rtogs par myi 'gyur/ dngos po mchis pas kyang da sa po ma mchis pa mngon par rtogs par myi 'gyur/ dang // sa po mchis kyang dngos po mchis pa mngon par rtogs par myi
71b5('bum): 'gyur/ dngos po ma mchis kyang dngos po mchis par mdo na par rtogs par myi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du thob pa ma mchis shing mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa 'am
71b6('bum): gcig tu myi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mngon par rtogs pa ni yong ye myed pa ma yin te/ bzhi pos mngon par grub pa de lta bus ni ma yin no// gsold pa bcom ldan
71b7('bum): 'das 'o na mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba lta bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la dngos po yang myed/ dngos po myed pa yang ma yin pa de lta bu'i mngon par rtogs
71b8('bum): ba ste/ de la spros pa de dag myed pas spros pa myed cing spros pa dang bral ba ni mngon par rtogs pa'o// gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa gang lags
72a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// tshor brtag ces bya ba 'am myi
72a2('bum): rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// 'du shes rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// 'du byed rtag ces bya ba
72a3('bum): 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// gzug
72a4('bum): bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
72a5('bum): spros pa'o// 'du shes myed 'du shes bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug snga/ la zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nye'i spros pa'o// 'du byed bde zhes bya ba'i sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni
72a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'i sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i spros pa'i/ gzugs bden
72a7('bum): ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'i/ tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa ni
72a8('bum): 'du shes bdag ces bya ba 'am bodag myed ces bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// 'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
72b1('bum): chen por spros pa'o// rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpalas / 
72b2('bum): dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// 'du shes zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
72b3('bum): chen po'i spros pa'i// 'du byed ni zhes bya ba'i sa ma zhi zhes bya ba ni bying chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smos pa'o// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am ma yi zhes bya ba na bying nub sems dpa' sems
72b4('bum): dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// gzugs yongasu shes par bya ba dang / yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// tshor ba yongasu shes pa
72b5('bum): par bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o smos pa'o// 'du shes yongasu shes par bya ba dang yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin
72b6('bum): zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// 'du byed yongasu shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros
72b7('bum): pa'o// rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// myig rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni
72b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// rna ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sna rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni/ 
73a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lce rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lus rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag
73a2('bum): ces bya ba na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// yid rtag ces bya ba 'am mya rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// myig bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug
73a3('bum): bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// rna ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sna bde zhes
73a4('bum): bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lce bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
73a5('bum): chen po'i spros pa'o// lus bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsnga la zhes bya ba ni/ sdug bsngal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// yid bde zhes bya ba 'am
73a6('bum): sdug sngal zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// myig bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smras pa'o/ 
73a7('bum): rnab bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sna bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
73a8('bum): spros pa'o// lde bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lu bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba ni byang chub ses dpal sems
73b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// yid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// myig zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems
73b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// rna ba zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sna zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub
73b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lce zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lus zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni
73b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// yid zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// 
73b5('bum): myig yongs su shes par bya ba dang yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po'i spros pa'o// rna ba yongs su shes par bya ba dang yongs
73b6('bum): shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sna yongasu shes par bya ba dang yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems
73b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lce yong su shes par bya ba dang yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lus yongasu
73b8('bum): shes par bya ba dang / yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// yid yongs su shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par
74a1('bum): bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros
74a2('bum): pa'o// sgra rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lce dri rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
74a3('bum): spros pa'o// ro rtag ces bya ba 'am mya rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// reg rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' so sa dpa'
74a4('bum): chen po'i smos pa'o// chos rtag cos bya ba 'am sti rtagasas/ bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smos teda'o// gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang / 
74a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rje chen po'i sbos pa'i bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smos pa'o// dri 'di / 
74a6('bum): bye ba'am sdug bsnga la zhes bya ba ni byang chubasams dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i smos pa'o// zhes bya 'o 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ban byeng chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snyom na
74a7('bum): pa nis u sems dpa na pa sa / spyug nga sa

74b4('bum): gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni sdug byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sgra zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhe zhes bya ba na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
74b5('bum): za'i spros pa'o// dri zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/ zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' ca
74b6('bum): zo smos pa'o// rag gA zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// chos zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems

74b8('bum): shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// dri yongasu shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems

75a2('bum): par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// chos yongasu shes par bya ba dang yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smis

75a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sA'i// rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lce'i rna

75a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am
75a7('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// 
75a8('bum): sde'i rnam par shes pa de bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i spros pa'o/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub

75b6('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
75b7('bum): ba'i sbos po'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma 'i zhes bya bar
75b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa 'i zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes/ 
76a1('bum): ni zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 
76a2('bum): chen po'i spros pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa yongasu shes par bya ba dang yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par
76a3('bum): shes pa yong su shes par bya ba dang yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa yongasu shes par bya ba dang yongs

76a5('bum): bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongasu shes par bya ba dang yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sos
76a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongasu shes par bya ba dang / yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// myig gi 'dus te/ 
76a7('bum): reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// na ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
76a8('bum): po'i spros pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba ni byang
76b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rig ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reH/ 
76b2('bum): partag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
76b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhe sa bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes
76b4('bum): bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhe/ sa bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'
76b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po'i spros pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba
76b6('bum): 'am sdug sngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
76b7('bum): po'i spros pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed
76b8('bum): ces bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'i/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/ 
77a1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smos pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya
77a2('bum): ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
77a3('bum): zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
77a4('bum): spros pa'o// lce'i 'dus te rig pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spos pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes
77a5('bum): bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am mo zhe zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po'i/ 
77a6('bum): spros pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongasu shes par bya ba dang / yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs
77a7('bum): shes par bya ba dang / yong su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongasu shes par bya ba dang / yongasu shes par bla ma yin
77a8('bum): rjes bya pa byeng chub sems dang ngams dpa' can po'i smos pa'i/ 'i lus te ga shes byab nga / nas par gyi 'am mna'is bya ni byang chuchu ba mam la sems dpa tsha / 
77b1('bum): spros pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su
77b2('bum): shes par bya ba dang yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// myig ga 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba
77b3('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//

77b5('bum): ces bya 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi sa tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub seMs
77b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg
77b7('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes
77b8('bum): bya ba ni nibyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros
