108a6('bum): mtshan nyid la bslab par myi bgyin/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang 'du byed thams cad kyi mtshan nyid la bslabs te nyan thos dang rang sa
108a7('bum): rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las ma 'das na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dge
108a8('bum): skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs na/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob na/ ji ltar chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur/ chos kyi 'khor lo maskor
108b1('bum): ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am theg pa chen pos sems can rnams 'khor ba las dgrol bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dgal te chos la/ 
108b2('bum): la zhig la mtshan nyid yod na ni/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid de dag la slob par 'gyur na/ chos thams cad la mtshan nyid myed cing gzugs med pa bstan du myed pa thogs pa/ 
108b3('bum): myed pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la yang bslab par myi bya/ mtshan nyid med pa la yang bslab par myi bya'o/ 
108b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon chad mtshan nyid myed par gyur pa 'am/ phyis mtshan nyid yod par gyur pa ma yin gi/ rab 'byor da chos 'di ni sngon chad kyang mtshan nyid myed pa la da ltar yang mtshan nyid myed pa/ 
108b5('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la yang bslab par myi bya/ mtshan nyid myed pa la yang bslab/ par myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnas
108b6('bum): byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i dbyings 'di ni de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad la mtshan nyid
108b7('bum): ma mchis shing mtshan nyid tha dad pa yang ma lags la/ mtshan nyid gcig pa yang ma lags na/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchis par 'gyur
108b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bsgoms par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar myi nus so// nyan thos dpa
109a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par myi nus so// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis
109a2('bum): par ma chud par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyed par mi nus so// myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed par ni mngon par shes pa bsgrub par myi nuso// byang
109a3('bum): chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa ma bsgrubs par ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / sems can yongasu smin par bgyi bar myi nus so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang sems
109a4('bum): yongs su smin par ma bgyis par ni/ rnam pa thams cad ma/ nad pa nyid thob par myi nus/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma bgyis par ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar myi nus// 
109a5('bum): chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar ni sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par myi nus so// lan cigaphyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par myi nus so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i/ 
109a6('bum): 'bras bu la dgod par myi nus so// dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par myi nus so// rang byang chub la dgod par myi nus so// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par myi nus so// sems
109a7('bum): can rnams smin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par myi nus so// tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par myi nus/ bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod na
109a8('bum): bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par myi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ mtshan nyid tha dad / 
109b1('bum): ze yang ma yin/ mtshan nyid gcig pa yang ma yin no// gsol pa de ltar chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis na/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba/ 
109b2('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa yang ma yin/ mtshan nyid gcig pa yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de mtsha
109b3('bum): nyid med par bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom mo// gsol pa de ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
109b4('bum): bsgom par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// gsol dpa
109b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lag/ sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs nA
109b6('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
109b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi
109b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// myig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rna ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// snan
110a1('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// lce rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
110a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu nin pa bsgom pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo
110a3('bum): sgra rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dri rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ro rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi
110a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// reg rnam par bsgom pa pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// du chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom
110a5('bum): pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha roladu
110a6('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
110a7('bum): pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
110a8('bum): phyind pa bsgom pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha ro// 
110b1('bum): tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
110b2('bum): phyind pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa
110b3('bum): bsgom pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ 
110b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// lce'i 'dus te re
110b5('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi 'dus / reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi
110b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// sa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes
110b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chu'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni skyes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// me'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'i
110b8('bum): rlung gi khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// nam mkha'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khas rnams
111a1('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgra sgom pa'o// ma rig pa rna bar
111a2('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi
111a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mying dang gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// skye mched drug na rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
111a4('bum): bsgom pa'o// reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol/ da tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa nib rtse shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// sred pa rna bar sgo
111a5('bum): pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// lend pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// srid pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha
111a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// skye ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rga shi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// blang ba
111a7('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni she
111a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan gnyis pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab
111b1('bum): kyipha rol tu byu ba bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan bani pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byams pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dan/ 
111b2('bum): ba'o// snying rje rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// dga' ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// btang snyoms rnam par bsgom
111b3('bum): pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rnam
111b4('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shre
111b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed mi/ na skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgo/ ma pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// sangs
111b6('bum): rgyas rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// chos rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsti ma pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// dge 'dun
111b7('bum): rjesu dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// gtong ba rje su dran
111b8('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// lha rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// skyo ba rjesu dran pa rna bar bsgom pa bsgo
112a1('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjesu dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// 'chi ba rjesu dran pa rnam par sgo
112a2('bum): pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi rnam pa rjesu dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// myi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par sgo
112a3('bum): bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// sdug bsngal gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// bdag myed pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom/ 
112a4('bum): ba bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// myi sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes
112a5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ba sgom pa'o// bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// sems can gi
112a6('bum): 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// srog gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// skye ba'i 'du shes na
112a7('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gso ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// skyes bu'i 'du shes rna bar bsgom pa/ 
112a8('bum): bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// gang zag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// shed can gi 'du shes rna bar bsgom pa bsgom pa'i
112b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// shed bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// byed pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab
112b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// tshor ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// shes pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
112b3('bum): pa bsgom pa'o// mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// 
112b4('bum): bde ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par ba sgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'o// 
112b5('bum): bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
112b6('bum): pabasgom pa'i/ yang dag par spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par/ 
112b7('bum): dbang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// stongs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ning pa bsgom pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par bsgomapa
112b8('bum): bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// lam rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab tu/ 
113a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind rnam par bsgom pa
113a2('bum): bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rnam par thard pa brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa phra/ 
113a3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// 
113a4('bum): rtog pa myed pa la spyod pa tsam gi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rtog dpa'ang myed cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa sgo
113a5('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha ming tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// kun 'byung ba 'phags ni/ 
113a6('bum): bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam 'a/ 
113a7('bum): pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// sdug bsngal shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// kun 'du
113a8('bum): bshes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// 'gog pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam shes pa rnam
113b1('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rnam bsgom pa'o// myi skye ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab
113b2('bum): kyipha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// chos shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rjes su 'gro ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa / 
113b3('bum): ba'o// kun rdzo shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// 'dris pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom ni shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu byin pa bsgom pa'o// sgra ji bzhin shes mi
113b4('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ bsgom pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rnam par bsgom pa bas+ho ma pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// tshul khrims kyi
113b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa na/ ma par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sno/ 
113b6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rolas tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyinas
113b7('bum): bsgom pa'o// shes rab kyi pha ro mang tu na pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa na shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa bsgom sa
113b8('bum): bya nga panyid dam par dasgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pa mang phyid pa bsgom pa'o// byinang stong panyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha ro yod tu med pa bsgom pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid / 
114a1('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgo/ 
114a2('bum): pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes
114a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
114a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid na/ par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha
114a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom ni shes rab
114a6('bum): kyipha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
114a7('bum): phyind pa bsgom pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
114a8('bum): bsgom pa'o// mngon par shes pa drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// 
114b1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// 
114b2('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// sangs rgyas
114b3('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// byams pa chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa
114b4('bum): bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rgyun tu gas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi da rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam
114b5('bum): bar bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ra myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid rna par bsgra
114b6('bum): bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab
114b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'o// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa
114b8('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor kyis gsold pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgo/ 
115a1('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar nor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa
115a2('bum): lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom/ 
115a3('bum): lags// ji ltar na myig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji lta/ 
115a4('bum): na sna rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar lce rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus rnam par
115a5('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags// ji ltar na gzugs rna bar
115a6('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag sa/ ji ltar na sgra rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dri rnam par bsgom pa s+ho// 
115a7('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ro rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na reg rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha
115a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags// ji ltar na myig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom shes ra
115b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom
115b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam pa/ 
115b3('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na myig gi 'dus te/ 
115b4('bum): reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar
115b5('bum): na sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg/ pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgob
115b6('bum): lags ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
115b7('bum): pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na na ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa n+de/ 
115b8('bum): rab kyi sa mang pa phyid pa 'arnam pa lags/ ji sta ra na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kris tshar ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pa mang du phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji skar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i byind kyis kyis
116a1('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgomag
116a2('bum): lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags// ji ltar na sa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol
116a3('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chu'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mye'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
116a4('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rlung gi khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na nam mkha'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu ni
116a5('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa/ lags// ji ltar na rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom/ 
116a6('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ma rig pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes
116a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mying dang gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes
116a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skye mched drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
116b1('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sred pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na
116b2('bum): lend pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na srid pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skye ba rnam par sgom
116b3('bum): ba bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rga shi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na blang ba rna bar bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab tu
116b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lag/ ras/ ji ltar na bsam gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
116b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam ga/ tan gnyis pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha ro da tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gsums
116b6('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan bzhipa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na byas pa rnab / 
116b7('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na snying rje rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dga' ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ 
116b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha ro yong tu phyinin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ dza sar nanam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par
117a1('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
117a2('bum): phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na cung zad myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi sgo/ 
117a3('bum): par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar sangs rgyas rje su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar/ 
117a4('bum): chos rje su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dge 'dun rje su dran pa rna par ba sgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags
117a5('bum): ji ltar na tshul khrims rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar nag/ tong ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha
117a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lha rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skyo ba rje su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes ra
117a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjesu dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'chi ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom/ 
117a8('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na myi rtag pa rjes su/ 
117b1('bum): 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar
117b2('bum): na bdag myed pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na myi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
117b3('bum): lags/ ji ltar na mi sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ 
117b4('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sems can gyi sems 'du shes rnam pa ra bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la/ dgas/ ji ltar na srog gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
117b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skye/ ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha ro/ tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gso ba'i 'du shes na
117b6('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags// ji ltar na skyes bu'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gang zag gi 'dus
117b7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shed can gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shed
117b8('bum): bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na byed pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa las
118a1('bum): ji ltar na tshor blo'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shes pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu hrI
118a2('bum): pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom paHlags/ ji ltar na rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes ra
118a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bde ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom shes
118a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags// ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par 'gro/ 
118a5('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ya/ nga dag par spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gi rkang
118a6('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgra rab lags/ ji ltar na dbang po rnam par bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha ri lang tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stobs rnam par bsgo/ 
118a7('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lam rnam par bsgom pa
118a8('bum): bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge
118b1('bum): 'janing rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
118b2('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad pa brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so/ ji ltar na mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes
118b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtogapa
118b4('bum): myed la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzind rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa dmyed cing dpyod pa tsam gi ting nge 'dzinang rnam par bsgom pa bsgo/ 
118b5('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun
118b6('bum): chung ba phags pa'i 'de pa rnam par bsgom pa sgos pa shes rib kyi roso tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na 'gag pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par brnam pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pa ma na pa / 
118b7('bum): ba lags/ ji myur na las 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ di ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
118b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin la bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun 'byung ba 'phags shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'gog pa shes pa rnam par
119a1('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lam shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na zad pa shes pa rnam par
119a2('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ dza ltar na myi skye ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos shes pa rnam par/ 
119a3('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rjes su 'gro ba shes pa rnam bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun rdzob shes pa rnam par bsgo
119a4('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dris pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin rapa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi sgra ji bzhin shes
119a5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lag/ sa/ ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ 
119a6('bum): dzaM ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na pa dod pa'i pha ro long tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes
119a7('bum): rab kyi pha ro mad du sbyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gi pha rol tu brjid pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na/ 
119a8('bum): bar sgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi ros rdzu rnyed pa bsgom pa lags// ji lta nanang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab k+Shi pa mang tu rkyen bu bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gyi stong banyi rnam par/ 
119a9('bum): bsgom pa bskam pa shes rab kyi pa ying tu byin po sgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gyi ning stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin po bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa
119b1('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par
119b2('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus ma byas
119b3('bum): stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgos pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu nad pa bsgom pa lags/ 
119b4('bum): ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol
119b5('bum): tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par/ bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa/ lags/ ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par bsgo/ 
119b6('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na myi dmyi
119b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags rje
119b8('bum): ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
120a1('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mngon par shes pa drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par bsgom pa
120a2('bum): bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin
120a3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na myi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
120a4('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ nad pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
120a5('bum): pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pharal tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na byams pa chen po ni ma par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom/ 
120a6('bum): ba lags/ ji ltar na snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha/ 
120a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu na
120a8('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na/ 
120b1('bum): rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom
120b2('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
120b3('bum): cad spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa lags// / bam po// 
120b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
120b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi ngas/ ma mo/ 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// 
120b6('bum): byed dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// myig dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// rna ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// sna dngos
120b7('bum): po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mau/ lce dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// lus dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ yid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// gzugs dngos po yod ces bya ba/ 
120b8('bum): myi sgom mo// sgra dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// dri dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// ro dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ reg dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// chos dngos po yod ce
121a1('bum): bya bar myi bsgom mo// myig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar
121a2('bum): myi sgom mo/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// myi
121a3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po
121a4('bum): yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos/ po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
121a5('bum): kyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg bI dad kyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom
121a6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba pas
121a7('bum): po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// sa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// chu'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ me'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ rlung gi khams pa
121a8('bum): po yod ces bya bar myo sgom mo// nam mkha'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dngos po yad ces bya bar
121b1('bum): sgom mo/ ma rig pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ 'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/ mying dang gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar ni/ 
121b2('bum): sgom mo// skye mched drug dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/ reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/ srong ba dngos po// yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// len pa
121b3('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// srid pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// skye ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// rga shi dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// blang ba dngos po yod ces bya bar
121b4('bum): mi sgom mo/ dor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/ bsam gtan dang po dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// bsam gtan gsum pa dngos po yo/ 
121b5('bum): ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ bsam gtan bzhi pa dngos po yod ce/ nyes bya bar myi sgom mo// byams pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi/ sgom mo// snying rje chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// dag
121b6('bum): ba dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// btang snyoms dngos po yo de ces bya bar myi sgom mo// nam mkha' tha' yas skye mched kyi snyom sa par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// rnam shes
121b7('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa ni sa par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ 'du shes myed 'du sde/ 
121b8('bum): myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// chos rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// dge 'dum
122a1('bum): rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// tshul khrims rje su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// g+ha rje su dran pa/ 
122a2('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ skyo ba rjesu dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rje su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// 'chi ba rje su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya ba
122a3('bum): myi sgom mo// lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// myi rtag pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sdug bsngal gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// bdag
122a4('bum): myed pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// myi sdu/ ga pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// dngos dpo myed pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bdag gi/ 
122a5('bum): 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ sems can gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// srog gi 'du she sa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// skye ba'i 'du shes dngos po ye
122a6('bum): ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ gso ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// skyes bu'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// gang zag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// shed can/ 
122a7('bum): gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ shed bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// byed pa po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// tshor ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces de
122a8('bum): bar mi sgom mo// shes pa po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ mthong ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// rtag pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ bde ba'i 'dun
122b1('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sdug pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi skem mo/ bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom/ 
122b2('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// dbang po rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ stobs rnams dngos po yod ces
122b3('bum): bya bar myi sgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// lam dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/ mtshan ma myed pate/ 
122b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// rnam par thar pa brgyad dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ mthar kyis gnas/ 
122b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgo/ mo/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// rtog pa myed la dpyod pa myed pa/ 
122b6('bum): tsam gtong nge 'dzid dngas po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/ rtog pa myod cing pyod pa skyed pa'i ting nge dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar gyi sgom mo/ sdug bas la 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom/ 
122b7('bum): kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/ 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi snyim mo// lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgoms
122b8('bum): sdug bsngal shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ kun 'byung ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// 'gog pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ lam shes pa dngos po yod ces/ 
123a1('bum): bya bar myi sgom mo/ zad pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// myi skye ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// chos shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// rjesu 'gro ba
123a2('bum): shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ kun rdzob shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// 'dris pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sgra ji bzhin shes pa dngos po yod ces bya ba/ 
123a3('bum): myi sgom mo// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po yod ces
123a4('bum): bya bar myi sgom mo/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa da dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// bsam gtan gi pha rol da tu phyind pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// shes rab kyi pha
123a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// phyi stong du/ nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// phyi ning stong pa nyid dngos po
123a6('bum): yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ chen po stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mod / 
123a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ 'dus mi byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// thog ma dang
123a8('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi skem mo// chos thams cad stong pa rten
123b1('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po
123b2('bum): yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// mngon
123b3('bum): par shes pa lnga dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// ting nge 'dzin thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ de bzhin gshegs kyi
123b4('bum): stobs bcu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/ myi 'a jigs pa bzhi dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// so so ya rang dag par rig pa bzhi dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ sarba
123b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yod ces bar myi sgom mo// byams pa chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// snying rje chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// rgyu na
123b6('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po yid ces bya bar myi sgom mo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// da
123b7('bum): bcom pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/ rang byang chub dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// lam gau rnam po shes pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
123b8('bum): pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi sgom mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po
124a1('bum): 'du shes can la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la brtson 'grus
124a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'o'o/ 
124a3('bum): shes can la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can
124a4('bum): la phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la so/ nga pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la
124a5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can// la 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du she/ sa can la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do dngos po'i
124a6('bum): dngos po'i 'du shes can la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa mye da do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
124a7('bum): bsgom pa myed do/ dngos po'i 'du shes can la rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do/ dngos po'i 'du shes can la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
124a8('bum): nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes pa can la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi
124b1('bum): bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la mngon par shes pa drug bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la ting nge 'dzin thas
124b2('bum): cad bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs bcu bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la myi 'jin
124b3('bum): pa bani bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la
124b4('bum): byams pa chen po bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la snying rje chen po bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rgyun tu zhu dgas pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la
124b5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du na/ sa can la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'o du shes can la dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du/ 
124b6('bum): shes can la rang byang chub sgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bsgom pa myed do// dngos po'i 'du
124b7('bum): shes can la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dngos po la 'di ni bdag gi zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags te/ sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / 
124b8('bum): bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang / bas mo gtan dang / shes rab dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / kyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pastong pa nyid dang / 
125a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
125a2('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / 
125a3('bum): ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad
125a4('bum): dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i// 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong / ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub dang / 
125a5('bum): lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba la 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags pa
125a6('bum): gyurd pas gang mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur pa de ni thar pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da dngos po'i 'du shes can la sbyin pa myed/ tshul khrims myed/ bzod pa myed/ brtson 'grus myed/ pas/ 
125a7('bum): gtan kyang myed/ shes rab kyang myed/ lam yang myed/ ye shes kyang myed/ ma thob pa yang myed/ mngon par rtogs pa yang myed/ mthun pa'i bzod pa yang myed/ gzugs kyang yod su shes pa myed/ tshor ba
125a8('bum): yongs su shes pa myed/ 'du shes kyang yong su shes pa myed/ 'du byed kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed// myig kyang yong su shes pa myed do// rna ba yang yong su shes pa med
125b1('bum): rtswa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ lce yang yong su shes pa myed/ lus kyang yongasu shes pa byed/ yid kyang song su shes pa byed// gzugs kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ sgra yang yong su shes pa myed/ dri yang yong su shen
125b2('bum): pa myed/ ro yang yongs su shes pa myed/ reg kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ chos kyang yong su shes pa myed// myig gi rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang yong su shes pa ni/ 
125b3('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa yang yongasasu shes pa myed/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ 
125b4('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes ba myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ lus kyi
125b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ yid kyi 'dus te regapa yang yongs su shes pa myed// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen/ kyis tshor ba yang yongasasu shes pa myed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa/ 
125b6('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba yang yong su shes pa myed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang yong su shes pa myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang yong su shes pa myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pan
125b7('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba yang yongasu shes pa myed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang yongasu shes pa myed// sa'i khams kyang yong su shes pa myed/ chu'i khams kyang yongasu shes pa myed/ me'i khams kyang / 
125b8('bum): yongasu shes pa myed/ rlung gi khams kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ nam mkha'i khams kyang yongasu shes pa myed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yong su shes pa myed// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang yong su sre/ 
126a1('bum): myed// ma rig pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ 'du byed kyang yongs su shes myed/ rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ mying dang gzugs kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ skye mched drug kyang yongs su she/ 
126a2('bum): myed/ reg pa yang yong su shes pa myed/ tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa myed/ sred pa yang yongasu shes pa myed/ lend pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ srid pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ skye ba yang yongs su shes pa myed/ 
126a3('bum): rga shi yang yongs su shes pa myed// blang ba yang yongs su shes pa myed/ dor ba yang yongasu shes pa myed/ bsam gtan dang po yang yong su shes pa myed/ bsam gtan gnyis pa yang yongasasu shes pa myed bsam gtan
126a4('bum): gsum pa yang yong su shes pa myed/ bsam gtan bzhi pa yang yongs shes pa myed/ byams pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ snying rje yang yong su shes pa myed/ dga' ba yang yong su shes pa myed btang snyoms kyang yo/ 
126a5('bum): su shes pa myed/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par// 'jug pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ rnam shes mtha' yas// skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang yong su shes pa myed/ cung
126a6('bum): zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang yongs su shes pa skye da/ 'du shes med 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ sangs rgyas rje su dran pa yang yongasu
126a7('bum): shes pa myed/ chos rje su dran pa yang yongasu shes pa myed/ dge 'dun rjesu dran pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ tshul khrims rje su dran pa yang yongasu shes pa myed/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa yang yongasu shes pa myed/ lha rjes
126a8('bum): dran pa yang yongasu shes pa myed na/ skyo ba rjesu dran pa yang yongasu shes pa ma yin/ dbugs phyi nang du rtsub yang rjesu dran pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ 'chi ba rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ lus kyi/ 
126b1('bum): rnam pa rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa myed/ myi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyang yong su shes pa myed/ sdug bsngal gi 'du shes kyang yong su shes pa myed/ bdag med pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ mi sdug pa'i
126b2('bum): 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ bdag gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ sems can gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ srog gi 'du ste/

126b7('bum): myed/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ dbang po rnams kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ stobs rnams kyang yongasu shes pa myed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang yongasu shes pa myed/ 
126b8('bum): lam yang yongs su shes pa myed/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang yong su shes pa myed/ rnam
127a1('bum): par thar pa rnams kyang yongs su shes pa myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang yongs su shes pa myed/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang /

128a2('bum): zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/ dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis ni dngos po yod pa'o// myi gnyis pa ni dngos po med pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gnyis/

137a1('bum): bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas par gyur te/ 'on kyang ngas bsam gtan de dag dang bsam gton ga yon lag de dag mtshan mar bzung ste/ bsam gtan de dag gis snyems par gyur
137a2('bum): bsam gtan gi ro myong bar ma gyur/ bsam gtan du dmyigs par ma gyur te/ de ltar na bsam gtan de dag rnam pa yongs su dag pa la mnyam par gzhag go// de ltar ngas bsam gtan de dag rnam par smin par
137a3('bum): byas nas/ shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ pha rol gi sems shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ sngon
137a4('bum): gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ lha'i myig gis shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems gzhol bar bya 'on kyang ngas mngon par shes pa mngon du bya ba de dag la mtshan mar ba
137a5('bum): ste mngon par shes pa de dag gis shes par ma gyur/ ro myong bar/ ma gyur/ dmyigs par ma gyur te/ mngon par shes pa des de/ dag nas nam mkha' lta bur yang dag par rjesu dran nas mnyam par gzhag
137a6('bum): ste/ de ltar ngas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di ni sdug bsngalo/ 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sdug
137a7('bum): bsngal 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mo zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par gyur te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur/ 
137a8('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur de/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ byams pa chen po dang ldan par gyur/ snying rje chen po dang ldan par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras pa bco brgyad dang ldan nA
137b1('bum): gyur nas/ sems can rnams rung ba gsum du lung bstand par mdzad do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dngos po sa
137b2('bum): mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi desam gtan bzhi bskyed par gyur pa/ ji ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skyed par gyur pa/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs
137b3('bum): pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par gyur / ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mi 'jigs pa bzhi skyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par gyur dun ji ltar dngos
137b4('bum): ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi byams pa chen po bskyed par gyur / ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis snying rje chen po bskyed par gyur pa/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sa
137b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par gyurapa/ sems na rnams kyang sems can ma mchis par ji ltar phung po gsum du lu nga bstand par gyurapa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
137b6('bum): gal te 'dod pa rnams dang / sdig to myi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po zhig yod de/ ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am gzhan gi dngos po zhig yod na ni rab 'byor dngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i
137b7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sdig to myi dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ bsam gtan bzhi nye bar sgrubs te gnas par yang myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams
137b8('bum): dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa gzhan gi dngos po myed pa ste/ gzhan du na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/ rab 'byor de'i phyir du snor byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i rkye 'dzi
138a1('bum): ngo bo nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyang dngos po myed pa ni
138a2('bum): ngo bo nyid/ phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/ gal te bdag bla na med kyi
138a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung / gal te mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang rung ste/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa nyid la ni ci nas kyang bdag bla na
138a4('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par/ sangs rgyas par bya ste/ sems can dngos po'i 'du shes can la spyod pa thams cad dngos po med pa la rab tu 'grod par bya/ 
138a5('bum): snyam ste/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
138a6('bum): 'jug ste/ mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis nan tan du bya ba gang la bslabs shing / sngon gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs/ 
138a7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis nan tan du rtsom mo// de thog mar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul
138a8('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang pha rol tu phyin
138b1('bum): drug pa spyod do// de sbyi nang pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // phyi rol kyang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go// sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do// sems can gzhan pa
138b2('bum): sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o// de ston pa des skyid pa chen po'i tshogs thong par gyur te/ skyon dang ser sna med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byang
138b3('bum): dang / sbyind pa yongasu gtong bar byed de/ zas 'dod pa la ni zas skom 'dod pa la ni skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa la ni gos/ spos 'dod pa la ni spos/ 'phreng ba 'dod pa la ni 'dreng
138b4('bum): ba/ byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa la ni mal cha/ gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas/ mar me 'dod pa la ni mar me/ nor bu dang ni tig dang bye dur+ya dang dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang
138b5('bum): gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni nor bu dang mu tig dang bye byar+ya dang dung dang man shes rang byi ru dang gser dang dngul nas n+ya'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar de dag la rjong ba'i bar du ste/ da sbyin
138b6('bum): de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do// myi che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa rang tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po thob par byed do// de
138b7('bum): sbyin pa nga chug khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po shes rab kyi phung po rab 'thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang chub joms dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi phung po nyid kyis rnam par grong ba'i phung po rag tu thong bar byed
138b8('bum): tsun pa dang cu la khrims dang ting nge 'dzin pa shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i'i shes mthong ba'i phung porabatu thong bar byed do// de sbyin pa dang chu khrims dang / ting badzin
139a1('bum): mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang btsas spyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang po su
139a2('bum): te/ mengs rgyud gnyi tu d+ha dus/ rtog pa med pa spyod pamed pa'i ting 'dzin pal skyes pa dga' ba dang da ba can pasam gtan gnyis pa lag bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to/ draga' ba dang 'ad chags dang tha pa/ 
139a3('bum): zo dang shAmabazhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnarnams kyis dran pa dang ldan zhib bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o// zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam ga
139a4('bum): gsum pa po nye bar Angs te gnas so// bde ba yang spangs sdug pa sngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pa sa/ bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa btang snyoms dang dran pas
139a5('bum): yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso/ rab 'byor de gal te mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po zhig yo da de ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am gzhan gi dngos po zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor
139a6('bum): ngas kyang mngon pa rgyams pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par shes pa na/ 
139a7('bum): sadangos po myed do// ngo bo nyid med pa gzhan gi dngos po med pa ste/ gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon sde
139a8('bum): shes pa thams cad dngos po myed pa'i nga bo nyid du thugs su chud de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang // 
139b1('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lngas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa
139b2('bum): 'tshang rgyan/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyod pa dang / mthar kyis slob pa dang mthar kyis nan tan du bgyi/ 
139b3('bum): ba dang / gang kyis blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chug tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang skya bar 'gyur ba'i mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang mthar kyis nan tan du 'gyi ba mchis par 'gyur/ bcom
139b4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad sa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / 
139b5('bum): sangs rgyas mang po le bsnyen bkur ba'i dgra bcom pa dag dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs bdag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dngos po myed pa'i/ 
139b6('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po rnams dngos pa skyed pa'i di bo nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dngos pa myed pa'i tha nyid dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / byir mi 'ong
139b7('bum): rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'phags pa thams cad dang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
139b8('bum): 'du byed rnams kyi ngo bo nyid 'dzo chung na sgra'i rtse ma tsho shas kyi gnas tsam yang myed do// zhes bya bar thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngas ji ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dngos po myed ni
140a1('bum): dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med
140a2('bum): bar 'jug nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'a
140a3('bum): lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas mthar kyis spyod pa yin te/ 
140a4('bum): de thams cad kyang dmyigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ 
140a5('bum): bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par sku'o/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do// gzhan
140a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa de dag go legs pa brje da cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de tshul khrims des lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do// myi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed de/ 
140a7('bum): de nor myed pa'i sems can rnams la nor byin zhing / tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/ ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god de/ shes rab la rab tu 'god / rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i ye/ 
140a8('bum): shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos
140b1('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
140b2('bum): myed par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob
140b3('bum): par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'a khor lo skar ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongasu grol bar
140b4('bum): byed do// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ chen po de tshul khrims kyis mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmyig su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
140b5('bum): ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gzhan yang
140b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i legs pa brjod do// gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas/ 
140b7('bum): dga' bar spyod do// de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams sbyin pa las yongasu tshim par byed do// tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la
140b8('bum): rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang rnam par grol
141a1('bum): pa'i ye shes phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab
141a2('bum): kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas satwA/ 
141a3('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yong su smin par byas// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// chos kyi
