141a4('bum): 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la/ so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongasu grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa/ 
141a5('bum): mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 
141a6('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la rtson 'grus rtsom mo/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo// brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do// gzhan yang
141a7('bum): brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do// tshul khris
141a8('bum): la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de tshul khrims kyi phung po
141b1('bum): ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi
141b2('bum): phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug/ byang chub
141b3('bum): sems dpa'i skyond med par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyir thob par byed do// rna ba thams/ 
141b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// chos kyi 'a khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so so/ ra 'khod cing 'khor ba las yongasu grol bar byed do// rab 'byor
141b5('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'gru sa kyi mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang de myigasasu myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed// 
141b6('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang tshad myed pa dang bsam gtan dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnya
141b7('bum): bar go nog go// gzhon yang tshad med pa dang bsam gtan dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 'god do// tshad med pa dang bsam gtan dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
141b8('bum): rnams kyi legs pa brjod do// gzhan yang tshad med pa dang bsam gtan dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de tshad med pa dang bas
142a1('bum): gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la gnas shing sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed/ tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do// shes rab
142a2('bum): la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / 
142a3('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol
142a4('bum): ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugasanas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnas
142a5('bum): yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa ra byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems na/ 
142a6('bum): rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyis mthar kyis spyod pa yin te/ de thams cad
142a7('bum): kyang dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
142a8('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams sbyin pa las yongs su tshim par byed do// tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do/ shes rab la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu nang
142b1('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shos mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgrub po/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo// 
142b2('bum): bsam gtan la mnyam par gnog go/ shes rab sgom mo/ gzhan yang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go// tshul khrims la rab tu gzhog go// bzod pa la rab tu gzhog go// brtson 'grus la rab tu gzhog go// ting
142b3('bum): 'dzin la rab tu gzhog go/ shes rab la rab tu gzhog go// sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod cing / tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod do// bzod pa'i legs pa brjod do// brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do// bsam gtan gi
142b4('bum): legs pa brjod do// shes rab kyi legs pa brjod do// gzhan sbyin dpa yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims yongs su srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la
142b5('bum): mnyam par gzhog pa dang / shes rab bsgom pa de dag gi yang leg sa pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang
142b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang thabs mkhas pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las
142b7('bum): 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thos
142b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'gog cing 'khor ba las yongasu grol bar
143a1('bum): byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mthar kyis spyod pa rtsom ste/ de thams cad kyang dmig su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
143a2('bum): 'di ltar ngo bo nyid myed do// / bam po// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
143a3('bum): mthar kyis spyod pa dang mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa la slob ste/ de sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad dngos po med
143a4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed do// de sangs rgyas rje su dran pa bsgo/ ma mo/ chos rjes su dran pa bsgom mo// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom mo// tshul khrims rjesu dran pa bsgom mo// gtong ba rjesu dran pa/ 
143a5('bum): sgom mo// lha rjes su dran pa bsgom mo// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chubapa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rjes su dran pa bsgo/ pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
143a6('bum): chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs su yid la myi byed/ tshor bar yid la myi byed/ 'du shes yid la myi byed/ 'du byed du yid la myi byed/ rnam par shes par
143a7('bum): yid la myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// tshor ba la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'du shes la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang
143a8('bum): ngabanyid myed pa de ni ris po skyed pa'o// 'du byed pa ngo bo nyid myed de gangs ngo banyid myed pa dngos po myed pa'o// rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid myed de gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po myeng ba'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos sa
143b1('bum): myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa de ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rje su dran pa bsgom na/ de bzhi/ 
143b2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yid la myi byed/ sku gser gi kha dog gis yid la myi byed/ 'od 'dom gang bas yid la myi byed/ dpe' byang
143b3('bum): bzang po brgya nus yid la mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis la ngo bo nyid myed do// gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// sku gser gi kha dog la ngo bo nyid med de gang la/ 
143b4('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'od 'dom gang bas yid la myi b+hi dra/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dpe byad bas dang po brgya cu la ngo bo nyid myed de gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed/ 
143b5('bum): pa'o// dngos po med pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
143b6('bum): chen pos sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims kyi phung por yid la mi byed/ ting nge 'dzind kyi phung por yid la myi byed/ shes rab kyi
143b7('bum): kyi phung por yid la myi byed/ rnam par grol byor yid la mi byed do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung por yid la mi byed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo ban
143b8('bum): med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// shes rab kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid med de gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i phung po la ngo bo nyid med de/ 
144a1('bum): gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran pa
144a2('bum): myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rje su dran pa bsgom pa ni de bzhin gzhon
144a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yid la ma byas/ myi 'jigs pa bzhis yid la myi byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yid la myi byed/ byas
144a4('bum): pa chen pos yid la myi byed/ snying rje chen pos yid la myi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yid la myi byed// de ni de'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su/ 
144a5('bum): la ngo bo nyid myed de gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// myil jigs pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid myed de gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni da ngos po myed pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid
144a6('bum): myed de gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// byams pa chen po la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// snying rje chen po la ngo bo nyid myed de gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// / 
144a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ngo bo nyid myed de gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// gang la dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa myed cing yid la bya
144a8('bum): ba myed pa ni sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa bsgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
144b1('bum): rgyas rtend cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yid la myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ngo bo nyid myed de gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos po/ 
144b2('bum): myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pas ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i
144b3('bum): rngoT nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// de ltar na mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ 
144b4('bum): de mthar kyis spyod pa la bslab pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa dang ma thar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs
144b5('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yong su rdzog pa/ 
144b6('bum): byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed ni/ 
144b7('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid sa
145a1('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po'i myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs/ 
145a2('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
145a3('bum): kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
145a4('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed rtayang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis chos thams cad stong pani/ 
145a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyi sa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs
145a6('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo ba nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngangos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yo su rdzogs par byed / dngos do/ 
145a7('bum): par ma thad kyi rgyal kyis dngos po skyed par thob nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// das po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed/ dngos po myed pa
145a8('bum): nga nyid kyi tshuchul gyis yang dag par spong pa rnams yo su rdzogs par byed// dam pa myed pa nyid kyi tshul kyis rdzu 'phrul gnang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ngos paskyed pa ji nyid kyi tshu
145b1('bum): gyis dbang po rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yong su rdzogs
145b2('bum): bar byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// 
145b3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chu/ 
145b4('bum): gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogadas par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa/ dar thar pa brgyad yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo
145b5('bum): bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongasasu rdzogs par byed// 
145b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzind yong su rdzogs par byed/ dngos po mye
145b7('bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
145b8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa
146a1('bum): pani yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yo
146a2('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yong su rdzogs par byed do// 
146a3('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i don
146a4('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su ra rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod/ 
146a5('bum): 'du shes pa 'am dngos po med par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dra na pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am dran pa dang bral bar 'gyu/ ra ba lta ci smos/ rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ses
146a6('bum): dpa' chen pos chos rjesu dran pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba
146a7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/ chos rje su dran pa bsgom na/ dge ba'i chos yid la byed/ myi dge ba'i chos yod la mi byed/ 
146a8('bum): 'jig rten pa'i chos yid la mi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yid la mi byed/ zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zang zing med pa'i chos yid la mi byed/ 'phags pa'i chos yid la mi / 
146b1('bum): 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zag pa myed pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'dod pa'i kham su rtogs pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ gzugs kyi khasu
146b2('bum): gtogs pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ gzugs myed pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'dus byas kyi chos yid la myi byed/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos yid la myi byedado// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
146b3('bum): ltar chos de dag la ngo bo nyid myed do// gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po med pas ni dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa med cing yid la bya ba myed pa de ni chos rje su dran pa
146b4('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas chos rje su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ 
146b5('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyad pa dang mthar kyis bslab pa dang mthar kyis 'ju ga pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
146b6('bum): chen po mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed/ 
146b7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
146b8('bum): po med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med
147a1('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
147a2('bum): tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa/ 
147a3('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
147a4('bum): kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyi dang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
147a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyi da yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
147a6('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su
147a7('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
147a8('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
147b1('bum): gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yA
147b2('bum): dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs por byed do/ dngos po med pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis dbang po rnams yong su rdzogs par
147b3('bum): byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
147b4('bum): kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzog rnas par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
147b5('bum): kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams yod/ sa su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyi gzu
147b6('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad mo ngasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar
147b7('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yong su rdzogs par byed/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma/ 
147b8('bum): myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis mngon par shes pa rnams
148a1('bum): yongs su ldog par byed do// dngos po myed pa na babanyid kyi rgyal gyis ting nge 'dziding rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed / dngos po med pa'i nga ba nyid kyi rgyal gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams lang su rdzogs par byed/ 
148a2('bum): dngas po myed pa zacang kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs bcu yong sa rdzogs par byed do/ dngas po med pa'i nga nyid kyi tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa pa ni yas su rdzogs par byed / dam po med pa'i sa te
148a3('bum): kyi chub phyis so so yang dag par rig pa pa ni yongs su thogs par byed do/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yong su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa nga ba nyid kyi tshul gyis ga'i rjechen po la / 
148a4('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rgyal gyis sangs rgya ngas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ das po skyed pa ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa'i
148a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis la ma gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
148a6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ 
148a7('bum): dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am dran pa dang bral bar gyur pa lta ci smos// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun rje su dran pa bsgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la
148a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thos
148b1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/ dge 'dun rje su dran pa bsgom ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba phun sum chogs
148b2('bum): ba'i skyes bu zung bzhi dang skyes bu gang zag ya brgyad po de dag dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po
148b3('bum): pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos tha
148b4('bum): cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas dge 'dun rjesu dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa/ 
148b5('bum): yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis 'jug pa/ 'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab ba
148b6('bum): dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bye da // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi
148b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
148b8('bum): phyind pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
149a1('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pani
149a2('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid
149a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
149a4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs rdza bar byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las la dngas pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngos
149a5('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs/ par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
149a6('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dang sa po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gyis rang ni
149a7('bum): mtshan nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed byu skye po nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs
149a8('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
149b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i dzin
149b2('bum): kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongasu
149b3('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs
149b4('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i ba/ den pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed/ 
149b5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byedado// 
149b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
149b7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo na nyid kyi tshul gyis smon sa
149b8('bum): myed par tong nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yong su rdzog patsun
150a1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po/ 
150a2('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
150a3('bum): byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
150a4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyi das thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po mi da pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs/ 
150a5('bum): par byed do// rnam po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni dru ngas/ po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ 
150a6('bum): de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am dngos po med par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so
150a7('bum): dpa' chen po tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
150a8('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas tshul khrims rje su dran pa bsgom zhing mi bral ba ma zhig pa/ ma 'dris pa/ skyon myedapa/ 
150b1('bum): mnyams pa mthu dang ldan pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa shin tu rdzogs pa ting nge 'dzin yongasu bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa yin te/ tshul khrims de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la bye'o// de ci'i
150b2('bum): phyir zhe na de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed
150b3('bum): pa ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ tshul khrims rje su
150b4('bum): dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mtha dar gyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis 'jug pa yod pa yin te/ 
150b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyod/ pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob cing / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i
150b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu
150b7('bum): phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rolatu
150b8('bum): byind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs
151a1('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed kyi/ 
151a2('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don
151a3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yos
151a4('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dmatha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
151a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chu la gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid
151a6('bum): yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yo su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yo su rdzogs pa
151a7('bum): byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rgyal gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed
151a8('bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngobo nyi
151b1('bum): kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tshul
151b2('bum): gyis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongasu
151b3('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongasu
151b4('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phru dgas pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su
151b5('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa 'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
151b6('bum): rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ 
151b7('bum): dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
151b8('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ das pa skyed pa'i ba nyid kyi tshul gyis smod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ dngos po myed pa ngo ba nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams pa / 
152a1('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ 
152a2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i
152a3('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying
152a4('bum): rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po'i myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thos cang / 
152a5('bum): shes pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rna ba thams cad
152a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang mye/ 
152a7('bum): dan dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos// rab 'byor daji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong brjesu dran pa bsgom pa yin ne na/ rab tsho
152a8('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos cung kyi
152b1('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas gtong ba rje su dran pa bsgom zhing / gang zang zing gtong ba dang chos gtong ba yid la myi byed de/ de yan lag dang nying lag yongasu gtong na dngos po gzhan lta ci smos/ de ltar sbyin/ 
152b2('bum): yongs su gtong yang 'di ltar bdag ni sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba'o// dngos po 'di gtong ba'o// 'di la bting bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la dngos po de dag la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang
152b3('bum): la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni gtong ba rje su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar
152b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po nga myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ngas gtong ba rje su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
152b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis 'jug pa'i ma yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar
152b6('bum): kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang mthar kyis 'jug pa la slob pas dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po skyed pa'i ngo
152b7('bum): bo nyid kyi tshul gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
152b8('bum): tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yong su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa ngo bo nyid kyi tshul ni
153a1('bum): shes rab kyi rol mund pa yongs su rdzogs par byedado// dngas po myeng bzang banying gargyal gyis dang spong panying yongs su rdzogs par byed/ dum pa skyed parna da kyi rgyal gyis rgyan/ 
153a2('bum): ma nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshurgyal gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// 
153a3('bum): ngos po myed pang ba nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dam pa srid pa'i ba nyid kyi rdul gyis de das pa stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po skyed pa'i ngo ba nyid kyi nus gyis / 
153a4('bum): byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i dbo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong/ 
153a5('bum): ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid tu tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs pa skye do// dngos po myeng ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa
153a6('bum): nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhini stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// 
153a7('bum): po myed pa'i ngo ba nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yo su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo ba nyid kyi chu
153a8('bum): gyimi dngos po myed pa ngo ba nyid kyi tshul gyis dngas pa srid pa stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po skyed pa'i ngob nyid kyi tshul gyis ji nyid stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bonyid kyi
153b1('bum): gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 
153b2('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs
153b3('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos
153b4('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
153b5('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis na/ dmyed pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i
153b6('bum): nga ba nyid kyi nule gyis gzugs skyed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po skyed pa'i ngo ba nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa skyed/ 
153b7('bum): dngos po myed pa ji banyid kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yo su rdzogs
153b8('bum): par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo ba nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma'i ting nge 'dzin yongasu rdzogs par byed de/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzinang yongs su rdzogs par byed/ 
154a1('bum): gdangos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i
154a2('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi/ 
154a3('bum): tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis so so yang dag par rig pa bani yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams
154a4('bum): ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
154a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam par shes
154a6('bum): pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs/ 
154a7('bum): par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang mye na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ rab 'byor/ 
154a8('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha rje su dran pa sgom zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyis/ 
154b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas lha rje su dran pa sgom ste/ rgyal chen bzhi'i
154b2('bum): ris kyi lhar skye ba dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pa dang / mtshe ma'i lhar skyes pa dang / dga' ldan gi ltar skyes pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lhar skyes pa dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skyes pa dang / 
154b3('bum): gzugs na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i phyir myi 'ong ba de dag dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid myed do// gang la ngo bo nyid
154b4('bum): myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa ni dngos po// myed pas dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di daltar dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni lha rje su dran pa'o// 
154b5('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas lha rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ 
154b6('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
154b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs/ 
154b8('bum): par byed de/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs
155a1('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i nga bo nyid kyi tshul gis bsam gtan gyis
155a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang du/ 
155a3('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs
155a4('bum): bar byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sto/ pa nyid stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po me dad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs
155a5('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don de pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
155a6('bum): bar byed do// dngos po myeng ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par
155a7('bum): byed do// dngas po med po ning ba nyid kyi tshul gyis thog mo dang tham myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yo su rdzogs pa
155a8('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
155b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
155b2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
155b3('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa/ 
155b4('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis yang dag par nga spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongasasu rdzog
155b5('bum): bar byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis dbang / po rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyad kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed do// 
155b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gos 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongasu rdzogs par bya
155b7('bum): dngos po myod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po// 
155b8('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
156a1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs pa/ 
156a2('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed
156a3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
156a4('bum): gyis ting nge 'dzind rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzo dgas par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin ga
156a5('bum): pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis so so yang dag par rig
156a6('bum): pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i
156a7('bum): btsuny-i kyi tshul gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshu lo gas la
156a8('bum): gi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po myong pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs
156b1('bum): par 'chang bya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am dngos pa skyed par 'du shes pa yang mye dang/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yod pa'am dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba ltaci smos// rang 'byor dag nan yang bya cu
156b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rolapa tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis spyad pa dang mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yongs su
156b3('bum): rdzogs par 'dod pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul
156b4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
156b5('bum): la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam ga/ tan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po mye/ byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yo bslab
156b6('bum): par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid la busgrub par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid la ba slab par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa
156b7('bum): nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
156b8('bum): gyis don das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// 
157a1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'ad la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
157a2('bum): la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngos
157a3('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis myi
157a4('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
157a5('bum): bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dang / sa po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la
157a6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
157a7('bum): la bslab par byag/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi/ 
157a8('bum): tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lago rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam la bslab par bya'o// dngos po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sra
157b1('bum): bar bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul/ 
157b2('bum): gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis
157b3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed
157b4('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnam
157b5('bum): la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i rngo na/ nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bya'o// 
157b6('bum): rangs pa skyed pa'i ba ba nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brtul bsrub par bya'o// dngos po myed pa ngo ba nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bani la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myong ba nga ba nyi
157b7('bum): tshus phyin sa so yang dag par ga pa ba ni la bsrung par bya'o// das paspyod pa ring ba nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pachen po la bsgrub par byay-i/ dam po srid pa'i tshul gis snying rje chen po la bsgrub par bya/ 
157b8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i rib nyid kyi rdul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo banyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes panyid la bslab par bya'o// dam pa byed pa
158a1('bum): kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dang / 
158a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po ches thams cad dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis spyang ba yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sdes
158a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pa
158a4('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs
158a5('bum): bar byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs
158a6('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
158a7('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa
158a8('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po/ 
158b1('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
158b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa
158b3('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhini stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su
158b4('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myi da pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
158b5('bum): bar byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po rgya/ da pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa/ 'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed/ 
158b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chu la gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// 
158b7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i
158b8('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yong su rdzogs par byang ngo / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag nas
159a1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa
159a2('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rna myi ma ngo tshad myed pa rje yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
159a3('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngazan/ 
159a4('bum): kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i/ 
159a5('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzog sa par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon/ skye pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed/ 
159a6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyis
159a7('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs
159a8('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yong su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
159b1('bum): kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes
159b2('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
159b3('bum): byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yang myed na/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam rnam par shes pa'o// / 
159b4('bum): myig gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am ta lce 'amalus sam ta yid da da ma// gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ myig gyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa/ 
159b5('bum): 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am sna'i 'dus
159b6('bum): te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i
159b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg rna ba'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am// sa'i khams sa
159b8('bum): chu'i khams sam/ myi'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam rnam par shes pa'i khams sam// ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mying dang gzugs sam/ 
160a1('bum): skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
160a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ 
160a3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
160a4('bum): dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs
160a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong / 
160a6('bum): rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams som/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bdenapa
160a7('bum): rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad skyed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
160a8('bum): sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo
160b1('bum): rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'am/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam lam gyi
160b2('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ yod par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes yod par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/ de ni gnas myed do// de skad ces
160b3('bum): bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ 'o na ni
160b4('bum): gzugs kyang ma mchis tshor ba yang ma mchis/ 'du shes kyang dam mchis/ 'du byed kyang ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa yang ma/ dmachis/ khams kyang ma mchis skye mched kyang ma mchis
160b5('bum): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang ma mchis/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag kyang ma mchis// pha rol tu phyin pa rna sa kyang ma mchis/ stong pa nyid thams cad kyang ma mchis// 
160b6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang ma mchis/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ dbang po rnams kyang ma mchis stobs rnams kyang ma mchis/ 
160b7('bum): byang chud kyi yan lag rnams kyang ma mchis/ lam yang ma mchis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ bsam gtan rnams kyang ma mchis/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ gzugs rtse/ 
160b8('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
161a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang ma mchis/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang ma mchis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma mchis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
161a2('bum): stobs rnams kyang ma mchis/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ byams pa chen po'ang ma mchis/ snying rje chen po yang ma mchis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
161a3('bum): pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang ma mchis/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang ma mchis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang ma mchis/ sangs rgyas kyang ma mchis
161a4('bum): chos kyang ma mchis/ dge 'dun kyang ma mchis/ lam yang ma ma chis/ 'bras bu yang ma mchis/ nyon mongs pa yang ma mchis rnam par byang ba yang ma mchis/ thob pa yang ma mchis mngon par rtog/ 
161a5('bum): pa yang ma mchis/ chos thams cad kyang ma mchis pa lags/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du se mas/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la yod pa'ang myed
161a6('bum): pa zhig yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la ma mchis pa myi dmyig so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
161a7('bum): rab 'byor 'o na ci'i phyir khyod de ltar gal te/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na// gzugs kyang myed/ tshor ba 'ang myed/ 'du shes kyang myed 'du byed kyang myed/ rnam par shes pa 'ang myed// myig kyang
161a8('bum): myed/ rna bu yang myed/ sna yang myed/ lce yang myed/ lus kyang myed/ yid kyang myed// gzugs kyang myed// sgra yang myed/ dri yang myed ro yang myed/ reg kyang myed chos kyang myed dmyig gi rnam par shes pa yang myed/ 
161b1('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang med/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yang myed/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang myed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang myed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang myed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang myed/ rna ba'i 'dus/ 
161b2('bum): reg pa yong myong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang myed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang myed// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang myed/ rna ba'i 'dus
161b3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang myed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myed/ yid kyi 'dus te re
161b4('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myed// sa'i khams kyang myed/ chu'i khams kyang myed/ mye'i khams kyang myed/ rlung gi khams kyang myed/ nam mkha'i khams kyang myed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang myed/ 
161b5('bum): ma rig pa yang myed/ 'du byed kyang myed/ rnam par shes pa yang myed/ mying dang gzugs kyang myed/ skye mched drug kyang myed/ re rtag pa yang myed/ tshor ba yang myed/ sred pa yang myed len pa yang myed/ 
161b6('bum): srid pa yang myed/ skye ba myed/ rga shi yang myed// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang myed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang myed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang myed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang
161b7('bum): myed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang myed// nang stong pa nyid kyang myed/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang myed/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang myed/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
161b8('bum): kyang myed/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang myed/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang myed/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang myed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang myed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang myed/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
161'a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang myed/ dor ba myed pa ste nga ba nyid kyang myed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang med/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang myed/ rang gi mtshan nyid
161'a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang myed/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang med/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myed/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myed/ dran pa
161'a3('bum): bar gzhag pa rnaMs kyang myed/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang med/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnaMs kyang med/ dbang po rnams kyang med/ stobs rjes kyang med byang chub kyi yan lag rnaMs kyang med/ 'phags pa'i lam yan/ 
161'a4('bum): lag brgyad pa yang myed/ 'phagras pa'i bden pa rnams kyang myed/ bsam gtan rnams kyang myed/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang myed/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang myed/ 
161'a5('bum): rnam par thard pa rnams kyang myed/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug po rnams kyang myed/ rnam par tha rad ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
161'a6('bum): smon pa myed pa yang myed/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang myed/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang myed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang myed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang myed
161'a7('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang myed/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang med/ byams pa chen po yang myed/ snying rje chen po yang med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnas kyang myed/ thams
161'a8('bum): cad shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang myed/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang myed/ rnam pa thas cad mikhye nad pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang med sangs rgyas kyang myed/ chos kyang myed/ dge 'dun
161'b1('bum): yang myed/ lam yang myed/ 'bras bu yang myed/ nyon mongs pa yang myed/ rnam par byang ba yang myed/ 'thob pa yang myed/ mngon par rtogs pa yang myed/ chos thams cad myed do zhes bya bar sos
161'b2('bum): par 'gyur/ rab 'byord kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos 'di dag la nem nur ma mchis/ the tsom yang ma mchis te/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ma byung ba'i dus na/ dge slong
161'b3('bum): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ byang chub seMs dpa'i theg pa pa 'di dag 'di skad du gal te chos thas cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dngos po myed
161'b4('bum): pa la su zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhes mchi zhing / de dag kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma 'tshal pas/ tshul khrims log par 'gyur/ lta ba log
161'b5('bum): par 'gyur/ spyod pa log par 'gyur/ 'tsho ba log/ par 'gyur te/ tshul khrims log par gyu red pa dang / lta ba/ log par gyur pa dang / spyod pa log par gyu rad pa dang / 'tsho/ 
161'b6('bum): ba log par gyur pa de dag sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol seng gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi ngan song gsum las gcig tu'i tsho bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
161'b7('bum): bdag gis ma byung ba'i 'jigs pa de mthong na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don de zhu ba lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos 'di la nem nur
161'b8('bum): ram/ the tsom ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ rab 'byor legs so// legs so// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de de bzhin no// 
162a1('bum): bam pa brgyad pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas/ 
162a2('bum): to/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ don ci zhig mthong zhing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
