229a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las phyir myi ldog go// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa las phyir myi ldog go// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa las phyir myi ldog go// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa las
229a4('bum): phyir myi ldog go// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las phyir myi ldog go// de la pha rol tu phyinang pa drug po de dag la gnas shing / bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshad myed
229a5('bum): pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyom sa par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// yang dag
229a6('bum): par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub kyi
229a7('bum): yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa
229a8('bum): byed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
229b1('bum): byed do// 'du byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// thog ma
229b2('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
229b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa
229b4('bum): byed do/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
229b5('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzinang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// / smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind yongs su rdzogs par byed/ do// rnam par tha da pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
229b6('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzu gas par byed do// mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed
229b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// myi 'jug
229b8('bum): pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongasu rdzogs par byed/ 
230a1('bum): de 'phags pa'i chos byang ba 'jig rtend las 'das pa/ thun mong ma yin pa rnam par smin pa las byung ba rnams la gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed
230a2('bum): dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stonang pa dag gi drung du rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dngagazims cha
230a3('bum): spyand kyi rkye nad sman dang / yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de/ longs spyod dang skying ba thams cad kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// de na sems can gang sbyin pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang sbyin
230a4('bum): pas yongs su sdud do// gang tshul khrims kyis yongs su smra da pa de dag kyang tshul khrims kyis yongs su sdud ngo // gang bzod pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang bzod pas yongs su sdud do// 
230a5('bum): gang brtson 'grus kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang brtson 'gro/ nyes kyis yongs su sdung ngo // gang ting nge 'dzind kyis yongs su bsdud ba de dag kyang ting nge 'dzind kyis yongs su sdungad ngo // gang de shes
230a6('bum): rab kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang shes rab kyis rol tu phyin yongs su sdung ngo // gang nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu pa de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su srung ngo // gang phyi stong pa nyid
230a7('bum): kyis yongs su bsdu sa de dag kyang po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su stong ngo // gang byinang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang phri nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su srung / gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yong
230a8('bum): bsdu ba de dag kyang snying pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdung ngo // gang chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su srung ngo // gang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yong su bsdun
230b1('bum): de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud/ gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su// 
230b2('bum): bsdu ba de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang thog ma dang tha ma
230b3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su snang ngo // gang ra
230b4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu
230b5('bum): sdud do// gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bsdu/ ba de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdu nyid do// gang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag
230b6('bum): kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdud do// gang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
230b7('bum): yongs su sdu ba de dag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// 
230b8('bum): gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su srung ngo // gang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang yang dag par spong ba nas
231a1('bum): kyis yongs su sdud do// gang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu sdud do// gang dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dgang
231a2('bum): po rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang stobs rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang stobs rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang byang chub
231a3('bum): kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang lam gyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang lam gyis yongs su sdud do// gang 'phag sa pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang 'phags
231a4('bum): bden pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su slu ba de dag kyang bsam gtan rnams/ kyis yongs su sdud do// gang tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongasu bsdu ba
231a5('bum): de dag kyang tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang gzu gas myed pa'i snyoms par 'khrug pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su
231a6('bum): sdud do/ gang rnam par tha rang pa'i rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba
231a7('bum): de dag kyang mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rnam par
231a8('bum): tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pas yongs su sdud do// gang mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang ting nge
231b1('bum): badzin rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnarnams kyis yongs su srung ngo / gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su srud du/ 
231b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang myi 'jigs
231b3('bum): pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su sdung ngo // gang byams pa chen pos yongs su
231b4('bum): bsdu ba de dag kyang byams pa chen pos yongs su sdud do// gang snying rje chen pos yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su sdud do// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yongasu
231b5('bum): bsdu ba de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yo ngas su sdud do// gang rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yo// ngas su bsdu ba de dag kyang rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yongs
231b6('bum): sdud do// gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras dus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su sdud do// gang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang phyir myi 'o
231b7('bum): ba'i 'bras bus yongs su sdud do// gang dag bcom pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang rang byang chub kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rang byang chub kyis
231b8('bum): yongs su bsdud do// gang lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag
232a1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// de ltar gang dang gang dge ba'i chos gang gis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dge ba'i chos de dang de dag gis yongs su sdud do// de dge ba'i rtsa/ 
232a2('bum): pa de dag dang ldan zhing chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas 'khor ba nye bar lend kyang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gis gos te/ de sems can rnams kyi don du mying dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa nye bar lend te/ phun sum
232a3('bum): tshogs pa de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su sdud do// des chos thams cad mtshan nyid myed par shes pas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la myi gnas so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang
232a4('bum): de la myi gnas so phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la myi dganas so// dgra bcom pa nyid shes kyang de la myi gnas so// rang byang chub shes kyang de la myi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
232a5('bum): de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad mtshan nyid myed par shes par bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir/ 
232a6('bum): te/ rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mtshan nyid myed par shes pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan nyid myed par shes so/ tshul khrims kyi pha
232a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa mtshan nyid myed par shes so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa mtshan nyid myed par shes so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan nyid myed par shes so// bsam gtan gi pha rol
232a8('bum): phyinang pa mtshan nyid myed par shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan nyid myed par shes so// nang stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// phyi stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid
232b1('bum): mtshan nyid myed par shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// chen po stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// don dam pa stong pa nyid myed par shes so/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
232b2('bum): mtshan nyid myed par shes so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed par shes
232b3('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan
232b4('bum): nyid myed par shes so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed par shes so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// 
232b5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// 
232b6('bum): 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// dbang po rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// stobs rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan nyid myed par
232b7('bum): shes so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan nyid myed par shes so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// bsam gtan rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so/ tshad myed/ 
232b8('bum): pa rnams mtshan nyid byed par shes so/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid byed par shes so// rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i rnaman
233a1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa mtshan nyid myed par shes so// mngon par shes pa
233a2('bum): rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// ting nge 'dzind rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan nyid
233a3('bum): myed par shes so// myi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// byams pa chen po mtshan nyid myed par shes so// snying rje chen po
233a4('bum): mtshan nyid myed par shes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid myed par shes so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
233a5('bum): 'bras bu mtshan nyid myed par shes so// phyir myi 'ong // ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid myed par shes so// dgra bcom pa/ nying mtshan nyid myed par shes so// rang byang chub mtshan nyid myed par/ 
233a6('bum): shes so// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mtshan nyid myong bar shes so// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs/ 
233a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar le nang pa'i phung po lnga la gnas na sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bar lenang pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ smyig rgyu la
233a8('bum): nye bar le nad pa'i phung po lnga la gnasachu zla lte bu'i nye bar le nang pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ myig yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i nye bar le nad pa'i phung
233b1('bum): lnga la gnas/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas
233b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang nye bar le nang pa'i phung po lnga la rmi lam lta bur shes so// nye bar lenan
233b3('bum): pa'i phung po lnga la sgyu ma lta bur shes so// nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la smig rgyu lta bur shes/ nye bar len du pa'i phung po lnga chu zla lta bur shes/ nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga myig yor lta bur shes/ 
233b4('bum): nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga sgra brnyan lta bur shesanye bar len pa'i phung po lnga gzugs brnyan lta bur shes/ nye b.ralend pa'i phung po lnga dri za'i grong khyer lta bur shes/ nye bar lend pa'i
233b5('bum): phung po lnga sprulang pa lta bur shes nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan nyid myed pa/ ma zhig pa/ ma ral pa/ smond pa myed pa/ rnyog pa myed pa/ nyams pa myed pa/ dbang du
233b6('bum): gyu rang ba mkhas pas bsngags pas/ shin du brdzogs pa 'phags par gyur pa/ zag pa myed pa/ lam gi khongs su chung sa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ 
233b7('bum): de la gnas shing yang dag par blang ba'i brda' dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims dang / sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / dmyigs pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyad pa'i tshul khri
233b8('bum): dang myi spyad pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo // de la tshul khrims de lta bu dang ldan yang 'dis bdag rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal pa mnyam pa 'am/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyan
234a1('bum): pa 'am/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal pa mnyam par skye bar bya'ozhe'am/ rgyal phran nam/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bar bya'o zhe 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnam
234a2('bum): dang bskal pa mnyam par skye bar bya'o/ 'am sum su rdzu gsus ma mtshom 'am/ dga' ldan nas 'phrul dga' 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang bskal ba mnyam par smra bar bya ni/ 
234a3('bum): rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o zhe'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub dam/ byang chub thob par bya'o zhes
234a4('bum): tshul khrims des bsnyems pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid myed pa sto/ 'di lta dzar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid gcig pas na/ mtshan nyid/ 
234a5('bum): myed pa'i chos kyis mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos thob par myi ru 'o// mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i te chos thob par myi rung ngo // mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am mtshan nyid myed/ 
234a6('bum): pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/ mtshan nyid myed ba'i chos kyis thob par myi rung ngo // rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyo
234a7('bum): cing nga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan nyid myed pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug pa'i tshod myi skye/ 
234a8('bum): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par smind pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thob nas/ gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo lnga
234b1('bum): brgyal gnas te/ so so yang dag par rig pa pa'i thob pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen 'akur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can rna/ 
234b2('bum): kyang yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to// de 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba yang 'khor ba'i las rnam par smin pas gos par myi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar dper na sprul dbu ni 'gro ba
234b3('bum): 'dug pa 'am/ nyal bar byed kyang de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba 'am hA 'dug pa 'am nyal ba yang myi dmyigs te/ de sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed do// sems can dang sems can du btags pa yang myi
234b4('bum): dmyigs so/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shi nang tu zhi ba zhes bya ba bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
234b5('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khol lo bskor te/ sems can tshad myed pa theg pa gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / gang bla na myed pa
234b6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu gang yang ma gzigs nas des tshe'i 'du byed spang sa nas/ sprul pa sprul pa mdzad de phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
234b7('bum): 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so// rab 'byor de ltar na sprul pa des bskal pa gcig lon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
234b8('bum): bstan te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ dngos po ga
235a1('bum): yang dmigs su myed do// rab 'byarang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can nas sems can du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs la sems can kyi don kyang byed do
235a2('bum): 'byor de lta na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i mi mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pa ri mang tu sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed / dmongs su rdzom
235a3('bum): pas mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos thams cad khong du chud par shes so// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmyi lam lta bu'i nye bar zhe
235a4('bum): pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu ngas da sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar le nad pa'i phung po lnga la gnas te/ man
235a5('bum): nyid myed pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams la gnas shi
235a6('bum): bzod pa de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i bzo pa'i bye brag yin no// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas
235a7('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zild kyis gnon te/ de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i myi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod cing / lam gi rnam pa shes
235a8('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de yongs su rdzogs pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzinang rnams dang myi 'bral ba yin/ 
235b1('bum): de mngon par shes pa lnga dang myi bral ba yin/ de mngon par shes pa rnams dang myi bral bas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin/ de sems can rnam/ 
235b2('bum): yongs su smin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/ skad gcig cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems ngas
235b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
235b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshedarmi lam lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ smra ba rnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta
235b5('bum): bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar le nad pa'i phung po lnga la gnas na/ nga / lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus brtsom mo/ des lus kyi brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub ste/ phyogs dang phye/ 
235b6('bum): mtshams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gi khams dag tu song nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sems can rnams kyi don byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// 
235b7('bum): dede lus kyi brtson 'grus des sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ theg pa gsum la 'jug cing rab tu 'god do// rab 'byorarang de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da// 
235b8('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe mtshan nyid myed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de sems kyi brtson 'grus kyi zag pa myed pa lam gi yan lag tu gyur ba lam gi khongs su gyur pas
236a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa gang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba ba ni nga rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang spobs
236a2('bum): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo gsum dang / bsam gtan bani dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang gzugs
236a3('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag pa
236a4('bum): rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sa ngas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su 'dus pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la spyod cing byang chub sems dpa'
236a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// 
236a6('bum): bgachags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad smras nas/ mnan phun sus tshugs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// kun tu snang ba tho' par byas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyangs
236a7('bum): du bskar ba bskor bar 'gyur ro// de bskor bas stong gsum gi sang chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams rnam pa drun tu g.yos pa dang / rab tu g.yas pa dang / kun nas g.yas pa dang / 'grel ba dang / rab tu
236a8('bum): 'gul ba dang / kun nas 'gul ba dang ldeg pa dang / rab tu ldeg pa dang / kun nas ldeg par 'gyur te/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang
236b1('bum): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sgra gang du byung zhing dbyangs grag par 'gyur ba'i sgra de/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems
236b2('bum): can gang ji snyed kyis thob pa de thams cad theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da de ltar phan pa chen po dang ldan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
236b3('bum): pa ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob pa
236b4('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta/ 
236b5('bum): bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta/ bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gan/ nyes shing / ting nge 'dzi nad kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par
236b6('bum): byed do/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu da
236b7('bum): myog yor lnga bu dang sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyal bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin kyi pha rolang du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la spyod ba tshe/ skye lam
236b8('bum): lta bu'i bar yin pa'i phung ba lnga la gnas/ sgra banan lta bungs myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyal bu dang / sprul ba lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po la gnas shing 'i ting nge 'dzin kyi
237a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan
237a2('bum): gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bas gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// byams pa chen po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// snying rje la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// dga' ba la nye bar
237a3('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// btang snyoms la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas stor rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 
237a4('bum): cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'du/ shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gan nyes so// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i
237a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind sgom mo// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind sgom mo// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzinang ma gtogs par nyan thos
237a6('bum): dang / thun mong ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang thun mong ba'i ting nge 'dzin da gang ji snyed pa dang / gzhan yang ting nge 'dzi nad dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lus kyi khyab par byas shing / 
237a7('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas kyang ting nge 'dzin de dag dang / stong par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i ro myong bar yang myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ ting nge 'dzin
237a8('bum): de dag gi mtshan nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pas na/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed par yang ga la 'gyur ba dngos po myed pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos
237b1('bum): po myed pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed par ga la 'gyur/ de ro myong bar byed pa myed pas/ ting nge 'dzinang gang gi dbang gyis kyang gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i khams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na
237b2('bum): 'di ltar des khams de gnyis kyang myi dmyigs/ gang snyoms par 'jug pa de yang myi dmyigs so// de myi dmyigs pas/ mtshan ma nyid myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ting nge
237b3('bum): 'dzind kyi pha rol tu phyind pa des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzind kyi pha rol
237b4('bum): tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da' ba lags/ bcom da ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems
237b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nang stong pa nyid la shi nang tu bslabs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la shi nang tu bslabs pa dang / phyinang stong pa nyid la shinang tu bslabs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la
237b6('bum): shinang tu bslabs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la shinang tu bslabs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la shinang tu bslabs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslabs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la shin
237b7('bum): tu bslabs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la shi nang tu bslabs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la shinang tu bslabs pa dang / dor ba myed po stong pa nyid la shinang tu bslabs pa dang / rang bzhin ste/ 
237b8('bum): pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la shi nang tu bslabs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la shi nang tu bslabs pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la shinang tu bslabs pa dang / dngos po
238a1('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid la shi nang tu bslabs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la shi nang tu bslabs pa'i phyir te/ stong pa nyid 'di dag ni rgyu nang tu zhugs
238a2('bum): pa pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam te rang byang chub bam/ gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang myi dmyigs te/ rnam
238a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya bar de yang stong pa nyid rnams kyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su shi nang
238a4('bum): tu 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyonang myed par 'jug go// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon ni gang lags/ skyon ma mchis pa ni gang lags
238a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da dmyigs pa/ thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon/ no/ myi dmyigs pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
238a6('bum): myed pa'o// gsolang pa da bcom ldan 'das dmyigs pa ni gang la chags/ myi dmyigs pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa te rab 'byorang gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa'
238a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// rab 'byor da tshor ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// rab 'byor 'du shes ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs
238a8('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor 'du byed ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// myig dang gzugs ni
238b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// rna ba dang sgra ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// sna dang dri ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs
238b2('bum): pa'o// lce dang ro ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// lus dang reg bya ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// yid dang chos ni byang chub sems pa
238b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa ni dmyigs pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni dmyigs pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni dmyigs pa'o/ rnaba'i
238b4('bum): rnam par shes pa ni dmyigs pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni dmyi gas pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni dmyi rdzogs pa'o// sna'i rnam pa shes pa ni dmyigs pa'o// sna'i lu
238b5('bum): te reg pa ni dmyigs pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis / tshor ba ni dmyigs pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni dmyig/ nyes pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni dmyigs pa'i/ skye'i
238b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni dmyigs pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni dmyigs pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni dmyi gas pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te rtseg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni
238b7('bum): dmyigs pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni dmyigs pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni dmyigs pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni dmyigs pa'o// sa'i khams ni dmyigs pa'o/ 
238b8('bum): chu'i khams ni dmyigs pa'o// me'i khams ni dmyigs pa'o// rlung gi khams ni dmyigs pa'o// nam mkha'i khams ni dmyigs pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni dmyigs pa'o// ma rig pa ni dmyigs
239a1('bum): pa'o// 'du byed ni dmyigs pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni dmyigs pa'o// mying dang gzugs ni dmyigs pa'o// skye mched drug ni dmyigs pa'o// reg pa ni dmyigs pa'o// tshor ba ni dmyigs
239a2('bum): pa'o// sred pa ni dmyigs pa'o// len pa ni dmyigs pa'o// srid pa ni dmyigs pa'o// skye ba ni dmyigs pa'o// rga shi ni dmyigs pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni dmyigs pa'o// tshul khrims
239a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dmyigs pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni dmyigs pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dmyigs pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dmyigs pa
239a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dmyigs pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni dmyigs po/ 
239a5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// mtha' las 'das
239a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// chos thams cad stong
239a7('bum): nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// 
239a8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// dbang / 
239b1('bum): po rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// stobs rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag ni dmyigs pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dmyigs pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa/ 
239b2('bum): rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// bsam gtan rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad
239b3('bum): dmyigs pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni dmyigs pa'o// rnam par tha rang pa'i stong pa nyid dang mtsha nam myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni dmyigs pa'o// mngon par shes
239b4('bum): pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// ting nge 'dzinang rnams ni dmyigs/ pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dmyigs pa'o// myi 'jigs pa
239b5('bum): bzhi ni dmyigs pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dri myi gas pa'o// byams pa chen po ni dmyigs pa'o// snying rje chen po ni dmyigs pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni byi/ 
239b6('bum): pa'i/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dmyigs pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dmyigs pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dmyigs pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// rang byang chub ni dmyi
239b7('bum): pa'o// lam ga rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'i smon no// rab 'byor skyon myed pa ni gang la gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed pa
239b8('bum): rnam par shes pa dgang kyi dang / rna ba dang / swA dang / lce dang / lus dang yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang dr-i dang / ro dang / rog dang / chos dang // phyag gi rnam par shes pa dang / na pa'i rnam pa
240a1('bum): pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / 
240a2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / 
240a3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / sa'i khams dang / chu'i
240a4('bum): khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye
240a5('bum): mched drug dang / reg pa dang 'tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / lend pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol da tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod
240a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang
240a7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyi
240a8('bum): dang thog ma pang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong
240b1('bum): nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul
240b2('bum): gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam/ 
240b3('bum): gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par
240b4('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stog/ 
240b5('bum): bcu dang myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par ri ga pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po da nying / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang rgyun / 
240b6('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / ring byang chub dang / lam go rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams
240b7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / chos de dag gi brjod pa yang dmyigs su myed pa'o// // shes rab dum bu bcu gsum pa// 
240b8('bum): bam po / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myong ba de ni brjod du myed pa'o// tshor ba la
241a1('bum): bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed par de ni brjod du myed pa'o// 'du shes la rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// 'du byed la rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin spyod/ 
241a2('bum): pag pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// myig la rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin myed pa ni brjod du med pa'o// rna ba la rang bzhin gyi/ 
241a3('bum): de gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// sna la rang bzhin med de gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// lcel rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// lus
241a4('bum): la rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin myed par de ni brjod du myed pa'o// yid la rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du/ na myed pa'o// gzugs la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin
241a5('bum): myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// sgra la rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// dri la rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// ro la rang bzhin myed de/ 
241a6('bum): gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// reg rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// chos la rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du med pa'o/ myig gi rnam
241a7('bum): par shes pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin myed
241a8('bum): de gang sa rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du med pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin med de gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod
241b1('bum): myed pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin myed pa deng ni brjod du myed pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// rna ba'i
241b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang ma rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rang bzhin myed de/ rang la rang bzhin skyed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// lce'i 'dus te rig pa la ra can
241b3('bum): gas ban myong ba na btsung myed par// lus kyi dus te dag pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin sna pa ni brjod du med pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te ga pal rang bzhin byed nga/ ga
241b4('bum): bzhin med pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa mi na kyis tshor ba la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhini myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis chos
241b5('bum): pal rang bzhin med de/ gangs rang bzhin byed pa ni brjod du ro// sna'i dus te reg pa'i sbyind kyis tshor ba la rang du ni myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjid du med pa'o/ 'i
241b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyenang kyis tshor bas rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du med pa
241b7('bum): yi kyi sa tu ga pa'i rkyen kyim tshor bu la rang bzhin myed de/ gangasa'ang bzhin myeng pa deni brjod du myed pa'o// sa'i khams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la 'ang bzhin myed pa de ni brjid du sred pa'i rnam
241b8('bum): la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// mye'i khams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// rlung gi khams rang bzhin myed de/ gang la'ang bzhin gyi
242a1('bum): pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// nam mkha'i khams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhi na myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed
242a2('bum): de ni brjod du myed pa'o// ma rig pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// 'du byed la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin
242a3('bum): myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// mying dang gzugs la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// skye mched drug la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du/ 
242a4('bum): myed pa'o// reg pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin mye/ dad pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// tshor ba la rang bzhin myed de dade/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// sred pa la rang bzhin
242a5('bum): myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// len pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// srid pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin
242a6('bum): myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// skye ba la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// rga shi la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol
242a7('bum): tu phyin pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol
242a8('bum): tu phyin pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol
242b1('bum): tu phyind pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// nang stong pa nyid la rang
242b2('bum): bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin
242b3('bum): myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed
242b4('bum): pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin myed de/ gang la ra rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// 'dus byas stong / pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed/ 
242b5('bum): pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod
242b6('bum): du myed pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa
