278b7('bum): cing stong pa la ci zhig la bskyed chos thams cad gsog dang / gso bshe stag la ji zhig lnga po snod ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang dral ban byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems
278b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shring / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byord de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
279a1('bum): kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
279a2('bum): snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sem sa can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhend pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig la ci zhig
279a3('bum): lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces bya lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
279a4('bum): chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing ka sems can rnam sa la chos stond to// rab 'byor da de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung
279a5('bum): ba'i chos so// rab 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ 
279a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ me rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab
279a7('bum): 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khrims gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
279a8('bum): chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdu ba mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas
279b1('bum): spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po
279b2('bum): bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bani gang zhe na sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor dngas yang 'ang nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi
279b3('bum): 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshigs
279b4('bum): snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byord ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la na par gzigs na/ byang shar phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten
279b5('bum): gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mo rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na sbyin pa dang / tshig
279b6('bum): snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / rab 'byor dngos 'ang nas sangs rgya/ sa kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnams par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung
279b7('bum): gi bye snyed dgan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngas po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang tshig san pa dang / don spyad pa dang / 
279b8('bum): don mthun pa'o// rang 'byor dengs yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs mtshams kyi 'dzag rten ga khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma srad dgon/ 
280a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bani snad pa mthong ste/ bzhig shen/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don snang ba dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor
280a2('bum): ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
280a3('bum): chen po dag myi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan
280a4('bum): gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'ji ga rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos
280a5('bum): po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun par rab 'byor dngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig
280a6('bum): rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten go khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma stong dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis srung
280a7('bum): ba mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhen sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don srung ba dang / don mthun po'o// 
280a8('bum): shes rab bam mo// / rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams srung ba yin
280b1('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gnyis kyis sems can rnams sdud de gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor
280b2('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gse/ 
280b3('bum): rama?/ dngul lam/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bye dur+ya 'am/ dung ngam/ man shel lam/ byi ru 'am/ sa le sbram 'am/ zas sam/ skom 'am/ gdugs sam/ gos sam/ spos sam/ 
280b4('bum): 'phreng ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ mal cha'am/ stan nom/ 'tsho ba 'am/ bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ rta 'am/ glang po che 'am/ bdag po yongs su gtong na 'di skad du/ kye
280b5('bum): sems can gang tshur sheg bdag nyid kyi dang 'dra bar brang mi dge sa par khyer cig/ long la der song shig ces brjod de/ sbyin pa des sbyin pa de byin nas/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su
280b6('bum): gtong ngo // chos la skyabs su gtong ngo / dge 'dun la skyabs su gtong ngo // la la ni bslab pa la gnas lnga 'dzin tu 'jug go// la la ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i nye bar gnas pa la nye
280b7('bum): bar gnas par byed do/ la la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god do/ la la ni bsam gtan dang po la 'god do/ la la ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la 'god do// la la ni bas
280b8('bum): gtan gsum pa la 'god do/ la la ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do// la la ni byams pa la 'god do// la la ni snying rje la 'god do// la la na dga' ba la 'god do// la la ni btang
281a1('bum): snyoms la 'god do/ la la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do// la la ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do// la la ni cung zad med pa'i skye mched la 'god do// la la
281a2('bum): pan rnam shes pa mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do/ la la ni cung zad med pa'i skye mched la 'god de/ la la ni 'du shes med 'du shes med myin skye mched la 'god do// la la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la
281a3('bum): yang dag par skul lo/ lo la ni chos rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skulo// 
281a4('bum): la la ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni lha rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni su la mi gtsang ba las stsogs pa'i 'du shes su so sor brtag pa las
281a5('bum): yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni rnam par dag pa la yang // dag par skul lo/ la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhil yang dag par skul lo// la la ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi
281a6('bum): pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ba zhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dbang po lnga la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni stobs lnga la yang dag par skul
281a7('bum): la la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la ying dag par skul lo// la la ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa
281a8('bum): med pa'i ting nge 'dzind la yang dag par skal lo/ la la ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la yang dag par skul la la la ni mthar kos gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul// 
281b1('bum): la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul lo la la ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni byams
281b2('bum): pa chen po la yang dag par skul lo/ le la ni snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu
281b3('bum): rtsa gnyis yongs su grub par bye ba la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcu la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni lan
281b4('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni
281b5('bum): rang byang chub la yang dag par skul lo// la lu ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo/ la la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo// rab 'byorade/ 
281b6('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la zang zing gi skyon pa yongs su gteng zhing thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa'i bde ba dang
281b7('bum): ldan par 'god de/ rab 'byor de de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu
281b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi skyon pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// / 
282a1('bum): rab 'byor nga 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / ma nor bstan pa ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dag
282a2('bum): pa da' spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang / thun mong du gyur pa rnams ste/ 
282a3('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'jig rten gi chos kyi sbyin pa de btang nas/ rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos ma nor bar blangs pa de las bskyod de/ de nas bskyod
282a4('bum): nas thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god de/ de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang / 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gang
282a5('bum): zhe na/ 'phags pa'i chos shes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag/ dpa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan
282a6('bum): lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med par smon pa med pa rnams so// 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras
282a7('bum): bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid de/ rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos kyi rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
282a8('bum): bu shes pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha
282b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa shes pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shes pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes
282b2('bum): pa'o// nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi drang stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o// stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid shes pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus
282b3('bum): stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes sa'o mtha' yas 'das pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// thog tha ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
282b4('bum): shes pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chos tham/ sa cad stong pa nyid shes pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos
282b5('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
282b6('bum): shes pa'o// dbang po lnga shes pa'o// stobs lnga shes pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes
282b7('bum): pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi shes pa'o// tshad pa bzhi shes pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad shes pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
282b8('bum): par 'jug pa dgu shes pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shes pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams shes pa'o// / 
283a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi shes pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos
283a2('bum): pa ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes pa'i byams pa chen po shes pa'o/ snying rje chen po shes pa'o// dga' bo chen po shes du'o// btang snyoms pa chen po shes pa'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig
283a3('bum): rkyen las 'das pa'i chos rnams sam/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams dang / 'du sh+tse byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/ rnam par thams
283a4('bum): cod mkhyend pa nyid kyi cho ye shes ma gtogs par/ de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so// byang chub sems dpa'
283a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'dra sa bu gang zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i dngos po thams cad spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
283a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorard kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dang
283a7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byorang de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
283a8('bum): dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
283b1('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye brag yod do// gsol pa bye brag ci lta bu zhig
283b2('bum): mchisabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa
283b3('bum): zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas shing chos thams cad la mund pa med pa thob pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang zhan la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog+sa/ 
283b4('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med do// rab 'byorard de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la rten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
283b5('bum): chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems rnams 'jig cengan pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing / thabs mkhas pas 'phags
283b6('bum): pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'ag da pa yin no// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
283b7('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
283b8('bum): spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i
284a1('bum): sgo gsum dang / ngarnam par thar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa dgu dang / mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu dang / zil kyis gnond pa'i skye mched brgyad dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 
284a2('bum): pasmon lam gyi shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / yongs su dag pa zhi ba dang / dbang bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
284a3('bum): rig pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba med pa gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid
284a4('bum): dang / me chen po'i mtshon sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya dag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa dang / thugs rje chen po dang / 
284a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnamapa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang / mi chen po'i mtsha na sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgya bcu dang / 
284a6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo rnams ste/ da ni brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byord de la
284a7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang
284a8('bum): ldan pas 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par 'byed do// lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par dpyod do// lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta
284b1('bum): la zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ lus la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhang rnam gnas par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len
284b2('bum): pa med do// nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la tshogs sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam
284b3('bum): par bsald cing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ tshor ba la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam
284b4('bum): par spyod do// tshor ba la myi gnas par rnam par spyod cing // 'jig rten yin du gang yang nye bar lend pa myed do// nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa
284b5('bum): dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bskul cing rnam par spyod do// sems/ la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ sems la/ 
284b6('bum): zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la mi gnas par rnam par spyod ning / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi tshonas dang phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang / 
284b7('bum): gi chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnams par spyod do// chos
284b8('bum): la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod // chos la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod de/ chos la mi gnas
284b9('bum): ses la kun 'byung ba dang zad bI rje su lta zhing rno bar spyod// / 
285a1('bum): par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar lend pa myed do// rab 'byor de yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa
285a2('bum): dang skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir rtsol dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed cing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing / shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / sgom
285a3('bum): ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa skyed pa'o// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzind spong ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting 'dzin
285a4('bum): spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phru dal gi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed/ 
285a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dang pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran ba'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes ra
285a6('bum): kyi dbang po ste/ de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o// stobs lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi dbang
285a7('bum): baM ste/ de dag na dang po lnga zhes bya'o// rang 'byorang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub yan lag dang / ches rnam par 'byud pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang brtson 'grus
285a8('bum): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu byang ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag/ 
285b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i la ngag
285b2('bum): dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind te/ de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o// de la ting nge
285b3('bum): 'dzind gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben
285b4('bum): pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind ces bya'o// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig ste/ 
285b5('bum): 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya'o// smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang sdug bsngal/ dgyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i ting / 
285b6('bum): nge 'dzind ces bya'o// rnam par thard pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs gyis gzugs rnam par mthong ba 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa dang pa'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol/ 
285b7('bum): gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thard pa gsum pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam
285b8('bum): par tha rad pa bzhi pa'o// rnam shes pa mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te/ gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa lnga pa'o// cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di
286a1('bum): ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar
286a2('bum): bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thard pa brgyad pa'o// de dag ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ces bya'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la skye 'dod pas dben sdig
286a3('bum): tomi dge ba'i chos kyis dbe nang / rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bor bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / 
286a4('bum): rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud cig tu gyurd pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzind las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis
286a5('bum): pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyom sa su gnas ste/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa
286a6('bum): rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes bya ba ste/ dga' med pa'i btangs ma ga tan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde
286a7('bum): bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa ni/ 
286a8('bum): bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du/ 
286b1('bum): shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag
286b2('bum): par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam par shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag
286b3('bum): par 'das te/ cung zad ma yin no zhes bya bar cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed
286b4('bum): 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes med 'du myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / 
286b5('bum): tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// 'di ni mtharakyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o / 'ang na mthar kyis gnas pa' snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes
286b6('bum): bya'o// de la mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ mtha' dag sa dang mtha' dag chu dang / mtha' dag mye dang / mtha' dag rlung dang / mtha' dag sngon po dang mthu gser po dang / mtha' dag dmar
286b7('bum): po dang / mtha' dag dkar po dang / mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang mtha' dag nam mkha' ste/ de dag ni mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o// de la zil gyis non pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ 
286b8('bum): nang gzugs su 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag ni zil kyis mnan te/ 'du shes zil kyis mnan te mthong
287a1('bum): zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zild kyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o// nang gzugs su 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs rags dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong
287a2('bum): payang gzugs de yang zild kyis mnan te shes/ zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa don zild kyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol
287a3('bum): gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes/ zi lad kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil kyis gno nad
287a4('bum): pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol kyi gzugs rag dang kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog ma sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis man nad te
287a5('bum): shes/ zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zild kyis gnond pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs
287a6('bum): sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon por snang ba mchog sngon po/ 'di lte ra ste dper na me toka oM ma ka lta bu 'am/ yul ba ra na ser byas pa'i gos ltar sngo bakha dog sngo ba/ sngo bar snang bar
287a7('bum): mthong yang gzugs de dag zild kyis gnon te/ shes zild kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zild kyis gnond pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shi/ 
287a8('bum): phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/ kha dog ser po ser por snang ba/ mdog ser po 'di lta ste/ dper na shing kar shi ka'i me tog lta bu 'am/ yul bar na ser byas pa'i gos ltar ser ba
287b1('bum): kha dog ser ba/ ser bar snang ba/ mdog ser bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis man nad te shes/ zil kyis man nad te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil kyis gnond pa'i
287b2('bum): phyir mched drug pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po/ dmar por snang ba mdog dmar po 'od lta ste dper na/ ma dzu dzi ba ka'i me tog lte
287b3('bum): 'am/ yul ba ra na ser byas pa'i gos ltar dmar po/ kha dog dmar ba/ dmar bar sdang ba/ mdog dmar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis nand te shas/ zil gyis mnan te ma
287b4('bum): zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'dido ni zil kyis gnand pa'i skye/ mched bdun pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes / phyi rol kyi gzugs dkar po/ kha dog dgar po/ dag
287b5('bum): por snang ba/ mdog dgara'adi lta ste dper na/ ma pa ba sangs rgyas kyi 'dom lta bu'am/ yul bani ser byas pa'i gos ltar dkar bya la dog dkar ba/ pa/ 
287b6('bum): bar snang ba/ mdog dkar por mthong yang gzugs de dag zol kyis mnand te/ mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zol kyis gnanod pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa rtse
287b7('bum): bzhe na/ ma gtan la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pa ro khyod kyi nyon mongs pa myi skye ba'i mthu yod
287b8('bum): ting nge 'jim nga gis bsgrub pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o// smon lam gyi shes pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas te 'di shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' mnam
288a1('bum): dus gsum gyi shes pa 'am/ shes pa gang dang gang 'dod par gyur pa la de la yid kyis smon pa byed de/ de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas de'i smon lam de yongs su grub par gyur cing / shes/ 
288a2('bum): bya ba de yang shes pa de ni smon lam gyi shes pa zhes bya'o// de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang lha'i mig mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba mngon par shes
288a3('bum): po dang / pha rol kyi sems shes pa mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag zad pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go// de la yongs su
288a4('bum): dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang dmigs pa yongasu dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang ye shes yongasu dag pa ste bzhi po de dag go// de la dbang bcu gang zhe na// 
288a5('bum): tshe la dbang ba dang sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba NA dang las la dbang ba dang skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa/ la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / 
288a6('bum): 'phrul la dbang ba dang ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang bcu po drug go// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gong zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas
288a7('bum): la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to// gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / 
288a8('bum): da ltar byung ba'i las yongs su drang ba'i rnam par smin pa'i gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ khams sna tshogs can dang khams du ma can gyis/ 
288b1('bum): 'jig rten yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to// sems gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to// sems
288b2('bum): can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam ya nang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 
288b3('bum): dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam
288b4('bum): par dgos pa/ rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to/ rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjesu da gongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ 
288b5('bum): cher bas brgya dang / tshe nga rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya s+ho/ nga dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar duyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ bskal pa brgya'i
288b6('bum): bar dang / bar+Na skal ba brgyad phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang bskal du pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal po bye khrag khrig pa spyad du ma'i bar dag kyang dz+ha su dgongs
288b7('bum): bdag 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug ga 'dug// ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur te/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur te/ zas ni 'di za za'o// yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas
288b8('bum): che'i mtha' ni 'od tsam zhig tu gyur te/ bdag de nis sho 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/ sa mal
289a1('bum): dang bcas gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas su rjes su dgongs so// lha'i myig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can shi 'phos pa dang / skye ba dag kyang gzigaso
289a2('bum): kha dog sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar dong bar sems can rnams rab tu mkhyend te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi ngan du spyod
289a3('bum): pa dang ldan pa ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas ngan song na 'gro log
289a4('bum): par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o// sems can 'di dag na lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par
289a5('bum): spyod pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang / dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i chu de'i rkyend kyis lus na gnas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lnga'i nang du skye'o// 
289a6('bum): zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyend to/ zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba zag pa med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ bcu po 'di dag ni
289a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas nas/ de la chos
289a8('bum): 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na
289b1('bum): chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar rgyur yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rna
289b2('bum): par spyod de khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra skrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus
289b3('bum): kyang rung ste chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o// bdag za dag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes par bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ 
289b4('bum): bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong
289b5('bum): ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba pa dang / bag cha mang pa thob pa dang myi 'jigs par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnasu dam bca'o// 
289b6('bum): 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra brlag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par skor bar mi nus
289b7('bum): pa bdag gis rab tu skor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi rjes su bstan pa de dag la sten na/ bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud dmang/ tshangs pa
289b8('bum): 'am skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su myi mthong naste rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba
290a1('bum): thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa ste/ myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod do/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du sang ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor
290a2('bum): le 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par skor bar mi nus pa dag gis rab tu skor bar bya'o/ gang yang dag bdag gis
290a3('bum): lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba'i rtog par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstand pa de dag la nan tan byas nas sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba mi 'byung ngo // zhes
290a4('bum): dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang
290a5('bum): dag dog par rje su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang mi 'jigs par thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu
290a6('bum): mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bcas pa'o// 'khor gyi nang du song ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am
290a7('bum): gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par sbyor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ ban po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so mangs/ 
290a8('bum): bar rtog pa pani gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste ngan so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos mos yang dag par rig pa dang nges pa'i tshigs so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par
290b1('bum): rig pa ste/ de dag kyang zhe na/ don la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin
290b2('bum): gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bsakal las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcas par dgongs pa de bzhin
290b3('bum): gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag
290b4('bum): pa mi mnga' bas las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcas par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ de ni bsku dang ba med pa gnyis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi
290b5('bum): spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gsheg / sa pa thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas la los shes su 'ong zhes/ yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin
290b6('bum): gshegs pa mi mnga' ste/ de ni bsrung ba myed pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar bzhag gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos stond pa'i tshe/ la las rna ba
290b7('bum): btud de rim 'gror nyan cing / bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan byed na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/ yid bde bar mi 'gyur/ 
290b8('bum): thugs yang yeng por mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar bzhag pa dang pa'o// la la rna ba btud de rim 'gror nyan cing / dga' nyan pa'i sems nye bar bzhag pa med pa dang / chos la dang
291a1('bum): gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar mi 'gyur/ mi bzod par mi 'gyur/ thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar
291a2('bum): bzhag pa gnyis pa'o// la la ni rna ba btud de rim 'gror nyan cing / bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed/ la la rna ba btud de rim 'gror nyan cing / 
291a3('bum): bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar 'jog pa med de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du myi byed kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa 'am/ thugs khro ba gnyis su mi 'gyur te/ thams
291a4('bum): cad du dgongs pa dang ldan zhing khyend par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o// de lnga de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe
291a5('bum): na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod// pa'i chos stond pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don matedzad pa la dus las myi 'da' ba ste/ de ni nyams pa med
291a6('bum): pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang / de dag
291a7('bum): lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma la ni de lta bu yang mi mnga' ste/ bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang
291a8('bum): zhe na de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gi bda' nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum
291b1('bum): mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa mtshan ces bya ste/ dngos po su ni sangs rgyas kyi chas ma 'dras pa bcwa brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas/ 
291b2('bum): pa yongs su sbyin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag par byung ste/ de ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin
291b3('bum): gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// tsan+do mi mnga'o// dgongs pa nyams da mi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o// ma brtags pa'i btang
291b4('bum): snyoms mi mnga'o mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// ba rtson 'grus nyams pa mi mnga'o/ dgongs pa yongs sunyams pa mi mnga'o/ ting nge 'dzind yongs su nyams
291b5('bum): pa mi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs yongs su nyams
291b6('bum): pa mi mnga'o// sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon tu 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ 
291b7('bum): ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs
291b8('bum): pa 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'dug go// de dag ni sangs
292a1('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmyags pa myed pa dran pas dbang sgyur ba zha ba'i rnam pa
292a2('bum): padang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid med pa' mtshan nyid na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmyigs pa myed pa dran pas dbang sgyur ba bzhi pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i
292a3('bum): mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi chen po mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / 
292a4('bum): zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs shin tu gan/ sa pa dang phyag dang zhabs dro bar 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zhe da bas gan zhing 'jam pa dang / mdun shin tu mtho' ba dang / so
292a5('bum): mong ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang sku che zhing drang ba dang zhabs logs par mtho' ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyild pa dang ri dgas i ni yi'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyag
292a6('bum): bla drang por slebs pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / sU re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dngong // zhabs mdzad spros
292a7('bum): brgyan pa dang seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / 'phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang / phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bre ba'i mchog dang shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zhing gab pa dang / dbu spyi gnus
292a8('bum): dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yas pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / chems shin tu dkar ba dang chems mnyam pa dang / tshams thags bzong ba dang / 
292b1('bum): tshems bzhi bcu tshang ba dang spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa rna
292b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/ rus pa'am ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra ba mang bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o// zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par
292b3('bum): sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa med pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa'o// ngang ba'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo 'dra ba rang 'brel pa mnga' bos phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'breld pa'o// shing bal gyi ye'u
292b4('bum): ltar shi nad tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o// phyag dang zhabs dang mgur gyi lhun shin tu mtho' bas/ mdun shin tu mtho' ba'o// phyag 'a dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas/ sor
292b5('bum): mo ring ba'o// rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o// sku la// ga pa mdun tu 'phags la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o pus mo'i long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mtho' ba'o// 
292b6('bum): sku gyen tu g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas/ yan lag go sA gyen tu 'khyil pa'o// ri dgas e na ya'i byind pa dang smig ma dang / ldum bu bad rang pa ltar drang zhing ma nyams la/ rim gyis
292b7('bum): gzhol bar grub cing / byind pa zlum pas ri dgas e ne ya'i byind pa lta bu'o// bla drang por bzhag ste/ ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyi sa pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas phyag bla drang por slebs
292b8('bum): pa'o// glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o/ shin tu spangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi
293a1('bum): mdog lta bu'o// gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog lta bul/ gsar dang ba tu 'dug la sku la rdul mi 'go bas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o// shin tu rnam par phye ba'i
293a2('bum): pa s+phu ra rer skyes shing gnyis su med na pas/ s+phu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa'o// mye tog kun tad dang zla ba dang / 'o ma dang ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la/ nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags par
293a3('bum): 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus sbyin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas/ zhal mdzod spus brgya nad pa'o// ro stod che bas seng ge'i ro stong do// mgur dang rgyud legs par 'brel cing lhun zlum pas phrag pa'i lhun mdzes
293a4('bum): par grub pa'o// gser gyi rten pa shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o// rlung dang khris pa dang / da bad kan gyis ma nyams shing / rnam par shes pa 'dra bas ro
293a5('bum): blo ba'i mchog go/ sku che zhing mdom du mnyam pas shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa'o// spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la ga yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / ldan pa'i dbu' mnyam zhing / 
293a6('bum): legs par grub pa la mdzes par mnga' bas/ dbu'i skyo gtsug dang ldan pa'o// me tog ud pa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas ljags shin tu yangs shing
293a7('bum): srab pa'o// tshangs pa dang byag la bying ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te/ yid du 'ong bas seng gen
293a8('bum): 'gram pa lta bu'o// me tog kun da dang dung gi bcug 'phro ltar shin tu dkar po'i rnams mnga' bas/ tshems shin tu dkar ba'o// bla 'og phye dgu myed pas chems shin tu mnyam pa'o// tshems la
293b1('bum): 'tshams mdod pas chems thags bzang ba'o// bla 'og gyi gu myed pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu mnga' ba'o// dkar gnag gi cha ma'i 'dres la shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma g.yogs pas/ 
293b2('bum): spyan dkar gnag 'byes pa'o// rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas pa la ma 'dzings pas ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o// de la bla ma'i bsu bskyal dang / chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang mchod
293b3('bum): rten rjes su bsgrub pa las stsogs pa pu dud dbyas pas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang po'i snga ltas so// yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa
293b4('bum): ste/ de ni myi g.yo'o shin tu brtand pa'i ltas so// sbyin pa dang ngag stand pa dang / don spyod pa dang don mer thun pa'i bsdu' ba rnams bzhi goms par byas pas phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba ste/ de
293b5('bum): ni myur du bsdu ba'i snga ltas so// bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / nga bzhim zhing nyam su bde ba byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzho// na zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba ste/ de gnyis
293b6('bum): ni bza' ba dang bcal pa dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba thob pa'i snga ltas so// bcings pa bkrol ba dang / srog gi rim 'gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas/ sor mong ring ba
293b7('bum): dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba ste/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba dang / bzung ba mngon par spel cing 'grib par ma byas pas/ zhabs kyi gang
293b8('bum): mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen tu 'khyil pa ste/ de ni myi mnyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so// rig pa dang bzo'i gnas rim 'gror byas shing // gnas byin pa dang bdag gis blangs pas ri
294a1('bum): dgas e na ye'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so// bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs na myi gos par gtong zhing med ces byas pas/ phyag gis bla drang por slebs
294a2('bum): papa ste/ de ni yo byad mang ba dang 'dul ba'i snga ltas so// 'grogs pa dang 'dza' bshes pa dang gnyen ma phye ba dang / bye bar gyur pa sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par
294a3('bum): skul ba dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su srungs pas gsang snga ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga lngas so// stand dang gos dang khang ba dang / gzhal myong khang dang gnas bzang
294a4('bum): po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste de gnyis ni bdan dang na bza' dang khang pa dang / gzhal myed khang dang / gnas bzang po thob pa'i ltas so// 'du 'dzi
294a5('bum): spangs pa dang mkhan po dang / sro dpon dang / pha ma dang / tephu nu las stsogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim 'gro byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / bcol
294a6('bum): baM rnams pa la ma gzand pas sU re re nas g.yas su phyogasu 'khyil ba dang zhal mdzod spus brgyad pa ste/ da ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltos so// mi swAHna ba myi zer smod la snyan par
294a7('bum): smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzind pas seng ge'i ro stong lta bu dang / 'phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thu ba med pa'i sgra ltas so na na ba rnams la rtsi dang / rim 'gro/ 
294a8('bum): dang sman pa dang nyams su phan po'i zas byin pa dang / rim gro byas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bris pa'i mchog ste/ de ni nad nyung ba'i sde lngas so// skye mo sa tshal dang 'khor dang / btung ba ra/ 
294b1('bum): rdzi bu dang rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / 'phreng ba'i gnas dang stegs dang / gtsug lag khang bya ba las stsogs pa la gzhan mos par bya ba sngon tu gtong zhing / bdag gis gzhan byin pas shing
294b2('bum): ne gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa dang dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' ba chen po mnga' ba'i lngas so// yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'dzom pa dang / nyams su bde bar smras pas/ ljags shin tu
294b3('bum): yangs shing srab pa dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i sngas so// gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing / rnam par shes
294b4('bum): par 'gyur ba dang mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa myed pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang btang mi bra zhes rnar snyan dpa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o// yun ring po nas
294b5('bum): tshig khyal ba spangs shing / dus dus su smras pas/ seng ge'i 'gram pa lnga ste/ de ni chog kun gyis mnyand pa'i snga lta sa so/ rim 'gror bya ba dang / snyan pa myed pa gnyis kyis
294b6('bum): tshor ba yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga lngas so// yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig smra smra bas/ tshems thags
294b7('bum): bzang dang tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste de ni 'khor byer myi byed pa'i snga ltas so// pang gis khyad pa bzhin du nyes par bsams pa med pa la ma chags mi ldang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i
294b8('bum): myig gis lnga ltos pas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i lngaso// rab 'byor de de dag ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis/ de la de bzhin gshegs
295a1('bum): pa'i dpa' byad bzang po brgyad bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mong zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin
295a2('bum): pasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i thugs su mnga' ba ste/ sen mo mdog snum pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes
295a3('bum): rigs dang rgyun mtho mchen por 'byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho' ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul kham tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
295a4('bum): rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yi na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ ser mo gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs
295a5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang gsung dang / sku'i// 'phrin las dang mcho ba shin tu dben pa ste/ rtsa myi mthong / ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon
295a6('bum): mongs pa'i mngon pa 'gel pa ste/ rtsa la mngan pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
295a7('bum): ldan 'das ni mi mnyam pa thams cad las grol ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi'i seng ge' ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs
295a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi'i glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang ba'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ dang po'i stabs su bzhu
295a9('bum): pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi'i khyu mchog ste/ khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas
295b1('bum): phyogs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba
295b2('bum): snyo ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul ma smonan ston pa ste/ sku shi nang tu legs pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pu'i chos rnams
295b3('bum): shin tu sbyangs pa ste sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/ sku rim gyis gzhol ba ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang / 
295b4('bum): gsung de thugs gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu gtsang yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na rang bzhin gis thugs 'jam pa dang / ldan pa ste sku shin tu 'jam pa yin te rjes
295b5('bum): rgyam bcom ldan 'das rnams ni man tan ma nga zhing babang ma / ston pa ste// sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sas rgyas ldan 'das rnams na chos dang 'dul bshin tu chags pa
295b6('bum): yin/ mas rgyas pa ma ldan 'das rnams na yan tan 'du shing b.rang basmin pa ste/ sku ma 'ang sangs paspyan sa su sa rnams na mams can thams da sa nyam pa rdzu/ 
295b7('bum): lags pa'i marnam pa na sangs rgyas basmos ldan 'das rnams ni cig tu 'am panas ston // sgyu na du men/ spangs rgyas ma
295b8('bum): rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mang ba sa/ zhum pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa dag pa rtsal rnams pa rung ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yi ma
296a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shi nang tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku shi nang tu bsregs pa yin pa sa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag
296a2('bum): pa/ dang nying lag legs par stond pa ste/ yan lag dang nying lag sba bar mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shi na tu rnam par dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib med cing
296a3('bum): rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ phyel zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes
296a4('bum): pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shi nad tu byung ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgya la gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin/ sangs rgyas
296a5('bum): rnams ni chos zad pa rnam par zlog pa ste/ phyal bya ma mer/ 'dug pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ma/ thun par 'dzind pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yas
296a6('bum): phyogs su 'khyil pa yin/ sangs rgyas rnaMs po bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
296a7('bum): ni thugs shin tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/ kun spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstand pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ 
296a8('bum): sku la sme ba myed pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar yang ba ltar rab tu thob pa'i chos stond pa ste/ phyag chal shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs
296a9('bum): sangs rgyas bcoM ldan 'das ni ni chos kyang mo shin tu thug su chung 'i ste / lte ba zab pa yin
296b1('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang skye bo phal las byams pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/ phyag gi ro mo snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab
296b2('bum): cing brtan par zhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs ston pas phyag gi ri mor ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
296b3('bum): ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'chang ba ste/ zhal ha cang yang myi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten thams cad du bkye ba ste/ zhal gzugs
296b4('bum): kyi gzugs brnyan ltar snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du gtong zhing 'dul ba ste/ ljags shi na tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
296b5('bum): ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin tu sra/ ba yin sangs rgyas rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyi chos dang / 'dul ba gting dpag dka' ba ste/ ljags
296b6('bum): shin tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang / 'brug gi sgo lta bus bsnyems pa myi mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i ngo ro dang / 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sa
296b7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde ba'i smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyand cing 'jam dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan da pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
296b8('bum): 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las la 'das pa ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshams mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/ 
297a1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs
297a2('bum): pa pa ste/ tshems mche ba mnyam pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos stond pa ste/ tshems mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
297a3('bum): 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mthong ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma'i mnga' ba ste/ shangs
297a4('bum): shin tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring du ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
297a5('bum): rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan shin tu dag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam sa ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu gsal ba ste/ rdzi ma stug
297a6('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang / skyes bu dang / na chung mchog dmyigs dkar gnag phyed cing / pad mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar
297a7('bum): bya ba ste/ spyan dkar gnag 'byed cing / pad mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/ sprin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas
297a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ sbyin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni skyon thams cad la mkhyend pa ste/ sbyin ma'i sku mnyam pa dang
297b1('bum): ldan pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems can sdum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ sbyin ma num pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
297b2('bum): chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pas mnga' ba ste/ snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyan mnyam pa yin/ 
297b3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa la ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni lta ba'i rnam pa pa thams cad yongasu byung
297b4('bum): ba ste/ zhal bral ba legs par sgrub pa dang / ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas rna bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyi rgol ba shin tu dul ba ste/ zhal dpral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs
297b5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin turdzogs pa ste/ dbu' shi nad tu rgyas pa yin sangs rgyas bco/ ma ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba rnams par zlog pa ste/ 
297b6('bum): dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang sgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu' sdug pa yin sangs rgyas bcom
297b7('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstand pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu' 'jam pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste dbu' mi 'dzings pa
297b8('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/ dbu' mi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi mye tog gis skye ba
298a1('bum): mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu' dri zhim pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi bye'u dang / bkra shis dang dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin/ rab 'byor da de
298a2('bum): pa/ ngag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe 'a byad bzang po brgyad bcu'o// rab 'byor de de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang yang
298a3('bum): dag par bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas
298a4('bum): sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byord de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshard rmad du byung ba'i chos so// 
298a5('bum): bam po// / rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sna pa na
298a6('bum): can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson grus gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
298a7('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyand par smra bas sems can rnaMs
298a8('bum): rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do// rab 'byor da de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
298a9('bum): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug gi sos
298b1('bum): tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams bsdud do// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa'
298b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de de la byang chub sems dpa' chen po pha rolab tu phyinang pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// de tsag
298b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis dge pa'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed do// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don bya bar sems can rnams
298b4('bum): sdud do// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
298b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gi don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol da tu/ te/ phyi nad pa drug po 'di dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma
298b6('bum): 'dus pa myed de/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzas
298b7('bum): kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan
298b8('bum): dag la 'di skad 'debs shing 'di skad stond to/ rigs kyi bu khyed tshur sheg/ yi ge mngon par bsgrubs pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis nas yi
299a1('bum): ye ga bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams
299a2('bum): cad byang bar gyis shig/ ye shes bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig/ yi ge
299a3('bum): bzhi bcu rtsa gzhi sgo 'dus bAR+Ya sgoms shig ces ston to/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yan/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkha
299a4('bum): pa yin/ yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'du rnas par sgom pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/ 
299a5('bum): de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa mkhas par bya na/ la la te goms shing yi ge mye ngon par bsgrub pa mkhas pa yi na/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
299a6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ de chos la mkhas pas/ yi ge la mkhas pas/ yi ger mang pos yi ge med pa'i chos
299a7('bum): stond kyang rab 'byor chos de'i yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du 'byung ba'i choso// gang nyan thos
299a8('bum): dang / rang pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin no// de nas tshe dang lda no pa rab 'byord kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' yas
299b1('bum): 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shin tu myi dmyigs/ chos kyi dngos po yang mi dmyigs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
299b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
299b3('bum): tu phyi nad dang / sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan ga bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
299b4('bum): bcu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
299b5('bum): la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'dzi/ gas pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa
299b6('bum): chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya da dang / ma chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing / rnam par smin pa las byung
299b7('bum): ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas/ sems can rnams la chos stonang par 'gyur/ de la ni sems can myi dmigasate/ sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmyig so// sems can myi dmyigs
299b8('bum): pas gzugs dmyigs su ma mtshas so// sems can mya dmyigs pas tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas 'du shes dmyigs su mo mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs
300a1('bum): pas 'du byed dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis su/ sems can myi dmyigs pas/ myi dmyigs su ma mchis so// sem/ 
300a2('bum): pa can myi dmyigs pas rna ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ sna dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ lce dmyigs su ma mchiso// sems can mi
300a3('bum): dmyigs pas lus dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmyigs pas yi dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas gzugs dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi
300a4('bum): dmyigs pas sgra dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ dri dmyigs su ma mchiso// sems can myi dmyigs pas ro dmyigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmyigs pas
300a5('bum): rig dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyi// gas pas/ chos dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can/ myi dmyigs pas/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su
300a6('bum): ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas rna ba'i rna par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis
300a7('bum): can mi dmyigs pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmyig su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyi
300a8('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchi so/ sems can myi dmyigs pas/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis/ sems can myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te
300b1('bum): dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigasu ma mchisaso// de sems can
300b2('bum): mi dmyigs pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ myig gi 'dus
300b3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmyigs pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchiso/ sems can mi dmyigs pas/ sna'i
300b4('bum): ra'adus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchiso// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend na kyis tshor ba dmyigasu ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs/ 
300b5('bum): pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyig sa su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmyigs pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyig su ma mchis so// 
300b6('bum): sems can myi dmyigs pas/ sa'i khams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ chu'i khams dmyigs su ma mchis/ sems can myi dmyigs pas/ mye'i khams dmyin
300b7('bum): su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ rlung gi khams dmigs su ma mchiso// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ na mkha'i khams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmyigs
300b8('bum): pas rnam par shes pa'i khams dmyigs su ma mchis/ sems can myi dmigs pas ma rig pa dmyig su mi mchiso// sems can mi dmyigs/ 'du byed dmyigs su ma mchiso// sems can mi
301a1('bum): dmyigs pas rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchiso// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ mying dang gzugs dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ skye mched drug dmig su/ 
301a2('bum): ma mchis so// sems can mi dmyigs pas/ reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmyigs pas/ tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ sred pa dmig su
301a3('bum): ma mchis so// sems can mi dmyigs pas/ lend pa dmyigs su ma mchis// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ srid pa myi dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ skye ba
301a4('bum): dmyigs su ma mchis so sems can mi dmyigs pas/ rga shi dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su ma mchis/ sems can
