301a6('bum): can myi dmyigs pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myigs su ma mchis// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ bsam rto na gi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigasu ma mchis so// sems can
301a7('bum): myi dmyigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis// sems can myi dmyigs bas/ phyi stong
301a8('bum): po nyid dmyig su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyig su myi dmyigs su ma mchis/ sems can myi dmyigs pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmyig su ma mtshan
301b1('bum): sems can myi dmyigs pas/ chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchiso// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchos/ sems can mya dmyigs pas/ 'dus byas
301b2('bum): stong pa nyid da migs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs sum mchis/ sems can myi datshugs pas/ mtha'al sa 'ongs pa song pa nyid dmyos su/ 
301b3('bum): ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ srog ma dang pa ma myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs so// dor dmyang pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma ma gro// snams
301b4('bum): can myi dmyigs pas/ rang thon na snang ba nyid dmyigs su ma michis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ chos thams ca stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mangs su/ sems can mi
301b5('bum): dmyigs pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma ma chis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi
301b6('bum): dmyigs byas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid datsugs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ ngo bo 'ad sang pa nyid dmyigs su ma mnas so// semos cad myi dmyigs pas/ dngos po ma
301b7('bum): nga ca stong banyid myigos su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ drin po nye bar gzhag pa rnam sa dmyigs sum mchis so// sems can tshu migs pas/ yang dag par stong pa rnam
301b8('bum): dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmyigasu ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ dbang po rnams dmyigs su ma mchis/ sems
302a1('bum): can myi dmyigs pas/ stobs rnams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmigs pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ 'phag/ 
302a2('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmyigs su me ma chos so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas// bsam gtan rnams
302a3('bum): dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ tshad myed pa rnams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyig su ma mchis
302a4('bum): sems can rna myi dmyigs pas rnam par thard pa brgyad dmyigasu ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ mtha rad kyi/ sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmyigs su ma mchis
302a5('bum): so sems can myi dmyigs pas stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed/ pa dang smond pa myed pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams dmyigs
302a6('bum): su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ ting nge 'dzind dmyigs su ma mchis s+ho/ semaso can myi dmigs pas gzungs kyi sgo dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ de bzhi/ 
302a7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can dmyi dmyigs pas/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa ba ni
302a8('bum): dmyigs su ma mchis so/ sems can myi dmyigs pas khyams po chen po dmyigs so// sems can myi dmyigs pas snying rje chen po dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ 
302b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi dmyigs so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras/ 
302b2('bum): bu dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can
302b3('bum): mi dmyigs pas/ rang byang chub dmigs su ma mchis pas/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so sems can myi dmyigs sa pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmyigs su ma
302b4('bum): mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dmyigs su ma mchis so// semasacan myi dmyigs pas/ dpe' byang bzang po brgyad bcu dmyig
302b5('bum): su ma mchis so// sems can dmyigs su ma mchis pa la sems can ma mchis so// gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// 'du shes ma mchis so// 'du byed ma
302b6('bum): mchis so// rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// myig ma mchis so// rna ba ma mchis so// sna ma mchis so/ lce ma mchis so// lus ma mchis so// yid ma mchis so// gzugs ma mchis// 
302b7('bum): sgra ma mchis so// dri ma mchis so// ro ma mchis so// reg pa ma mchis so// chos ma mchis so// myig gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ snga'i rnam par
302b8('bum): shes pa ma mchis so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus
303a1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma mchis so
303a2('bum): te reg pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchos so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// myig/ 
303a3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
303a4('bum): kyis tshor ba ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma mchiso// sa'i khams ma mchis so// chu'i khams ma mchis so// mye'i khams ma mchis so// rlung gi khams ma mchis
303a5('bum): nam mkha'i khams ma mchiso/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis so// ma rig pa ma mchis so/ 'du byed dam mchis so/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis// mying dang gzugs
303a6('bum): ma mchis so// skye mched drug ma mchis so// reg pa ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// sred pa ma mchis lend pa ma mchis so// srid pa ma mchi so// skye ba ma mchis so// 
303a7('bum): rga shi ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang
303a8('bum): pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ma ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma mchis so// nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// phyi na
303a9('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus ma byas
303b1('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchiso// 
303b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dngos po med pa
303b3('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis
303b4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so// dbang po rnam sa ma mchis/ stobs rnams ma mchis so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden yan lag/ 
303b5('bum): brgyad pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis/ bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so// tshad myed pa rnams ma mchis so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa
303b6('bum): 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so// rnam par thar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so// stong pa nyid ma mchis so// mtshan ma myed pa ma mchis so// smon pa myed pa ma mchis
303b7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzind rnams ma mchis// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi
303b8('bum): ba ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma mchis so// byams pa chen po ma mchis so// snying rje chen po ma mchis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchiso// 
304a1('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// lan ci/ ga phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis so// rang byang chub ma mchis// 
304a2('bum): lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid ma mchis so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma mchis so// myi chen po'i mtshan sum rtsa gnyis ma mchis so// dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcu ma mchis ngade ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
304a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang myi dmigs na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
304a4('bum): la dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das bka' stsal pa rab 'byord de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te// ji snyed du smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor de ji ltar sems can mi
304a5('bum): dmyigs pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid du ri ga par bya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 
304a6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
304a7('bum): du rig par bya'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du rig pa ra bya'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// myi dmyigs
304a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phung po
304b1('bum): stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rte nad cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bdag
304b2('bum): stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// srog stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'gro ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// gso ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// skyes bu stong pa nyid du rig
304b3('bum): par bya'o// gang zag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// shed can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// shed bdag stong pa nyid rig par bya'o// byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byed du 'jug pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 
304b4('bum): slong pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// kun nas slong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshor ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshor ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshor bar byed pa po stong pa nyid du nga rig par bya'o// 
304b5('bum): shes pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rigan par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rdzu
304b6('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dbang po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// stobs stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam
304b7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bsam gtan stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshad myed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa
304b8('bum): bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bsam gtan stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshad myed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid du rig par/ rna bar
305a1('bum): tha rad pa brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// mya 'jigs pa bzhi stang pa nyid du rag par bya'o/ rnam par tha rad pa'i
305a2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid rig par bya'o// so so yang dag
305a3('bum): par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byams pa chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// snying rje chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 
305a4('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig por bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 
305a5('bum): lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rnam pa tha sems cad mkhyend pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub sems
305a6('bum): dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong nas
305a7('bum): phyi nad ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos stond te/ de ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la'ang myi 'jug pa de ltar stond to/ des de'i ltar mthong nas chos thams cad sgrib pa myed par shes te/ chos
305a8('bum): gang yang 'khrug par mi byed de/ gnyis su myi byed do// yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du yang stond pa myed de/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni sprul pa bye ba phrag
305a9('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 
305b1('bum): du ma sprul cing / sems can la lci sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyor/ la la ni tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la sbyor/ la la ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyor/ la la ni brtson 'grus/ 
305b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyor/ la la ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyor/ la la ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la sbyor/ la la ni bsam gtan bzhi la sbyor/ la la ni tshad med pa bzhi
305b3('bum): la sbyor/ la la ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyor/ le la ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyor/ la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
305b4('bum): la sbyor/ la la ni dbang po lnga la sbyor/ la la ni stobs lnga la sbyor/ ngal la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyor/ la la ni 'phag/ nyes pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ro// la la 'pha
305b5('bum): ba'i bden pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan bzhi la sbyor/ la la rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la sbyor/ la la mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyor/ la la
305b6('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myod pa la sbyor/ la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor/ la la ting nge 'dzind thams cad la sbyor/ la la gzungs kyi sgo thes
305b7('bum): cad la sbyor/ la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob bcu la sbyor/ la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyor la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la byams pa chen po la sbyor/ la la snying rje
305b8('bum): chen po la sbyor/ la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor la la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ lo la phyir myi 'ong ba'i
306a1('bum): ga 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor/ la la rang byang chub la sbyor/ la la lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la sbyor/ la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la sbyor na/ rab 'byor de la ji
306a2('bum): snyam du sems/ sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du bya ba yod dam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das don ma lag so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga ngo bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
306a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i cha/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag phyin ci mig rnams las yongs su bkrol nas/ ma btsongs ma grol ba'i tshul du yang
306a4('bum): dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dzad de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol/ tshor ba ma sa ma grol ba/ 'du shes ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du byed ma bcings ma
306a5('bum): grel ga rnam parashes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ myig ma pa te cings ma grol ba/ rna ba ma ngas ma grol ba/ sna ma ba cings ma grol ba/ lce ma bcings ma grol ba/ lum bcings ma
306a6('bum): grol ba yid ma bcings ma grol ba/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ snum bcings ma grol ba/ dri ma bcings ma grol ba/ ro mebacings ma grol ba/ rig ma bcings ma grol ba/ ches ma bcings
306a7('bum): ma grol ba// myig gi rnam par shes pa ma be cings ma grol ba/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ sku'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings me grol
306a8('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma btsangs ma grol ba/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma gol ba/ 
306b1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma macings ma grol ba/ lus 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ mig gi 'dus te reg
306b2('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
306b3('bum): rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma gol ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sa'i khams ma bcings ma
306b4('bum): grol ba/ chu'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ mye'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rlung gi khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ nam mkha'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa'i
306b5('bum): khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ ma rig pa ma bcings ma grol pa/ 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ mying dang gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ 
306b6('bum): skye mched drug ma bcings ma grol ba/ reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sred pa ma macings pa ma grol ba/ le nad pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ sred pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ 
306b7('bum): skye ba ma bcings pa ma grol ba/ rga shi ma bcings ma grol ba// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa me bcings ma grol ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
306b8('bum): phyi nad pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ma bcings ma gol ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma bcings ma
307a1('bum): grol ba ma/ nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ phyi stong pa nyid me bcings ma grol ba/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ chen po
307a2('bum): pa/ stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ mtha' las 'das pa
307a3('bum): stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma 'grol ba/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma bcings grol ba/ chos thos
307a4('bum): cad stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid ma bcings// ma grol ba/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma/ grol ba/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba
307a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ dran pa nye bar gzhagapa rnams ma bcings ma gol ba/ yang dag par spong ba rnaMs
307a6('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba dbang po rnams bcings ma grol ba/ stobs rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma bcings ma grol ba
307a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma bcis ma grol ba// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ bsam gtan rnams ma bcings mo gral ba/ chad myed pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba
307a8('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par tha ra pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma bcings grol ba/ rnam
307b1('bum): par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ma bcings grol ba/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ ting nge 'dzind rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
307b2('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma bcings ma grol ba myi 'jigs pa bzhi ma btsangs ma grol ba/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma bcings ma grol ba/ byams pa chen
307b3('bum): po ma bcings ma grol ba/ snying rje chen po ma bcings ma grol ba sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma bcings ma grol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chas ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
307b4('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba/ lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba/ dgra bcom pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rang byang chub ma bcings
307b5('bum): ma grol ba lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam/ pa thams cad mkhyend pa ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs
307b6('bum): ma yin no// tshor ba ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi mi bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yi na pa de ni 'du shes ma yin no// 'du byed kyi ma bcings ma grol ba/ 
307b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no/ rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par grol shes pa ma yin no// myig gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de myig ma yin no// 
307b8('bum): ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de na pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna ma yin no// lce'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce ma yin no// lus kyi ma bgyi
308a1('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus ma yin no// yid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no// gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no/ sgra'i ma bcings
308a2('bum): pa ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no// dri'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dri ma yin no// ro'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ro ma yin no// rag gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de
308a3('bum): reg ma yin no// chos kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chos ma yin no// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par
308a4('bum): shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i rnam par das pa ma yin no/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba de nyid gang yin pa de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin// 
308a5('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam
308a6('bum): par shes pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mibya
308a7('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de snga'i rnam par
308a8('bum): shes pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi rna 'dus te
308b1('bum): reg pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rkye ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de
308b2('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin
308b3('bum): ba de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
308b4('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus rab te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de
308b5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis cher ba yin no// sa'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sa'i khams ma yin no// chu'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chu'i
308b6('bum): khams ma yin no// mye'i khams kyi mo bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mye'i khams ma yin no// rlung gi khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rlung gi khams ma yin no/ nam mkha'i khams kyi ma
308b7('bum): sa mtha N+Di gang 'du ba de rnam pa ga ses pa yin no/ rnam pa shes pag rnams kyimi bsas mkhris pa nyi sa khams pa yin/ mdag pa'i ma
308b8('bum): grol ba nyid gang yin pa dem rig pa ma yin no// 'du byed kyim ma nings ma grol bzhi gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no// rnam pa shes nam mangs ma grol ba nyid gang yin 'di rnam par shes pa ma yin na
309a1('bum): mying dang gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mying dang gzugs ma yin no// skye mched drug gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de skye mched drug ma yin no/ reg pa'i ma bcings
309a2('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de reg pa ma yin no/ tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no// sred pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sred pa ma yin no/ le nad pa'i
309a3('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lend pa ma yin no// srid pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ma yin pa de srid pa ma yin no// skye ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de skye ba ma yi no// 
309a4('bum): rga shi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rga shi ma yin no// spyi na pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang mi na ba de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no/ tshul
309a5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa/ de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// bzod/ pa'i pha rolang tu phyind pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang
309a6('bum): yin pa de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gi pha rold tu
309a7('bum): phyind pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa
309a8('bum): ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma
309b1('bum): bcings ma grol ba de nyid gang yin pa de phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba
309b2('bum): nyid gang yin pa de chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang
309b3('bum): yin pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol
309b4('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// thog me dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yi na ba de thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dor
309b5('bum): ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi man bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de do// ra ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang gi bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rang bzhin
309b6('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang
309b7('bum): yin pa de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa da myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mi bcings ma grol
309b8('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
310a1('bum): me bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dran pa rnams ma yin no// / 
310a2('bum): payang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
310a3('bum): pa rnams ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no// stobs rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no// 
310a4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin
310a5('bum): ngo 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// 'phag/ sa pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// bsam
310a6('bum): gtan rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bsam ge tan rnams ma yin no// tshad myed pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshad myed pa rnams ma yin no// gzugs
310a7('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid
310a8('bum): gang yin pa de rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ma yin no/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
310b1('bum): pa dgu ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
310b2('bum): pa med pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi ma bcings ma gol ba nyid gang yin pa de
310b3('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol
310b4('bum): ba nyid gang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin// myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin// pa de myi 'jigs pa ma yin no// so so yang dag par
310b5('bum): rig pa bzhi'i ma bcings ma gol ba nyid gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma yin no/ byams pa chen po'i ma bcings ma gol ba nyid gang yin pa de byams pa chen po
310b6('bum): ma yin no// snying rje chen po'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sangs
310b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin no// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
310b8('bum): bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lan cig par myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin// 
311a1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ma bci ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no// rang byang chub kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rang byang chub ma yin no// bla na med pa yang
311a2('bum): pa/ dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 
311a3('bum): tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'du shes ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'du shes na shin tu rnam par dag pa'i/ 'du byed ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par shes
311a4('bum): dag pa'o/ myig ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rna ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sde ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lce'i shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lus ni shin tu rnam par
311a5('bum): dag pa'o// yad ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dge pa'o// sgra ni shin tu rnam par dpa'o/ dri ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// ro ni shin tun
311a6('bum): par dag pa'o// reg ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// chos ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag
311a7('bum): da'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni shinang tu rnam par// dag pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// yid kyi rnam par
311a8('bum): shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// myig gi 'du shes te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu na
311b1('bum): rdza par dag pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg
311b2('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag
311b3('bum): pa'o// lce'i rnam par 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las
311b4('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sa'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dag par pa'o// chu'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ mye'i khams rna shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rlung gi khas
311b5('bum): ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// nam mkha'i khams ni shin tu na ma par dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni shin tu rnapar dag pa'o// ma rig pa ni shin tu rnam par dga'o// rnam
311b6('bum): shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mying dang gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// skye mched drug ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sred pa ni shin
311b7('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'o/ le nad pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// srid pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// skye ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rga shi ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
311b8('bum): pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin po ni
311b9('bum): reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'du byed man tu rnam se
312a1('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// bsam gtan gyi rolang tu phyin pan srin tu rnam par dag par/ shes rab kyi 'asod tu na pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni shin canam pa
312a2('bum): pa dag pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par
312a3('bum): dag pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid ni shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong / 
312a4('bum): pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid da ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni shin
312a5('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni shin
312a6('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu bkyi ba rnam par dag pa'o// dngos po myang ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par
312a7('bum): dag pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dga'o// dbang po rnams
312a8('bum): ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ stobs rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa
312b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// bsam gtan rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs myeng ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnas/ 
312b2('bum): ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni shinang tu rnam par dga' ba'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa
312b3('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni shin tu rnam par shes dag pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzinang rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// gzungs
312b4('bum): kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i da stobs bcu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// so so yang dag par rig
312b5('bum): pa bzhi ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// snying rje chen po ni shin tu rnam pa ra dag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
312b6('bum): ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dgra bcom pa 'di ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rang byeng chub
312b7('bum): ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lam gyi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
312b8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos stond kyang / rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid na shin tu sems can du myi dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa'
313a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa la de myi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas ste/ gzugs stong pa nyid myi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes
313a2('bum): stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mig stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba stong pa nyid mi gnas
313a3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / sna / stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang lce stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang yid stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzugs stong pa nyid myi
313a4('bum): gnas pa'i tshul dang / sgra stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dri stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang ro stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / reg pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chos
313a5('bum): stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / myig gi rnam par shes pastong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes/ pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'i rnam par shes
313a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong
313a7('bum): pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sde'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid myi gnas
313a8('bum): pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te rag pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te rig pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang
313b1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid
313b2('bum): mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
313b3('bum): rkye nad kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mye'i khams stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 
313b4('bum): rlung gi khams stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid myi gnas
313b5('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / skye/ mched drug stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / reg pa stong pa
313b6('bum): pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul drang srid pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lend pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / srid pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
313b7('bum): tshul dang / skye ba stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rga shi stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
313b8('bum): stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bsam gautan gi pa
314a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid myi
314a2('bum): gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi gnas po'i
314a3('bum): tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las pa 'das pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
314a4('bum): stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul
314a5('bum): dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
314a6('bum): nyid stong po nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid/ 
314a7('bum): myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dbang po sabs stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang stabs stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan log stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i
314a8('bum): lom yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / stabs stong ba nyid mya gnas pa'i tshul dang byang chub kyi 'bogs pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan
314b1('bum): stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshad myed pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par tha rad pa stong pa nyid myi
314b2('bum): gnas pa'i tshul dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid myi gnas
314b3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzind stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs
314b4('bum): pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / myi 'dzag nus pa bzhi stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag dpar rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / byams
314b5('bum): pa chen po stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 
314b6('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 
314b7('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang rang byang chub stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
314b8('bum): stong pa nyid myi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas ste/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang la yang gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid myi
315a1('bum): dmyigs te dngos po myed pa la dngos po myed pa myi gnas so// rang bzhin la yang rang bzhin myi gnas so// gzhan gyi dngos po la gzhan gyi dngos po myi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
315a2('bum): pado ni 'di ltar de dag thams cad dmyigs su myed de gang dmyigs su myed pa de ni gang la yang myi gnas so/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
315a3('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid thams cad kyis rab tu 'byed de/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon
315a4('bum): pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems da pa' sems dngapa'atshon po rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnam sa dang / nyan thos dang 'phags pa thams cad kyis spyan
315a5('bum): du mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom/ ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang
315a6('bum): nyan thos de dag gis kyang chos nyid rjes su rtogs te/ chos nyid de rjes su rtogs nas kyang sems can rnams la chos skyon te/ de'ang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las myi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir
315a7('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' ba myed do// de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni 'da' ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'i'i rang bzhin myed do// 
315a8('bum): shes rababam po// nyi shu 'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorang
315b1('bum): kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos kyi dbyings la'ang 'da' ba ma mchis/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang 'da' ba ma mchis
315b2('bum): na/ ji lags 'o na gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ tshor ba yang gzhan la/ chos kyi
315b3('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 'du shi kyang gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag
315b4('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 'du byed kyang gzhan de la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna
315b5('bum): par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam// myig kyang gzhan lnga kyi dbyings kyang
315b6('bum): gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba yang gzhan/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig logs kyi
315b7('bum): sam sna'i yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lce yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan
315b8('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lus kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
316a1('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang zhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lus kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig
316a2('bum): lags sam/ yid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang zhen/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan
316a3('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sgra yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags/ 
316a4('bum): dri yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags/ sam/ ro yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin
316a5('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig/ lags sam/ reg kyang gzhan zhig/ chos kyi dbyings kyang // gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
316a6('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/ chos kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa
316a7('bum): yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ 
316a8('bum): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ snga'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzha no// yang dag pa'i mtha
316b1('bum): yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang zhe na/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes/ 
316b2('bum): pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ 
316b3('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang zhen/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
316b4('bum): yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags
316b5('bum): sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan/ chos kyi da ngas kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg
316b6('bum): pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzha
316b7('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag par mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha
316b8('bum): yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig
317a1('bum): lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan zhig/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sna'i

317a4('bum): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig/ lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba/ yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid
317a5('bum): kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags su/ ma/ sa'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
317a6('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/ chu'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ mye'i khams kyang gzhan la/

317a8('bum): gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzha
317b1('bum): zhig lags sam rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ ma rig pa yang gzhan/ chos kyi

317b8('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/ srid pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ skye ba yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings

318a4('bum): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ 
318a5('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bsam gtan gi/ pha rold tu phyind pa yang gzhan/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzha / na/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
318a6('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ nang stong pa
318a7('bum): nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhi
318a8('bum): nyid gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gzhan zhig lags
318b1('bum): sam stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag

318b5('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ga/ zha na la/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig

318b7('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan
318b8('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 
319a1('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos
319a2('bum): pakyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ 
319a3('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 
319a4('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang / gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ba/ zhan zhig lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan
319a5('bum): la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang da ga pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ dbang po rna mas kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin
319a6('bum): nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags
319a7('bum): sam byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
319a8('bum): pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ 
319b1('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig/ 
319b2('bum): lags sam tshad myed pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
319b3('bum): kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin
319b4('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid
319b5('bum): kyang gzhan ya dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam du/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang // smon pa myed par yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ 
319b6('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid la kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'/ 
319b7('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams/ 
319b8('bum): kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu' yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
320a1('bum): kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang
320a2('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags
320a3('bum): sam byams pa chen po yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ snying rje chen po yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang zhen
320a4('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang zhe na/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang/ 
320a5('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhigs sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzha/ na/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
320a6('bum): zhig lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang zhe na/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhanayang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ phyir myi
320a7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
320a8('bum): gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'o mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam// rang byang chub kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
320b1('bum): yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad
320b2('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni
320b3('bum): ma yin no// gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// tshor ba yang gzhan la/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag
320b4('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/ 'du shes kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gzhan pa ma yin no// 'du byed kyang gzhan la
320b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan/ kha ma yin no// rnam par ni/ sa pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhi
320b6('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// rab 'byor dmyig kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
320b7('bum): ba ma yin no// rna ba yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/ sna yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de ban/ 
320b8('bum): nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan po ma yin no// lce yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dge pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/ lus kyi
321a1('bum): gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// yid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag
321a2('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// rab 'byor gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/ sgra yang gzhal chos kyi
321a3('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// dri yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhag pa ma yin no// ro yang gzhan
321a4('bum): lo chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag/ da pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// reg kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag
321a5('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gan+d+ha pa yin no// chos kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i ma tha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// rab 'byor dmyig gi rnam
321a6('bum): par shes pa yang gan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan
321a7('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan

321b3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
321b4('bum): gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ba ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi 'dus te reg pa dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin kyang gan
321b5('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/ lus kyi 'dus tereg pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhi na nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa

322a7('bum): yang gzhan pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/ rab 'byor da ma rig pa yang gzhan

322b7('bum): gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin
322b8('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan/ 
323a1('bum): ba ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu

323a6('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// chen po stong pa

323b8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhag pa la/ chos
324a1('bum): kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag

324b5('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa 'i stobs bcu yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa
324b6('bum): ma yin no// myi 'jigs pa bzhi pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang gzhan la/ 
324b7('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag po'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// byams pa chen po yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
324b8('bum): mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// snying rje chen po yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
325a1('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang bzhan pa yin no// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
