325a5('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma
325a6('bum): yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ nu yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te/ de gzugs kyang gzhan
325a7('bum): la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yad gzhi ni ri ma lags/ tshor ba yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang
325a8('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags 'du shes kyang gzhan/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'du byed kyang gzhon la/ 
325b1('bum): kyi byangs kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha'/ 
325b2('bum): yang gzhan pa ma lags/ myig kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rna ba yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan
325b3('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ sna yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lce'i yang
325b4('bum): gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lus kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang
325b5('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ yid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ gzugs kyang
325b6('bum): gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan pa mo logs/ sgra yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de da zhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma
325b7('bum): lags/ dri yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ ro yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang
325b8('bum): gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ reg kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin lags/ chos kyang gzhan
326a1('bum): la chos dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ 
326a2('bum): pa yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ sna'i rnam par
326a3('bum): zhes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ 
326a4('bum): zazhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi byings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
326a5('bum): mtha' yang gzhan/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chas kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gi zhen/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ myig
326a6('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi
326a7('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang
326a8('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 
326b1('bum): mus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
326b2('bum): kyang gzhan/ te de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sa gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyis
326b3('bum): gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
326b4('bum): gzhan pa ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tsho pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin/ nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags
326b5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan bla ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg par
326b6('bum): rkye nad kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
326b7('bum): gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ sa'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan/ 
326b8('bum): ba ma lags/ chu'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mya'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang / 
327a1('bum): gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rlung gi khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gnan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
327a2('bum): la ma lags/ nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi
327a3('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ ma rig pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
327a4('bum): gzhan pa ma lags/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ga/ zhan pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos
327a5('bum): kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa 'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan
327a6('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ skye mched drug kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan
327a7('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags reg pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ tshor ba yang gzhan la chos kyi
327a8('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ sred pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan/ 
327b1('bum): ba ma lags le nad pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ srid pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid
327b2('bum): kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ba ma lags skye ba yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rga sha yang gzhan la
327b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dge ba'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang
327b4('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa ma yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma
327b5('bum): lags bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyi// ngas kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i// mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
327b6('bum): nad pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa tshe yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbya
327b7('bum): kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag par mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
327b8('bum): yang gzhan pa ma lags// nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi
328a1('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhanatede bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
328a2('bum): gzhan pa ma lagasastong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
328a3('bum): kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan pa yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
328a4('bum): ba ma lags 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'o yang ga zhan pa ma lags 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos
328a5('bum): kyi dbyings kyang gzhan pa de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags mtha' las 'das pa s+ho// nga pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan
328a6('bum): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma la gas/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
328a7('bum): mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan de la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rang bzhin stong
328a8('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang bzhin pa ma lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan
328b1('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
328b2('bum): yang gzhan pa ma lags myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
328b3('bum): kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin
328b4('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags cang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chosad kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang
328b5('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/ rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de ba zhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag par mtha' yang gzhan pa
328b6('bum): ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang
328b7('bum): gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan
328b8('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'phags pa'i
329a1('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la
329a2('bum): pa chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gnas pa ma lags/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang
329a3('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kying gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ gzugs myed pa
329a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbying/ das kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i ma tha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par thard pa brgyad kyang gzhan
329a5('bum): la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mtha rang tu sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan la/ chos kyi
329a6('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa yang gzhan la/ chos
329a7('bum): kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan
329a8('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ gzus
329b1('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
329b2('bum): kyang gzhan/ de bzhin shegs nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang
329b3('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 
329b4('bum): byams pa chen po yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ba ma lags/ snying po chen po yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang
329b5('bum): gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhon la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan
329b6('bum): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang bzhan pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhon/ de bzhin nyid kya
329b7('bum): gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
329b8('bum): gzhan pa ma yin ni/ lags/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ ngagra bcom pa nyid
330a1('bum): kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rang byang chub kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan
330a2('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
330a3('bum): kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags// 'o na ji ltar chos kyi rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgong cing / nag po'i chos kyi rnam par
330a4('bum): sbyind pa nag po'i sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi sku gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / dkar po'i chos na mas kyi rnam par smind pa dkar po'i lha dang / mi dkar
330a5('bum): nog gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smind pa/ dkar nag gi bde dang / sdug bsngal rnams nyams su myong ba/ myi nas/ cing myi dgar ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par sbyind pa/ myi
330a6('bum): nag cing myi dkar ba'i rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ang ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub dang / bla na myed pa yang dag pa ro rdzogs pa'i
330a7('bum): byang chub bo zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar byas te/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa bstan gyi/ don dam pa'i
330a8('bum): bden pas ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod par bstand par myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de ni rnam par brtag du myed pa brjod du myed pa mtha' snyad myed pa ste/ 'di ltar mying bden pa dang / gzug
330b1('bum): bden gyi dang skye ba bden pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa ste/ 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do/ gsalan
330b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te/ de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste 'bras bu rnam par dgod par lags kyi don dam pa'i bden par ma lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
330b3('bum): 'bras bu dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis
330b4('bum): bka' stsal pa rab 'byor da ci'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang don dam pa'i bden pa shis sam/ gal te shes na ni de dag thams cad kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bras bu'am lan cig phyir
330b5('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyi ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra mo ma pa nyid de rang byang chub 'am/ bla na myed pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par dgod par 'gyur na/ 
330b6('bum): 'byor byis pa mi ma'i skye bo rnams pa/ lem yang med lamasum+b+ha yang skyed las sgom pa yang myed / bar byis pa mi skye bo nam s+ho sgyu dgong dbar lhag las 'ong / @
330b7('bum): 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni lam yang yod pu sma na/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gong zag de dag la 'bras bu rnam par dgo / gsol ba bcom ldan 'dis ci lags/ lam bsgoms pas 'bras
330b8('bum): bu thob pa'am/ 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba mchis sam/ bcom 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor nga lam gyis 'bras bu thob par bya ba yang myed do// lam la ma gnas par 'a yang 'bras bu tho
331a1('bum): par myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byorar de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam
331a2('bum): par dgod par byed de/ 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod par myi byed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te/ de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams sam
331a3('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi khams/ rigs su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// 'dod pa'i 'dod
331a4('bum): chags dang / gnod sems srabs pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'og ma'i cha can gyis kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang // sa pas/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bla ma'i cha can gyis
331a5('bum): kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid do/ gang rtsi yang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gro ga pa'i chos can du 'du shes pas/ rang byang chub bo/ bag chag/ 
331a6('bum): kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs su bcad cing 'dus byas sam/ 'dus
331a7('bum): byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par bzhag pa ma mchis na/ gsungs pa'i don de dag gis ci ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byorang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
331a8('bum): bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am// dgra bcom pa nyid dam rang byang chub bam/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas pa yin gsol pa
331b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyi ba'o// bde bar gshegs pa de ni 'dus ma byas bgyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la rigs su bcad pa yod dam/ 
331b2('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos
331b3('bum): rnams 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig tu chud par gyur na de'i tshe 'dus byas she 'am/ 'dus byas shes chos gang la yang ring+ges kyi bu gcod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
331b4('bum): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid
331b5('bum): dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / don da da ma stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma da
331b6('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ra bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / ra gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / 
331b7('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams la ris su bcad pas chos myi stonang to// de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
331b8('bum): phyi nad pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am bzod po'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ bsam gtan gau pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha
332a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'am bsam gtan dang po 'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/ bsam gtan bsdu pa 'am/ bsam gtan bzhi pa 'am/ byams pa 'am/ snying rje'am/ dga' ba 'am btang snyoms
332a2('bum): sam nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ rnam par shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ 'du
332a3('bum): shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams na sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ 
332a4('bum): stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ lam da'am 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
332a5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ mngon
332a6('bum): par shes pa rnams sam/ ting 'dzind rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig po rnams sam/ 
332a7('bum): byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa po rnams sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad pakhyen pa nyid dam/ 
332a8('bum): chos gang la yang mngon par zhend pa myed do// de mngon par zhend pa myad pas chos gang la yang chags pa myed do// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa yongasu gtong yang / sbyin pa'i 'bras
332b1('bum): yul chags pa myed sbyin pa'i 'bras du nyams su myong ba ma dang / gzhan du sems can thams cad yong su mya ngan las bzla ba 'do tu tsun pa yongasu gtong / rdul khrims spang yang / nus khrims byung
332b2('bum): kyi 'bras bu la chags pa myang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba myed de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don tu tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom yang bzang por
332b3('bum): 'bras bu la chags pa myed/ bzod pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba myed de/ gzhan du sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngon las bzla ba'i don tu bzod pa sgom mo/ brtson 'grus rtsom yang / brtson
332b4('bum): 'grus kyi 'bras bu nags pa myed/ brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba myed de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don tu brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ bsam ga
332b5('bum): la snyoms par 'jug kyang bsam gtan gi 'dras bu la chags pa ma dbasam gtan gi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba myed de/ gzha na du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i
332b6('bum): don tu bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug gi/ shes rab skam yang shes rab kyi 'bras bu la chags pa myed/ nas ra bras bu rnams su myang ba myed de/ gzhan du na sems can thams
332b7('bum): cad yangasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i don tu shes rab skom mo/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa myang ba'i chos rnams sgom yang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myong po'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu la chags pa
332b8('bum): med zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba myed do// gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i don tu zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myang
332b9('bum): po'i chos rnams sbom mo// 'jig rten po dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams sgom yang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'ongs pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa myang / 'dzag rten pa dang
333a1('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pas rgyas kyi grus tha rnams su myong bskyed de/ gzhan du na sems can thams padas rgyarna na 'ad tu sam sa tshu / 
333a2('bum): su bang du chud do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ mtshan dang dpe' byang bzang po mngon par sgrub pa dang / par mang tu phyind pa bsten
333a3('bum): pa'i le'u ste/ drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / dam po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis bcom ldan 'das
333a4('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu gartogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
333b1('bum): rab 'byor sprul pa ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug la yongs su spyod pa myed do// bag la nyal ba dang kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do// phyi nang gi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// zag
333b2('bum): pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do// tshor ba la yongasu
333b3('bum): spyod pa myed do// 'du shes la yongs su spyod pa myed do// 'du byed la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ myig la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rno ba la yongasu spyod pa myed do// sna
333b4('bum): ba yongs su spyod pa myed do// lce la yongs su spyod pa myang ngo // lus rdal yongs su spyong pa myed do// yid la yongs spyod pa myed do// gzu gas la yongs su spyod do// sgra la yongs su spyod pa myeng ngo // 
333b5('bum): dril yongs su spyod pa myed do// ro la yongs su spyod do// rag la yongs su spyod pa myong ngo // chos la yongs su spyod pa med do// myig gi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyad pa myang ngo // 
333b6('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su spyod pa myang ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa lo yongs su spyod// 
333b7('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongasasu spyod da pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyong pa myang ngo // sde'i 'dus te reg pa la yongasasu spyod pa
333b8('bum): myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
334a1('bum): la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las
334a2('bum): pabyung ba'i tshor ba las yongs su spyod pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod da pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do// sa'i khams la/ 
334a3('bum): yongs su spyod pa myed do// chu'i khams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// mye'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do// rlung khams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// nam mkha'i khams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rnam par
334a4('bum): shes pa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rten cing 'brel par 'a byung ba'i la yongs su spyod pa med do// ma rig pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// 'du byed la yongs su spyod pa meng ngo // rnam
334a5('bum): par shes pa lu yongs su spyod pa myed do// mying dang gzugs mya la yongs su spyod pa myod do// skye mched drug la yongs su spyong pa myad do/ reg pa la yongs su spyod po myed do// tshor ba
334a6('bum): yongs su spyod pa myed do// srad pa la yongs su spyod pa myang ngo // le nad pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// srid pa la yongs su spyong pa med do// skye bo la yongs su spyad pa myang ngo // rgashi la yongs su spyod pa mye/ 
334a7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha lad tu phyind pa la yongs su spyad pa myed do/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yongs su sbyong ba myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su sbyang ba myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha
334a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la yongs su spyod pa myeng ngo // bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la yongs su spyod pa mang do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa myed de/ nang stong pa nyid la yongasu spyo
334b1('bum): pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su sbyong pa myed do// don du
334b2('bum): pastong pa nyid la yongs su spyong ba myang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa mad do// 'dus ma byas snang ba nga la yongs su spyod pa myod de/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su snang ba nga/ 
334b3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyad pa myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa mye dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myang ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid
334b4('bum): yongs su spyod pa myang do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su sbyang du ba myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyad pa myed ngo / dngos po myong ba stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myang/ 
334b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sangs su snang ba med do/ dngos po mang ngo bo dang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa skyed do/ na / bar gnag pa rnams la yongs su snang rje/ yang sa
334b6('bum): par spong ba rnams la yongs su spyod pa myod de/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang parnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// dbang po rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed de/ stabs rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed// 
334b7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su spyod pa myad de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su spyad pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// bsam gtan rdzas
334b8('bum): la yongs su spyad pa myed do// tshad myed pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su skyed pa myang ngo // rna bar thar pa rnams la yongasu spyod pa myed/ 
335a1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do// mngon par shes pa
335a2('bum): rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su spyod pa myed do// myi
335a3('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi la yongs su spyod pa myad ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su spyad pa myed ngo // byams pa chen po la yongs su spyod pa myed do// snying rje chen po la yongs su spyod pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi
335a4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa myed do// lan cig phyir/ 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa myang ngo // phyir myi 'ong
335a5('bum): ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid la yo su spyod pa myang ngo // rang byang chub la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yongs su spyod do/ rnam
335a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa myed de/ rab 'byor de ltar ni byang chub sems
335a7('bum): dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sprul pas lam bsgom pa la brten kyang / kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur/ rje bar byang bar yang myi
335a8('bum): 'gyur la 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na yang myi gda' na lam sgom du ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dngos po la la
335b1('bum): zhig la brtend te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar na snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
335b2('bum): de na ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'gyur
335b3('bum): ba'i dngos po de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin no// gsol pa
335b4('bum): ldan 'das ci lags gzugs thams cad sprulang pa lta bu legs sam/ rtom tha thams cad sbyang do ba lta bu lags sam/ 'dun sa thams cad dulang pa 'i bu mags sam/ 'du byed thams cad sprul pa la sa
335b5('bum): mu lta bu lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rang 'byor nga gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ tshor ba thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// 'du shes thams cad ni smyan
335b6('bum): pa lta bu'o// 'du byed thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// rnam par shes me thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o// tshor ba thos kyi
335b7('bum): sprul pa lta bu 'du shes thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o// 'du byed thams cad sprul pa lta bu rnam pa shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pA la ni gzugs ma mchos/ tshor ba ma mchis/ 
335b8('bum): 'du shes ma mchis 'du byed ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun tu nas nyon tu mongs pa mchis rnam par byeng ba ma mchis/ gang las dgrol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis na/ 
336a1('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems
336a2('bum): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha 'am myi dag las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang dmyigs sam/ gsol/ 
336a3('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas yongs su dgrol bar bya
336a4('bum): ba'i sems can gang la yang myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes mthong ngo // rtogs so// sprul pa lta bur shes so// mthong ngo // rtogs so// gsol pa/ ba
336a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing / mthong / na ste rtogs la/ sprul pa lta bu 'cheld cing mthong ste/ rtogs pa
336a6('bum): lags na gang dgi don tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod pa lags/ bsam gtan pa zhi la spyod pa lags/ tshad myed pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ 
336a7('bum): gzugs myeng ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ mngon par shes pa lnga la spyod pa lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod pa lags/ 'phags pa'i bden po bzhi la spyod pa
336a8('bum): lags sam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa lags/ mthad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa lags/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang sman pa myed pa la
336a9('bum): spyod pa lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa lags/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyad pa lags/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la
336b1('bum): spyod pa lags myi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa lags byams pa chen po la spyod pa lags/ snying rje chen po la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa btsa
336b2('bum): brgyad pa la spyod pa lags/ de tsa'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam gyi bar la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa lags/ sems can
336b3('bum): rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dgal te sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zi na na ni/ byang chub sems
336b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can rnams kyi don tu bskal pa grangs myed par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa myi spyod de/ ra'abyor nga sems can rnams rang rang gi chos thams cad sprul pa
336b5('bum): lta bur mi shes pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen bskal pa grangs myed par pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod do// sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi
336b6('bum): zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmyil mo lte bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ smyig rgyu lta bu/ myig yor lta bu/ sgyu ma lto bu/ sprul pa lta bu la
336b7('bum): na bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ji la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing sems can rnams gyen du bskyod par bgyid// bcom ldan 'das
336b8('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byorang sems can thams cad ni mying dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa la gnas pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
337a1('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod cing de dag mying dang mtshan ma las gyen du bskyod do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mying ni gang lags mtshan ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da 'di
337a2('bum): lta ste/ mying zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur gyi mying gis sgo btags pa'o// 'di lta ste/ mying zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs shes bya ba 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 
337a3('bum): 'du shes shes bya ba 'am 'du byed ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am bud myad ces bya ba 'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba 'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba/ 
337a4('bum): 'am byol song gi skye gnas shes bya ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig / na zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba 'am/ myi zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba
337a5('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lan cig phyi/ ra 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'dra// sa bu zhes bya ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am
337a6('bum): rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni sgyu ma'i mying gis sgro btags pa ste/ rab 'byoradamying ni thams cad mying gi don gyis btags pa ste/ byis pa so
337a7('bum): so'i smra ba mus gang la chags par gyur pa'i 'dus byas thams cad ni myong tsam ste/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mkhas
337a8('bum): pas myong thams cad ni yongs su rtogs pa las byung ba yin gis/ yongs su brtags pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa la mkhas
337b1('bum): la mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par zhen par myi byed do zhes skul bar byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
337b2('bum): thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa yin no// rab 'byor mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gnyis po 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyu rad pa'i mtshan ma ste
337b3('bum): gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs myed pa'i mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
337b4('bum): byung ba'i gzugs rags pa 'am/ 'phra ba 'am/ bza/ rnyeng ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rkyang ring ba 'am/ thag nye bgang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun tu rtog pas bzung ste/ 
337b5('bum): 'di ni gzugs gi mtshan ma zhes bya'o// rab 'byo rod gzugs myeng pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs myed pa'i chos grang la ya nga rung ste/ mtshan mar bzung bas yongasu brtags shing / nyon mongs
337b6('bum): pa skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag
337b7('bum): las bkrol ba'i mtshan ma myed pa'i dbyings su dgod cing rab tu gzhog ste/ ji nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o// 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'o zhes bya ba de gnyis su myi ltung ba de ltar dgod cing gzhog ste/ rab 'byor/ 
337b8('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can mtshan ma la skra grol zhing / mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god/ 
338a1('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di ni de tsam du bas te/ mying dang mtshan mar bas la btags pa tsam du bsam te/ yongs su btags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub
338a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par thob la/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de
338a3('bum): ngag gis ni sa nas sar yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ sems can rnams kyang theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te dngos po 'am/ dngos po'i
338a4('bum): mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byorarang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / da' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ khyad pa dar thob par yang mi 'gyur te/ gzhan yang khyad par thob pa
338a5('bum): la sbyor bar myi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma yang ma / dngos po'i yang myed pas na/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
338a6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yong su rdzogs par
338a7('bum): byed do/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ mtshan mo myed pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myang
338a8('bum): po'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha ra lang tu phyin pa yang su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma myang po'i tshul gyis sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma myong po'i tshul gyis jisas
338b1('bum): gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis tshad pe bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myang pa'i tshul gyis pa dran pa nye bar ba bzhi yong su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i
338b2('bum): tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs
338b3('bum): par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'phag
338b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lhag brdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtsha na ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
338b5('bum): par byed do/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myang ba'i tshul
338b6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma myang ba'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma myang ba'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
338b7('bum): par byed de/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ mtshan ma myang ba
338b8('bum): tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan mo myed pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul
339a1('bum): gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
339a2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma
339a3('bum): myed pa'i tshul gyis dngos po nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myang ba'i tshul gyis dngos po myang ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam par
339a4('bum): thard pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs pa par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden
339a5('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon da pa myad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myong
339a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzinang rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams
339a7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma mang nga'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis myi 'jigs po bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ 
339a8('bum): ma myang ba'i tshul gyis dngos so yang dag por rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed / mtshan ma myang pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs por byed do/ mtshan ma myang ta'i tshul gyis snying rje che
339b1('bum): po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
339b2('bum): gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/ rab 'byor gal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyi khyon cig mtshan ma yod na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
339b3('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos mtshan ma myed pa/ dran pa myed pa yid la bya ba myed pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar myi 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la
339b4('bum): gzhog par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos rnams ni ma tshan ma myed pa/ dran pa myed pa yid la bya ba myed pa ste/ rab 'byor rang de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
339b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa myed pa'i rtsa sa rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed do// gas lang pa bcom ldan 'das gal te/ de ltar chos thams
339b6('bum): cad mtshan ma mchis shong / dran pa ma mchis te/ yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag myi dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos// 
339b7('bum): 'di dag ni 'jig rten las / 'das pa'i chos so/ 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa mang po'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag nani 'das ma byas kyi chos so// 
339b8('bum): 'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so// 'di ni dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// 'di dag ni sas
340a1('bum): rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byorar de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma myed pa'ang gzhan la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan
340a2('bum): nam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma myed pa yang gzhan la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan
340a3('bum): ma myed pa yang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma myed pa'ang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lagaso// 
340a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byorang mtshan ma myed pa nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir spyi 'ong bi'i 'bras bu'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom
340a5('bum): pa nyid do// rang byang chub bo// byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// sa ngas rgyas kyi chos so// gsal pa bcom ldan 'das de de la gas so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so// bcom ldan
340a6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma myed par rig par bya'o ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' se
340a7('bum): dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
340a8('bum): tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang phyin stong po nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong
340b1('bum): pa nyid dang don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang
340b2('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
340b3('bum): nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden lam yan lag
340b4('bum): brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa'ajug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis
340b5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad/ pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge'i ting nge 'dzin
340b6('bum): thams cad dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 
340b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu myong pa dag gis rnam par 'phel les/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pas ni snang
340b8('bum): pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan po la bslab par bya ba myed // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam por tha rad pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge ba'i chos thams
341a1('bum): cad ma 'dus pa myed de/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par b.rang pa'i sgra'o/ mtshan ma dang bral ba ni mtshan ma skyed pa rnam par tha rang par smra'o// mngon par lu / 
341a2('bum): bya ba med ni smon pa myed pa rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo ste/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu
341a3('bum): gnyis la slob pa yin/ khams bco brgyad la slob pa ya ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan zhi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel por 'byung ba'i
341a4('bum): yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin da pa la slob pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la/ slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin
341a5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/ bas ma gtan gi pha rolod tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa
341a6('bum): yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus byas stong / 
341a7('bum): pa zhi lo sgrib pa yin/ lus ma byas spang ma nyid la sgrub pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid la srab pa lani/ thog ma dang thas myed pa spong ba nidi la slob pa yin/ dong ba med pa slong pa nyid rlo/ 
341a8('bum): pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mye dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dang po nga/ 
341b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po myed pa'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa
341b2('bum): yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/ spobs lnga la slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/ 
341b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin chad myed pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la
341b4('bum): slob pa yin/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la slob pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga la
341b5('bum): slob pa yin ting nge 'dzind thams cad la slob pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sro pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ so so yang
341b6('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ thams
341b7('bum): ca shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji
341b8('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'od la byang
341b9('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i sgo tshe/ gzugs rab tu shes te/ gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin
342a1('bum): nying ngo ltar bu yin parab tu shesas/ dral ji ltar na gzugs shes pa ma nyen/ 'di lta ste dper na/ da pa'i phung po snying po myang pa lwa shin tugasong sdo dang / shin tu gseng chags dang / nan tu
342a2('bum): snying po myed par rab tu shes te/ de ltar na gzugs shes pa yin na/ ji ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed cing gang tu yang 'gro ba myed pas/ gang nas kyang
342a3('bum): myi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang tu yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs
342a4('bum): khyod bzhin nyid ni myi sgyu ma 'gag 'ong ba rmyang / 'gro ba myed/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin rnam par byang ba ma yon 'bri ba ma ya na// 'phel ba mi yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid
342a5('bum): du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di ltar ste dper na/ chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa
342a6('bum): skye nang 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin na// ji ltar na tshor ba'i sgru ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhen/ tshor ba ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myad cing gang tu yang 'gro ba myang pas gang nas kyang / 
342a7('bum): ga tul ste/ gang ga nas kyang ma sa par gang bya ma mang bar shes pa ste/ dkar char pa'i skye ba dang ga pags pa yi / sar rdzo rjo na la
342a8('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni myi skye myi 'gag 'ong ba myed/ 'gro ba myed/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rna bar byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin 'phel ba ma yin/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du/ 
342b1('bum): gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ smyig rgyu la chu shin tu myi dmyigs pa de ltar shes pa ste/ 
342b2('bum): de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba mad cing gang tu yang 'gro ba myang bas/ gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang tu yang myi 'gro ba ste/ 
342b3('bum): gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang tu yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'dzag pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni myi skye myi
342b4('bum): 'gag 'ong ba myed 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin rnam par byang ba ma yin 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyind ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir
342b5('bum): de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar ni 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/ ltar ste dper na chu shing kun pa so sor pya na snying po shin tu myo dmying/ 
342b6('bum): pa de ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar 'du byed kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na 'du byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myang cing gang tu yang 'gro ba myang bas/ gang nas/ 
342b7('bum): kyang myi 'ong gang tu yang myi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ong ba de gang du yang ma song por shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin
342b8('bum): zhe na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni mya skye mi 'gag 'ong ba myang / 'gro ba myang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin tse log ma yin zhing de bzhin du
343a1('bum): gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan
343a2('bum): lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed cing gang du yang 'gro ba
343a3('bum): myed pas/ gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang tu yang mi 'gro/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ong ba de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i
343a4('bum): de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin// nyid kyang myi skye myi 'gag/ 'ong ba myed 'gro ba mad kun nas nyo// na mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma
343a5('bum): yin 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na rma ma par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na skye
343a6('bum): mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong / phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/ de ltar na skye mched rnaMs
343a7('bum): shes pa yin no// ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ myig gi khams kyang myig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong / 
343a8('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khas kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sgra'i khams kyang sgra'i khams
343b1('bum): kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin stong pa/ sna'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis snang ngo / dri'i khams kyang dri'i khams
343b2('bum): kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i khams kyang lce'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong po/ ro'i khams kyang ra
343b3('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / lus kyi khams kyang lus kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rig kyi
343b4('bum): khams kyang reg gi khams kyi rirang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi khams kyang rang bzhin yid
343b5('bum): kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chos kyi khams kyang rje/ kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis spong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang
343b6('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes ste/ de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no/ ji ltar na rtan cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa yin na no// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba myed par shes pa dang / de bzhin/ 
343b7('bum): du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa myed pa dang / chad pa myed pa dang rtag pa myed pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba myed pa 'gro ba myong ba/ smras pa dang bral zhing na
343b8('bum): bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ gun
344a1('bum): 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na sdug bsngal shes pa yin/ bden pa shes
344a2('bum): pa yin 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ gnyis las rnam par grol ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ gnyis su myed pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no// de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa
344a3('bum): 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yon no// ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin na na/ sdug bsngal gyi bzhin nyid rnam
344a4('bum): nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa yin/ de ltar ni nya phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// de nas
344a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces/ gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub seM// mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa
344a6('bum): la spyod pa'i che/ yon tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'jal na des chos kyi drangs nam bA ma 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i
344a7('bum): la la zhig yod na ni rnam par dkrug par yang 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs po'i chos gzhan gang yang myi dmyigs/ gal te dmyigs na ni chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam 'khrugs par 'gyur ro// btsal
344a8('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorarang de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am rang sangs rgyas so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi chos kyi dbyingasu ma gtogs pa'i chos gang ma dmyig so// de ltar ma dmyis
344b1('bum): pa chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no zhes bya bar btags pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ chos kyi dbyings la bslab
344b2('bum): bar bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas/ gang la bslabs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
344b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings
344b4('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi da byings lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung
344b5('bum): yang rung ste dbyer myed pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbying sa ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor nga chos kyi dbying sa ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de ni
344b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ dge ba dang myi dge ba'i chos dang / 'jig rten po dang 'jog rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myeng ba'i chos dang kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang kha na ma tho ba myed pa'i
344b7('bum): chos dang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas/ kyi chos thams cad de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings la slob pas chos
344b8('bum): thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bco ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
345a1('bum): pas ji ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshor ba la bslab par bgyi ji ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ 
345a2('bum): ltar khams dang skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la bsrab par ngaskye
345a3('bum): ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan gi pha lod tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha
345a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi// ji ltar nang stong pa nyid bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ slar phyi nang stong pa nyid la dasrab bar bgyi/ ji ltar snang ba nyid
345a5('bum): stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la dri slab par bgyi/ ji ltar don dam pa stong ba nyid la bslang b.rabagyo/ ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
345a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la
345a7('bum): bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang bzhin go mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mye dmyiH
345a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par
345b1('bum): ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
345b2('bum): stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/

345b4('bum): bgyi/ ji ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa da gu la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa la bslab pare bgyi/ ji ltar mngon
345b5('bum): shes pa drag la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzind thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la/ bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la
345b6('bum): bslab pa ri bgyi ji ltar myi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par dgyi/ ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byams po chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar snying rje chen po la bslab par
345b7('bum): bgyi dza ltar dga' ba chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar btang snyoms can po la bslab par g+ha~M/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi nas ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ jo ltar myi chen po'i mtshan sum
345b8('bum): bcu rtsa gnyis ngas/ dpa' byang bzang po brgyad cu yangs su grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mthong ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par brgya/ ji ltar bram ze che nong ma
346a1('bum): rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khyim bdag che zhing mtho' ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par/ 
346a2('bum): pa/ bgyi ji ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtshe ma'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ldan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
346a3('bum): 'phrul dga'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skya bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs ris kyo lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs
346a4('bum): lha nye phan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs chen gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ 
346a5('bum): ji ltar chung snang gi ltar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji lta tshad myang sdang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par ban+d+ha/ ltar kun sdang dngo ba'i lhar skye bar brgya ba la bslang
346a6('bum): bar bgyi ji ltar chung dgo'o ltar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skyo bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyid/ ji ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lcer skye bar bgyi bo la bslab par bgyi/ 
346a7('bum): ltar 'du shes myed pa'i sems can du skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ros kyi sgrar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing / der yang myi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas
346a8('bum): skye mched kyi lhor skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing / der yang myi skye bur bgyi ji ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing / der yang myi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar cung zad myed/ 
346a9('bum): ji dge rgyas kyi ltar skye ba gyibs shA par gyid/ rje ga nu che'i ltar skye bar gyib la sla pam kyi/ ji snya ca pa'i lta skye ra gyim la sa
346b1('bum): mas rgyas kyi la la sa kyang lal pa'i spyod pa gyi mos kyi
346b2('bum): pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing / der yang myi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes myed 'du shes myin skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing / der yang myi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar sems dang po

346b7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ 'du
346b8('bum): byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par 'gyi/ myig la bslab par bgyid/ rna ba la bslab par bgyi sna la bslab par bgyi/ lce la bslab par bgyi/ lus la bslab par bgyi/ yid
346b9('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs la bslab par bgyi sgra la bslab par bgyi/ dril bsrab par bgyi/ ro la bslab par bgyi reg la bslab par bgyi/ chos la bslab par bgyi// myig gi rnam par shes pa
347a1('bum): me la bslab par bgro sde'i rnam par shes pa la bsrab par bgyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par dgyi/ lus kyi rnam pa shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsrang
347a2('bum): bgyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te
347a3('bum): reg pa lo bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ 
347a4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lcenga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi
347a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sarba khams la bslab par bgyi/ chu'i khams la bslab par ba// gyi/ mye'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ rlung gi khams la
347a6('bum): bslab par bgyi/ nam mkha'i khams la bslab bar bgyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ ma rig pa la bslab ba radagyi 'du byed la bslang bar bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la
347a7('bum): bslab par bgyi/ mying dang gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ skye mched drug la bslab par bgyi/ reg pa la bslab par bgyi tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sreng ba la bslab par bgyi/ lend pa la bslab par
347a8('bum): bgyi srid pa la bslab par bgyi/ skye bar la bslab par bgyi/ rga shi la bslab par bgyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bgyi
347b1('bum): thod pa'i 'i lang du na pa la / brtson 'grus na sbyin pal bsra pa ts+tsha/ rnams gan gapa mang tu da pal brnas rgyunas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
347b2('bum): bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid la bslab par gyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par brgya/ don dam pa

347b5('bum): stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la ba slab par bgyi/ dngos pa myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par 'gyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po myed pa
347b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslang bar bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ dbang po lnga
347b7('bum): la bslab par bgyi stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la
347b8('bum): bgyi/ bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi/ tshad myed pa rnams la bslab par bgyi gzugs myang pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rna par thar pa brgyad la bslab par
348a1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
348a2('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la bslab par bgyi mngon par shes pa rnaMs la bslab par bgyi/ tingange 'dzin rnaMs la
348a3('bum): bslab par bgyi gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi myi 'jigs pa bzhi la
348a4('bum): bslab bgyi so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bgyi byams pa chen po la bslab pa ra mi 'gyi snying rje chen po la
348a5('bum): bslab par bgyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par gyi
348a6('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi le gyi rnam par
348a7('bum): bgyi lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rnam pa zas cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyi na// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang/ 
348a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byin pa lag sa spyad pa'am myi sa bsres par myi 'byid par myi 'gyur ba lags grag/ 
348a9('bum): d+ha ya d+ha dud te/ na tanan/ bya nga/ canan// e ba~M b+ha ti/ ma sa sraman sem
